name: Full Medical Checkup Assistance Scheme- Gujarat Labour Welfare Board
description: The objective of the scheme is to conduct health check-ups for male Shramyogis above 45 years of age and female Shram Yogis above 35 years of age who are working in the organized sector in the state of Gujarat.

name: Anti Bird Net
description: Under the Anti Bird Net Birds will never leave your garden if they are used to pecking on certain trees and plants, but if you install anti-bird nets at the appropriate places, you can prevent them from coming again to peck your plants.

name: Financial Assistance Scheme for Purchase of Agricultural Land to Scheduled Caste Farmers
description: The scheme was launched on in the year 1986. Under the scheme, financial assistance is provided to farmers belonging to the scheduled castes to purchase agricultural land, with a maximum limit of 2 acres, for self-cultivation.

name: Loan Assistance to Scheduled Castes Students for Commercial Pilot Training
description: The scheme was commenced in the year 1987 with the objective to provide financial assistance to bright Scheduled Castes Students who want to undergo training for commercial pilot license.

name: Scheme for Small Business Owners of Scheduled Castes to Buy a Place of Business/Shop
description: Under the scheme, financial assistance in the form of loans and subsidies is provided by banks to individuals belonging to the Scheduled Castes category. This assistance is aimed at enabling them to purchase business premises or shops in urban areas for business development.

name: Scheme for Grant of Financial Assistance to Industrial Workers/Employee for Purchase of Spectacles
description: The "Scheme for Grant of Financial Assistance to Industrial Workers/Employee for Purchase of Spectacles" by the Goa Labour Welfare Board, Department of Labour and Employment, Goa, aims to provide financial aid to industrial workers/employees for acquiring spectacles. Through this scheme, assistance

name: Reimbursement of Tuition Fees to the Wards of Ex-Servicemen/Widows (Sainik Welfare)
description: "Reimbursement of Tuition Fees to the Wards of Ex-Servicemen/Widows (Sainik Welfare)" is a Welfare Scheme by the Dept of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry. The wards of the ESM / Widows of ESM studying in Government-recognized Institutions are provided reimbursement of their tuition fees.

name: Cattle Shed Subsidy Scheme under Scheduled Castes Sub Plan (SC Category)
description: The scheme “Cattle Shed Subsidy Scheme under Scheduled Castes Sub Plan (SCSP)” is implemented by the Directorate of Animal Husbandry, Government of Gujarat. Under this scheme, the financial assistance is given to Scheduled Caste beneficiaries for construction of Cattle Shed for 2 animals.

name: Reimbursement of Tuition Fees to the Wards of Ex-Servicemen/Widows (Sainik Welfare)
description: "Reimbursement of Tuition Fees to the Wards of Ex-Servicemen/Widows (Sainik Welfare)" is a Welfare Scheme by the Dept of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry. The wards of the ESM / Widows of ESM studying in Government-recognized Institutions are provided reimbursement of their tuition fees.

name: Death Benefit (GBOCWWB)
description: Through the "Death Benefit" scheme, the nominee/dependant of the deceased worker is provided with financial assistance. The death should have either been natural or caused due to an accident, during the course of employment. The applications are accepted offline.

name: Marriage Assistance to Normal Persons Marrying Visually Impaired Persons
description: The scheme 'Marriage Assistance to Normal Persons Marrying Visually Impaired Persons' was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Govt. of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide marriage assistance to a normal person marrying a visually Impaired Person.

name: Financial Assistance for Marriage for the Construction Workers
description: The "Financial Assistance for Marriage for the Construction Workers" by the Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Department, Delhi, is a welfare scheme  that provides financial assistance for marriage of self and for upto 2 children.

name: Pension Benefit for the Construction Workers
description: The "Pension Benefit for the Construction Workers" by the Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Department, Delhi, is a welfare scheme for the registered workers of the board with a pension benefit of ₹ 3000/- per month after completion of 60 years.

name: Disability Pension for the Construction Workers
description: The "Disability Pension for the Construction Workers" by the Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Department, Delhi, is a welfare scheme that provides monthly disability pension of ₹3000/- to the permanently disabled member due to paralysis, leprosy, T.B and accidents.

name: Sant Surdas Scheme
description: Under the scheme, monthly financial assistance is provided to Persons with Disabilities aged between 0 and 17 years, who have a disability of more than 80% and are registered in the Below Poverty Line (BPL) list.

name: Maintenance Allowance to Intellectually Disabled Persons
description: The 'Maintenance Allowance to Intellectually Disabled Persons' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Govt of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide a maintenance allowance to intellectually disabled persons.

name: Natural Death Assistance for the Construction Workers
description: "Natural Death Assistance for the Construction Workers" by the Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Dept., Delhi, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance of ₹1,00,000/- to the nominees/dependents of the members in case of natural death of the worker.

name: Accidental Death Assistance for the Construction Workers
description: "Accidental Death Assistance for the Construction Workers" by the Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Dept., Delhi, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance of ₹2,00,000/- to the nominees/dependents of the members in case the death is due to an accident.

name: Assistance for Power Driven Chaff Cutter Scheme under Integrated Fodder Development Scheme (General Category)
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to dairy farmers belonging to General Caste category on purchase of electric powered chaff cutters. By using power driven chaff cutter, dairy farmers can reduce wastage of green & dry fodder which is economically important for their profitable dairy farming.

name: Scheme of Personal Assistance Allowance to Differently Abled Persons with High Support Need
description: The "Scheme of Personal Assistance Allowance to Differently Abled Persons with High Support Need" was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Govt. of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide a personal assistance allowance of ₹1,000 to differently abled person.

name: Scholarship (I to VIII Standard) by Welfare of Differently Abled Persons
description: The 'Scholarship (I to VIII Standard) by Welfare of Differently Abled Persons' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide scholarships to purchase notebooks for differently-abled students studying in government school.

name: Pension To Widows And Destitute Women-Chandigarh
description: Under the Pension To Widows And Destitute Women scheme To provide financial assistance to Widows and Destitute Women of Chandigarh.

name: Early Intervention Centre for Children with Cerebral Palsy in SRTC, Chennai and Tiruchirapalli Districts
description: The "Early Intervention Centre for Children with Cerebral Palsy in SRTC, Chennai and Tiruchirapalli Districts" was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Tamil Nadu. Under this scheme, stimulation training is given to the children affected with cerebral palsy.

name: Dhobhi Hetu Avashyak Upkaran Sahayata Yojana
description: The Labor Department of Chhattisgarh initiated this scheme on January 10, 2018, under the "Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board." This scheme aims to provide equipment support to dhobis.

name: Financial Assistance for Self-Marriage of Registered Women Workers (HBOCWWB)
description: Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹50,000/- is provided to registered women workers for arranging their own marriage who have a minimum one-year regular membership.

name: Mukhya Mantri Mahila Nirman Shramik Sammaan Yojana (HBOCWWB)
description: Under this scheme, registered female workers, who have minimum one-year’s regular membership, are being provided financial assistance of ₹5100/- for the purchase of Saree, Suit, Slippers, Raincoat, Umbrella, Sanitary Napkin and Kitchen utensil etc.

name: Government Institute for the Mentally Retarded - Tamil Nadu
description: The 'Government Institute for the Mentally Retarded,Chennai' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. Under this scheme, children with intellectual disability are given special education, vocational training, food, uniforms etc.

name: Mukhyamantri Shramik Aujaar Sahayata Yojana
description: The Labor Department of Chhattisgarh launched this scheme on October 1, 2010, under the "Building and Construction Workers Welfare Board." Tool kits are distributed to construction workers on an annual basis as part of this initiative.

name: Early Intervention Centres for Children with Autism
description: The "Early Intervention Centres for Children with Autism" was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. Under this scheme, Early intervention programme emphasizes attending to social stimuli, imitation skills, language comprehension and usage.

name: Scholarship (I to VIII Standard) by Welfare of Differently Abled Persons
description: The 'Scholarship (I to VIII Standard) by Welfare of Differently Abled Persons' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide scholarships to purchase notebooks for differently-abled students studying in government school.

name: Family Pension (HBOCWWB)
description: Under this scheme, on the death of a pensioner worker who is being given pension by the Haryana Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, half of his/her pension is given to his/her spouse (as the case may be).

name: Financial Assistance for Self-Marriage of Registered Women Workers (HBOCWWB)
description: Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹50,000/- is provided to registered women workers for arranging their own marriage who have a minimum one-year regular membership.

name: Sewing Machine Scheme- Haryana Labour Welfare Board
description: Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹4,500/- is provided to women workers employed in Industrial and Commercial Establishments in the state of Haryana for the purchase of sewing machines for their domestic use.

name: Disability (Due to Accident or Other Reason) Scheme- Haryana Labour Welfare Board
description: Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided to workers employed in industrial and commercial establishments in Haryana based on their percentage of disability, whether the disability occurs due to an accident or other reasons inside or outside the workplace.

name: Natural Death and Funeral Assistance
description: The Art and Culture Department, Government of Tamil Nadu was launched the scheme "Natural Death and Funeral Assistance". This scheme provides financial assistance for the funeral and natural death of registered folk artistes to support their families during difficult times.

name: Assistance for Purchase of Spectacles - Folk Artists
description: The "Assistance for Purchase of Spectacles" scheme was launched by the Art and Culture Department, Government of Tamil Nadu. Under this scheme, the Tamil Nadu Folk Artiste's Welfare Board provides financial assistance for the purchase of spectacles to registered folk artists.

name: Financial Assistance to Persons Suffering from Rare Diseases
description: The scheme “Financial Assistance to Persons Suffering from Rare Diseases” was launched by Social Justice & Empowerment Department, Govt. of Haryana. Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹3000/- per month will be provided to all persons of Haryana domicile, who are suffering from Rare Diseases.

name: Laghu Vyavassay Scheme
description: "Laghu Vyavassay Scheme" is an economic empowerment scheme by the Haryana Scheduled Castes Finance and Development Corporation, Govt of Haryana. In this scheme, loans are provided to individuals from Scheduled Castes for self-employment/ income-generating activities.

name: Sikkim Grant of Scholarship to Students with Disabilities Scheme
description: The Government of Sikkim has introduced the Sikkim Grant of Scholarship to Students with Disabilities Scheme, 2014. This scheme aims to provide financial assistance to differently-abled students to help them secure academic education and technical or professional training.

name: Silicosis Rehabilitation Pension- Haryana Silicosis Board
description: Under this scheme, a monthly pension of ₹4,000/- is given to the Silicosis-affected worker categorized as category (A, B, or C) according to the ILO Classification, until he/she remains alive.

name: Mukhyamantri Prakhand Parivahan Yojana
description: "Mukhyamantri Prakhand Parivahan Yojana" to provide transportation facilities connecting blocks & remote Panchayats with district headquarters. This scheme aims to encourage scheduled castes, scheduled tribes, backward classes entrepreneurship by providing financial support to purchase buses.

name: Incentive Scheme for Marrying a Disabled Young Man/Woman
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance of ₹25,000/- to couples on marriage, where at least one partner has 40% or more disability and marries a non-disabled person, or where both partners have disabilities.

name: Scheme of Financial Assistance for Dance and Drama Troupes/Associations
description: The "Scheme of Financial Assistance for Dance and Drama Troupes/Associations" was launched by the Arts and Culture Department, Puducherry. The scheme aims to provide a grant for dance and drama troupes/associations.

name: The Lokpal of India Internship Scheme
description: The Lokpal of India launched the Internship Scheme for the interns to learn about the implementation of the Lokpal & Lokayuktas Act, the Prevention of Corruption Act, the Central Vigilance Commission Act, & they can contribute towards the effective functioning of the Lokpal of India with fresh ideas

name: Grant for Marriage of the Daughter of a Scheduled Caste Individual
description: The scheme aims to provide a grant of ₹50,000/- per daughter to Scheduled Caste families, for a maximum of two daughters, whose total monthly family income from all sources does not exceed ₹4,000/- or who belong to a BPL family, to help cover marriage expenses.

name: Small Business in Service/Trading Sector for Persons with Disabilities (Divyangjan Swavalamban Yojana)
description: The scheme offers loans up to ₹50 lakhs for self-employment to disabled persons in sectors like Agriculture, Small Business/Artisan & Traditional Occupations, Transport & Service Sectors, etc. Eligible individuals can access loans with interest rates ranging from 5% to 9% per annum.

name: Buffalo Entrepreneurship Development Scheme
description: The "Buffalo Entrepreneurship Development Scheme" aims to enhance livestock productivity, especially among marginalized farmers in Odisha. This scheme seeks to address protein deficiency, boost nutritional status, & promote livelihood through dairy farming.

name: Agricultural Activities for Persons with Disabilities
description: This scheme provides loans up to ₹10,00,000/- to the persons with disabilities for agricultural production, irrigation, horticulture, sericulture, the purchase of agricultural machinery and equipment for agricultural services, and the marketing of agricultural products etc.

name: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for Thrust Sectors: Scheme For Marine Products Processing Units
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: “Scheme For Marine Products Processing Units'' under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for Thrust Sectors, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration of DNH & DD, aims to provide Interest Subsidy to the Establishment /Expansion of Marine products processing industries.

name: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS): Environment Protection Infrastructure Subsidy
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: “Environment Protection Infrastructure Subsidy'' under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)”, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims to promote Installation of Environment Protection Infrastructure for a cleaner environment.

name: Micro Credit Finance under NSKFDC- Haryana
description: Under this scheme, loan is provided to Safai Karamchari and their dependents for projects with a maximum cost up to ₹1,00,000/- per beneficiaries for small and petty trade/business and various income generating activities.

name: Professional and Self Employment Scheme (HSFDC)
description: Under this scheme, the Corporation provides loans/benefits to individuals from BPL families, whose annual family income does not exceed ₹1,80,000/-, in rural & urban areas. These loans support self-employment activities in fields such as legal profession, Chartered Accountancy, medical practice etc.

name: Marriage Assistance for the Construction Workers
description: The "Marriage Assistance for the Construction Workers" by the Sikkim BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, is a welfare scheme of the board that provides Marriage benefits in the form of financial assistance to the eligible registered women members & their immediate dependents of the board.

name: Subsidy for Disabled Young Professionals
description: Under this scheme, loans up to ₹25,00,000/- are provided to professionally educated unemployed disabled youth who fall under the OH, VH, HH, or MR categories, at different interest rates ranging from 4.5% to 8% per annum.

name: Partial Disability Benefit for the Construction Workers
description: The "Partial Disability Benefit for the Construction Workers" by the Sikkim BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, is a welfare scheme of the board that provides financial assistance is provided to the nominees/ dependents of a member, in case of his/her partial disability.

name: Poultry Farming Scheme (HSFDC)
description: Under this scheme, the Corporation provides loans/benefits to individuals from Below Poverty Line (BPL) families, whose annual family income does not exceed ₹1,80,000/-, in both rural and urban areas for self-employment income generating activities such as poultry farming.

name: Indira Gandhi Pyari Behna Sukh-Samman Nidhi Yojana
description: The "Indira Gandhi Pyari Behna Sukh-Samman Nidhi Yojana" is an initiative by the Himachal Pradesh government. The scheme recognizes the significant contributions of women in household work, cultural preservation, and family economy by providing a monthly assistance.

name: Skill Development for the Construction Workers
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: The "Skill Development for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,  U.T. of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance in the form of stipend to the workers who attend the training programs under “Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana”.

name: Scheme for Celebration of Birth/death Anniversary of Eminent Personalities
description: The "Scheme for Celebration of Birth/Death Anniversary of Eminent Personalities" scheme aims to provide financial assistance for the celebration of anniversaries/Jayanti's of Sant Kabir, Sant Gadge, and Sant Durbalnath and in addition to Anniversaries of DR. B.R. Ambedkar, etc.

name: IMA Nongthangleima Yaipha Tengbang Scheme
description: The "Ima Nongthangleima Yaipha Tengbang Scheme" provides support to approximately 4 lakh women in Manipur who are above the age of 40 years. The scheme aims to empower these women by offering crucial financial assistance, thereby aiding them in pursuing diverse livelihood options.

name: National Centre for Earth Science Studies Internship Scheme
description: The “National Centre for Earth Science Studies Internship” scheme by the Earth System Science Organization, Ministry of Earth Sciences, provides various opportunities for school as well as college students to familiarise and/or pursue research on different branches of earth sciences.

name: Veda Vyasa Scheme for Vedic Education
description: Andhra Pradesh Brahmin Welfare Corporation launched the “Veda Vyasa Scheme for Vedic Education” for the year 2019-20, to encourage Vedic Education in Andhra Pradesh.  Under this scheme, selected applicants will be granted Annual Financial Assistance.

name: Bharati Scheme for Education - 1st Class to 5th Class
description: "The Bharati Scheme for Education - 1st Class to 5th Class" encourages Brahmin students of Andhra Pradesh to continue their education.  Under this scheme, financial assistance for the academic year will be granted to eligible poor Brahmin student applicants.

name: Garuda Scheme for Funeral Expense
description: The "Garuda Scheme for Funeral Expenses" aims to provide financial assistance for funeral expenses of a deceased Brahmin in their family, where the family has no other means to meet the same. This scheme covers Andhra Pradesh all 13 districts, to meet the funeral expenses of the deceased Brahmi.

name: Additional Pension to 100% Disabled Ex-Serviceman having Children
description: The scheme provides an additional pension to 100% disabled ex-servicemen who were members of the Armed Forces & have been released from service due to 100% disability or permanent incapacity to work, provided the disability or incapacity is attributable to service.

name: Bharati Scheme for Education Professional Education Course - Chartered Accountancy Intern
description: The "Bharati Scheme for Education Professional Education Course - Chartered Accountancy Intern (IPCC)" encourages Brahmin students of Andhra Pradesh to continue their education. Under this scheme, financial assistance for the academic year will be granted to eligible poor Brahmin students.

name: Bharati Scheme for Education - Graduation
description: The "Bharati Scheme for Education - Graduation (Any regular course of 3 years duration after 10+2 will be considered under this category. i.e., B.A., B.Com, B.Sc., etc., including B.Ed.)" provides financial assistance to encourage Brahmin students of Andhra Pradesh to continue their education.

name: Financial Assistance to Disabled Ex-Servicemen
description: Under the scheme, financial assistance of ₹3,000/- per month shall be granted only to those Disabled Ex-Servicemen who are bonafide residents of Haryana State, who were discharged from the Armed Forces on medical grounds, and whose disability is not attributable to service.

name: Kanya Saksharta Protsahan Yojana
description: The scheme was launched by the Tribal Welfare Department, Govt. of Madhya Pradesh. The objective of the scheme is to motivate girls towards education. Under this scheme, girls in Class 11th who have passed their 10th class examination will receive ₹3,000/- per year as a monetary incentive.

name: Additional Pension to Widow of Ex-Serviceman having Children
description: The scheme is implemented by the Sainik and Ardh Sainik Welfare Department, Government of Haryana. Under the scheme, an additional amount, in addition to the pension, is provided to the widow of an ex-serviceman who dies while in service but not in any battle.

name: Financial Assistance to War Widows of Defence Forces
description: Under the scheme, financial assistance of ₹3,000/- per month shall be granted to War Widows of Defence Force Personnel’s (Army, Navy & Air Force) who were killed in action during declared war of 1962, 1965 & 1971 in addition to family pension already getting from Government of India.

name: Pension for the Construction Workers
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: The "Pension for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,  U.T. Administration of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides a monthly pension after completion of 60 years to the eligible registered member.

name: Sanction of Adult Sticks to Senior Citizens
description: The "Sanction of Adult Sticks to Senior Citizens" scheme aims to provide walking sticks to senior citizens. This initiative ensures that eligible senior citizens receive the necessary support to enhance their mobility and independence.

name: Uchcha Shiksha Protsahan Chhatravriti Yojana
description: The scheme aims to promote higher education among meritorious students by providing financial support to regular undergraduate and postgraduate students in government colleges and state universities of Uttarakhand.

name: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Meritorious Students Incentive Scheme (Class 12th Passed)
description: The objective of the scheme is to motivate students from the lower economic backgrounds & support them economically. Under this scheme, cash award of ₹5,000/- is given to the students who have obtained the highest marks in the 12th class examination in government schools within their district.

name: Integrated Social Security Scheme: Pension for Women in Distress
description: The scheme is implemented by the Social and Tribal Welfare Department, Administration of Union Territory of Ladakh. Under this scheme, a financial assistance of ₹1,000/- per month is provided as a pension to destitute widows, divorced, or deserted women with no source of income.

name: Promoting Registration for the Construction Workers
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: The "Promoting Registration for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, U.T. of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides sleeping mat/ blanket/ mosquito net to registered construction workers, in order to encourage construction workers to register with the Board.

name: Marriage Grant for the Marriage of the Daughter of War Disabled Ex-Servicemen above 50% Disability
description: Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹21,000/- is provided for the marriage of each dependent daughter of war-disabled ex-servicemen whose disability has been assessed above 50%, for up to two daughters who are at least 18 years old.

name: Marriage Grant to War Widows’ Daughters of Ex-Servicemen
description: The scheme is implemented by the Sainik and Ardh Sainik Welfare Department, Government of Haryana. Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹21,000/- is provided to the war widows for marriage of their dependent daughters, for up to two daughters who are at least 18 years old.

name: Hostel Facility for Students Availing Education in Delhi
description: The objective of the scheme is to provide facilities for residential and other facilities such as water, reimbursement of electricity expenditure, scholarship etc. for scheduled caste students of Madhya Pradesh studying in higher institutions located in Delhi.

name: State Government ST Scholarship (Class 9 to 10)
description: The scheme was launched by the Tribal Affairs Department, Government of Madhya Pradesh, aims to encourage education among Scheduled Tribe students and improve their educational status. This scheme provides scholarships to Scheduled Tribe students in Classes 9 and 10.

name: State Marriage Assistance Scheme
description: The 'State Marriage Assistance Scheme' offers one-time financial aid to female beneficiaries from families holding AAY or PHH ration cards, with the amount directly credited to their Aadhaar-linked bank accounts. Additionally, divyangjan beneficiaries also receive financial assistance.

name: Pratibha Yojana
description: This scheme provides financial assistance to Scheduled Tribe students who have passed national competitive examinations such as JEE, NEET, CLAT, AIIMS, and NDA, and have taken admission in IIT, NIT, NLU, MBBS (government colleges located in Madhya Pradesh), AIIMS or NDA.

name: Medical Expenses-Treatment for Major Ailments Including Surgery
description: "Medical Expenses-Treatment for Major Ailments Including Surgery'' scheme by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Dept.,West Bengal, is a welfare scheme that provides medical expenses for the treatment of beneficiary or his/ her dependents suffering from Cancer, Heart disease, Kidney disease, T.B. etc.

name: Niji Talabon Ka Jirnoddhar Ki Yojana
description: The government of Bihar launched the "Niji Talabon Ka Jirnoddhar Ki Yojana" scheme aims to enhance the water holding capacity of private ponds to boost fish productivity & production as well as provide benefits to private fish farmers through the expansion/renovation of their ponds.

name: Mukhyamantri Anusuchit Jati Evam Anusuchit Janjati Chhatrawas Anudan Yojana
description: The “Mukhyamantri Anusoochit Jaati Evam Anusoochit Janajati Chhatrawas Anudan Yojana” was launched by the SC and ST Welfare Department, Government of Bihar aims to provide financial assistance in every month to the students studying in Scheduled Caste/Scheduled Tribe hostels.

name: Scheme for Funeral Assistance in Case of Death of Registered Construction Worker
description: The "Scheme for Funeral Assistance in Case of Death of Registered Construction Worker" was launched by the Tripura Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Department Tripura. The scheme aims to provide funeral assistance in case of the death of registered construction workers.

name: The NSFDC Internship Scheme
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: "The NSFDC Internship Scheme 2024" is implemented by the National Scheduled Castes Finance & Development Corporation, Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment, Govt. of India. The internship will expose students to various programs & schemes undertaken by NSFDC, offering them hands-on experience in

name: Scheme for Funeral Assistance in Case of Death of Registered Construction Worker
description: The "Scheme for Funeral Assistance in Case of Death of Registered Construction Worker" was launched by the Tripura Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Department Tripura. The scheme aims to provide funeral assistance in case of the death of registered construction workers.

name: Research Scholarship for Disabled Students
description: The scheme is implemented by the Higher Education Department, Government of Madhya Pradesh, aims to provide financial support for PhD research to differently-abled students. Eligible candidates receive ₹16,000/- per month, which is directly transferred to their bank accounts.

name: Sanskrit Scholarship
description: Under this scheme, students studying Sanskrit at various levels—Post Graduate (M.A. Classic), Acharya, Graduate (B.A. Classic), Shastri, Uttar Madhyama, Purva Madhyama, and Prathama—in any government or aided non-government college receive a monthly scholarship of ₹300/- for 10 months.

name: Hospitalisation Relief Scheme
description: This scheme was launched by the Telangana Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, LET&F (Labour) Department Telangana financial assistance is provided to construction workers who suffer temporary disabilities due to accidents or diseases & hospitalized for five or more days.

name: Tirth Barat Yojana
description: The objective of this scheme is to provide government assistance for pilgrimage to the senior citizens & Persons with Disabilities (PwDs), who are residents of Chhattisgarh, to visit one or more of the various designated pilgrimage sites outside the state, once in their lifetime.

name: Maternity Benefit Scheme - Telangana
description: The "Maternity Benefit Scheme" was launched by the Telangana Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, LET&F (Labour) Department, Telangana. The scheme provides financial assistance to registered women workers, as well as the wives & daughters of registered workers to support them.

name: Marriage Gift Scheme - Telangana
description: The "Marriage Gift Scheme" was launched by the Telangana Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, LET&F (Labour) Dept. Telangana. The scheme aims to provide financial assistance as a marriage gift to unmarried registered women workers & the daughters of registered building & construction

name: Skill Upgradation and Vocational Education Scheme: For Worker (P.B.O.C.W.W.B)
description: "Skill Upgradation and Vocational Education Scheme: For Worker'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Dept. of Labour, Punjab, is a welfare scheme that provides full course fees, boarding and lodging assistance to the registered workers who acquire Skill from technical institutions.

name: Artificial Limbs and Assistive Devices Supply Scheme
description: The objective of the scheme is to increase the mobility of persons with disabilities by reducing impact of their disabilities. The scheme provides artificial limbs/assistive devices worth up to ₹6,900/- to persons with disabilities of 40% or more, provided they meet the other eligibility criteria.

name: Potency Development Plan
description: The objective of this scheme is to increase the mobility of all eligible PwDs of the state by providing them artificial limbs/assistive devices. The scheme provides artificial limbs/assistive devices worth up to ₹6,900/- to PwDs of 40% or more, provided they meet the other eligibility criteria.

name: Pension Scheme (K.B.O.C.W.W.B)
description: The "Pension Scheme'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Department of Labour, Karnataka, is a welfare scheme that aims to provide a monthly pension to registered construction workers who have reached 60 years of age and is a beneficiary of the Board for at least 3 years.

name: Pre Matric Scholarship for Students belonging to Scheduled Caste Community
description: The scheme is to provide financial assistance to students belonging to the Scheduled caste community pursuing Post-Matriculation recognized courses in recognized institutions.

name: Distribution of Certified Seeds-Oil Seeds
description: The "Distribution of Certified Seeds-Oil Seeds" scheme offers subsidies to farmers for purchasing certified oil seeds, helping them improve their crop yield and quality.

name: Mukhyamantri Shramshakti Yojana
description: This scheme aims to provide employment opportunities to men and women aged 18 to 45 from the minority community by offering vocational skill training in various fields or by providing loans through the Bihar State Minority Financial Corporation, Patna, for self-employment.

name: Distribution of Rhizobium
description: The “Distribution of Rhizobium” scheme offers a subsidy on the cost of Rhizobium, to farmers raising seed farms with Pulses crops in Tamil Nadu.

name: Financial Assistance for Education of Children of Beneficiary
description: The "Financial Assistance for Education of Children of Beneficiary" welfare scheme launched by the Manipur Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board provides one-time financial assistance for the education of children.

name: Animal Husbandry
description: This scheme provides subsidies on the distribution of sheep units, milch animals, and calves, as well as health coverage and artificial insemination for the animals. It is targeted at Tribal communities to improve their livelihood through animal husbandry.
tags: ['Animal Husbandry', 'Animals Health Cover', 'Artificial Insemination', 'Distribution Of Sheep Units', 'Tribal Welfare']

name: Hari Om Ashram Prerit Senior Scientist Award
description: The Hari Om Ashram Prerit Senior Scientist Award was established to commemorate the birth centenary of Pujya Shri Mota, the founder of the Hari Om Ashram, Nadiad. It is awarded to an eminent Indian scientist for their innovative and outstanding contributions to the field of Science and Technology.

name: Adi Dravidar and Tribal Welfare Department-Hostels: Special Guides
description: The scheme provides hostel facilities to all boys and girls boarders studying up to XII Standard.

name: Charmashilpa Scheme
description: The "Charmashilpa Scheme" aims to modernize the leather artisans' production methods by offering financial assistance to setup mechanized production units. This support helps leather artisan SHGs and cooperative societies enhance the quality of their products, making them more competitive.

name: Financial Assistance for Marriage (BBOCWWB)
description: Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹50,000/- is provided to registered male or female workers who have been members of the Board for at least three years, for the marriage of their two adult daughters and for the female member's own marriage.

name: Vocational Training to the Dependents
description: The "Vocational Training to the Dependents" provides a residential skill training program for 15,000 dependents of registered construction workers. The program focuses on enhancing the employability of dependents through training in various trades.

name: Organizing Block Demonstration on Polythene Mulch Technology in Groundnut
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to farmers for adopting polythene mulch technology in groundnut cultivation to improve productivity.

name: Production Of Certified Seeds
description: The "Production of Certified Seeds" scheme, offers a subsidy to farmers for producing certified seeds of Pulses.

name: Afforestation Schemes Providing Incentives And Employment To Tribals In Forest
description: This scheme offers grants to unemployed tribals for afforestation work, providing them with incentives and employment opportunities in forest operations.

name: District Central Cooperative Banks and through its Branches: For Consumer Durables T.V., Fridge and Two Wheelers Loan
description: A loan scheme provided by District Central Cooperative Banks for purchasing consumer durables like T.V., fridges, and two-wheelers. Loan covers 75% of the product cost at an interest rate of 14%.

name: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme (Maharashtra)
description: "Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme (Maharashtra)" is a scheme by the Social Justice & Special Assistance Dept, Govt of Maharashtra. In this scheme, widows aged 40 to 79 years who are from a BPL family receive a pension of ₹1500/- per month.

name: Financial Assistance for Medical (JKBOCWWB)
description: The "Financial Assistance for Medical" scheme by the JKBOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, Jammu & Kashmir, provides financial support for medical expenses, including injury treatment, temporary and permanent disability, and the treatment of chronic diseases.

name: Pre-Matric Scholarship Scheme
description: The scheme offers financial assistance to students from Backward Classes (BC) and Most Backward Classes (MBC) studying in English medium from 6th to 10th standard. It covers tuition and examination fees.

name: Children Education Allowance
description: The scheme is implemented by the Nagaland Building and Other Construction Workers' Welfare Board, Under this scheme, children of registered beneficiaries studying from Nursery to Class 10 are provided ₹500/- per month per child as education assistance.

name: District Central Cooperative Banks and through its Branches: For Housing, House Construction, Repair Extension Loan
description: The scheme offers loans up to ₹10,00,000/- for housing, house construction, and repair/extension purposes, at a 12% interest rate to provide financial aid to citizens for housing needs.

name: Schooling Education (JKBOCWWB)
description: The scheme "Schooling Education" by the Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Dept., J&K, provides financial assistance for the education of children of registered construction workers, from Class Nursery/1st to 5th, and from Class 6th to 8th.

name: Financial Assistance for Medical (JKBOCWWB)
description: The "Financial Assistance for Medical" scheme by the JKBOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, Jammu & Kashmir, provides financial support for medical expenses, including injury treatment, temporary and permanent disability, and the treatment of chronic diseases.

name: District Central Cooperative Banks and through its Branches: For Women Entrepreneurs
description: The scheme aims to provide loans of up to ₹5,00,000/- at an interest rate of 12% (subject to change) for women entrepreneurs through District Central Cooperative Banks and its branches.

name: Mahila Samridhi Yojana (Maharashtra)
description: "Mahila Samridhi Yojana" is administered by the Dept. of Social Justice & Special Assistance, Govt. of Maharashtra. The scheme aims to uplift economically weaker women from the Charmakar Community. Loans ranging from ₹25,000/- to ₹50,000/- are granted at a low interest rate of 4% p.a.

name: Pre-Matric Scholarship Scheme
description: The scheme offers financial assistance to students from Backward Classes (BC) and Most Backward Classes (MBC) studying in English medium from 6th to 10th standard. It covers tuition and examination fees.

name: Marriage Assistance (JKBOCWWB)
description: The "Marriage Assistance" scheme by the JKBOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, Jammu & Kashmir, provides financial aid to registered construction workers for the marriage of their dependents, including up to three marriages for their sons, daughters, siblings, or themselves.

name: Educational Assistance to the Children Studying in 1st to 7th and 8th to 10th Class
description: Under this scheme, educational assistance is provided of ₹2,500/- to the children studying in 1st to 7th standard and ₹5,000/- for the children studying in 8th to 10th standard of the registered construction worker. The scheme covers up to two children and the wife of a registered male worker.

name: Mahila Kisan Yojana (Maharashtra)
description: "Mahila Kisan Yojana" is implemented by the Dept. of Social Justice & Special Assistance, Govt. of Maharashtra. The scheme aims to uplift the lifestyle of economically disadvantaged Charmakar communities. it supports the production and sale of various types of footwear and leather articles.

name: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (Maharashtra)
description: The scheme "Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension" is a social welfare scheme by the Social Justice & Special Assistance Department, Government of Maharashtra. In this scheme, ₹600 per month is provided to elderly individuals aged 65 years and above from BPL families.

name: Construction of Free Houses for Tribals
description: This scheme provides free houses to tribals who already possess free house site pattas. The construction of the houses is carried out by government authorities, ensuring shelter for tribal communities.

name: State Disability Pension
description: The Social Welfare & Tribal Affairs Department, Government of Mizoram launched the State Disability Pension scheme. It provides a monthly pension of ₹350 to 200 eligible individuals who are completely blind or bedridden.

name: Handicapped Students Stipend Mizoram
description: Under this scheme, provide financial support to differently-abled students for purchasing essential items like books and uniforms. Students enrolled in both government and private schools are eligible to receive a monthly stipend.

name: Savitribai Phule Self-Help Scheme
description: The scheme provides financial support to unemployed women from the Scheduled Caste (SC) category in the state to help them start businesses in industry, service, or trade sectors.
tags: ['Below Poverty Level', 'BPL', 'Business Loan', 'SC', 'Scheduled Caste', 'Self Employment', 'Women Entrepreneurship']

name: State Scholarship of Class 1st to 5th (Scheduled Caste)
description: Launched in 1966-67, the "State Scholarship of Class 1st to 5th" scheme is a welfare initiative by the Scheduled Caste Welfare Department, Government of Madhya Pradesh. The scheme provides a scholarship amount of ₹200/- to Scheduled Caste students, which is disbursed until 31st October every year.

name: West Bengal Transport Workers’ Social Security Scheme: Assistance on Death and Permanent Disablement
description: The scheme provides financial relief to the beneficiaries in case of permanent disability due to accidents or their dependents/nominees in case of accidental or natural death.

name: Kanya Dhan Scheme for SC Students
description: The scheme "Kanya Dhan Scheme for SC Students" by the Directorate of Higher Education, Government of Goa. Through this scheme, an amount of ₹ 25,000/- is provided to the girl students of the Scheduled Caste Communities once they pass the 12th standard board examination (or equivalent).

name: Pre Matric Scholarship Scheme (Saral Vidya Sahay) for SC and OBC (V to VIII)
description: "Pre Matric Scholarship Scheme (Saral Vidya Sahay) for SC and OBC (V to VIII)" was introduced by the Directorate of Social Welfare, Government of Goa. The scheme aims to support parents of children belonging to Scheduled Castes and Other Backward Classes for the education of their wards.

name: Issuance of Free House Sites
description: This scheme provides free residential land sites to eligible individuals from the Backward Classes (BC), Most Backward Classes (MBC), and Denotified Communities (DNC) who do not own a house or land, helping them secure housing stability.

name: Issuance of Free House Sites
description: This scheme provides free residential land sites to eligible individuals from the Backward Classes (BC), Most Backward Classes (MBC), and Denotified Communities (DNC) who do not own a house or land, helping them secure housing stability.

name: Primary Cooperative Agriculture and Rural Development Bank: For Sericulture In Irrigated Area
description: The scheme provides loans to farmers for sericulture activities in irrigated areas, with a loan amount ranging from ₹49,000/- to ₹79,000/- per acre, and interest rates from 11% to 12.75%.

name: Savitribai Phule Kishori Samriddhi Yojana
description: The Savitribai Phule Kishori Samriddhi Yojana was initiated by the "Department of Women, Child Development, and Social Security, Government of Jharkhand."

name: State Scholarship of Class 1st to 5th (Scheduled Caste)
description: Launched in 1966-67, the "State Scholarship of Class 1st to 5th" scheme is a welfare initiative by the Scheduled Caste Welfare Department, Government of Madhya Pradesh. The scheme provides a scholarship amount of ₹200/- to Scheduled Caste students, which is disbursed until 31st October every year.

name: Assistance for Funeral Rites
description: The “Assistance for Funeral Rites” scheme provides ₹500/- to support SC/ST families with low income, in covering funeral expenses, ensuring that they can conduct funeral rites for their deceased ones.

name: Krishi Input Anudan Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide agricultural input subsidies in affected areas due to the rise in water levels of rivers like Ganga and Kosi and flood-related crop damage from heavy rainfall.

name: Mukhymantri Sarthi Yojana - Jharkhand
description: The "Mukhymantri Sarthi Yojana" aims to provide industry-relevant skill development training for youth in Jharkhand, aligning with NSQF standards. Implemented by Jharkhand Skill Development Mission Society (JSDMS) across all 24 districts, it offers free training to enhance employability.

name: Ved-Vyas Housing Construction Scheme
description: The "Ved Vyas Housing Construction Scheme" provides financial assistance to active and traditional fish farmers in Simdega district for building houses. The scheme prioritizes individuals particularly those living in kutcha or thatched houses.

name: Scheme For Loan And Advances to the Beneficiary For Construction Of House
description: The Scheme for Loan and Advances to the Beneficiary for Construction of House was launched by the Tripura Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, under the Labour Department of Tripura.

name: Aawaas Sahayata
description: Launched in 2016, the "Aawaas Sahayata" scheme by the Department of Tribal Affairs, Madhya Pradesh, The scheme provides housing assistance to tribal students pursuing higher education outside their hometowns where hostels are unavailable.

name: Mukhyamantri Bagwani Mission: Dragon Fruit Vikas Yojana
description: The scheme aims to expand dragon fruit cultivation in 21 districts of the state, providing financial assistance to ryot farmers for establishing and maintaining dragon fruit plantations.

name: Sarvajan Pension Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance of per month to elderly individuals, widows, destitute women, differently-abled persons, primitive tribes, and HIV/AIDS patients. The scheme eliminates previous age restrictions and targets inclusivity by guaranteeing pensions to all eligible.

name: Krishi Input Anudan Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide agricultural input subsidies in affected areas due to the rise in water levels of rivers like Ganga and Kosi and flood-related crop damage from heavy rainfall.

name: Bihar Shatabdi Asangathit Karyakshetra Kamagaar Evan Shilpakar Samajik Suraksha Yojana: Total Permanent Disability
description: “Total Permanent Disability” under the “Bihar Shatabdi Asangathit Karyakshetra Kamagaar Evan Shilpakar Samajik Suraksha Yojana” launched by the Labour Resources Department, Bihar, provides financial assistance of ₹75,000/- to the families of workers or craftsmen in case of permanent disablement.

name: Makhana Vikas Yojana
description: The scheme aims to boost Makhana cultivation by providing training to farmers and financial support for traditional equipment.

name: Atal Graha Jyoti Yojana
description: The scheme provides subsidized electricity bills to domestic consumers with monthly consumption up to 150 units, promoting energy conservation and reducing electricity costs for eligible beneficiaries.

name: Pay & Play Scheme
description: The “Pay & Play Scheme” aims to provide state-level players with training and practice opportunities at the Mega Sports Complex, Hotwar, Ranchi.

name: Jharkhand Sports Excellence Cash Award Scheme to Players
description: The “Jharkhand Sports Excellence Cash Award Scheme to Players” aims to provide cash awards to athletes for exceptional achievements in national and international competitions, as per the Jharkhand Sports Policy, 2022.

name: Jharkhand State Backward Classes Pre-Matric Scholarship Scheme
description: The "Jharkhand State Backward Classes Pre-Matric Scholarship Scheme" aims to enhance educational opportunities and participation among students belonging to backward classes in Jharkhand. It provides financial assistance to reduce dropout rates from classes 1 to 10 and promote equality in education.

name: Mukhyamantri Alpasankhyak Udyami Yojana
description: This is a flagship scheme of the Bihar government aimed at promoting entrepreneurship and self-employment among the youth by providing financial assistance of up to ₹10,00,000/- for setting up businesses.

name: Jharkhand State Scheduled Caste Post-Matric Scholarship Scheme
description: The "Jharkhand State Scheduled Caste Post-Matric Scholarship Scheme" promotes higher education among Scheduled Caste students in Jharkhand by providing financial assistance. This scheme aims to increase the participation of SC students in post-matric education.

name: Pre-Matric Scholarship for Backward Class Students
description: The scheme "Pre-Matric Scholarship for Backward Class Students" aims to provide financial assistance to backward class students studying at the pre-matriculation level in India. Monthly scholarships of varying amounts are provided to eligible students.

name: Marang Gomke Jaipal Singh Munda Overseas Scholarship Scheme
description: The "Marang Gomke Jaipal Singh Munda Overseas Scholarship Scheme" provides financial assistance to deserving Scheduled Tribes, Scheduled Castes, Minorities, and Backward Class students for pursuing postgraduate education in top-ranked universities abroad.

name: Jharkhand State Migrant Labourers Survey and Rehabilitation Scheme
description: The "Jharkhand State Migrant Labourers Survey and Rehabilitation Scheme" aims to identify and support migrant workers from the state. The scheme ensures social security, rehabilitation, and welfare for migrant workers and their families.

name: Gausevak Training (Initial and Refresher)
description: The scheme "Gausevak Training (Initial and Refresher)" aims to empower educated unemployed rural youth with self-employment opportunities and the skills to provide primary veterinary services in remote rural areas. A 100% stipend of ₹6,000 for initial training and ₹500 for refresher training.

name: Tap Water Scheme (Nal Jal Yojana)
description: "Tap Water Scheme" (नल जल योजना) by the Panchayat and Rural Development Department, Government of Madhya Pradesh aims to provide clean water in Gram Panchayat areas in an accessible manner. The application has to be made to the concerned Gram Panchayat.

name: Mukhyamantri Gramin Peyjal Nishchay Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide pure drinking water through pipelines to every rural household in Bihar. This initiative started in 2016 with a focus on community involvement, local governance, and sustainable water management.

name: Satat Jeevikoparjan Yojana (SJY)
description: "Satat Jeevikoparjan Yojana (SJY)" is a flagship program launched by the Government of Bihar to uplift ultra-poor households through comprehensive livelihood support, skill-building, and financial inclusion.

name: Tuition Fee Reimbursement of Sainik/Public Schools
description: The "Tuition Fee Reimbursement of Sainik/Public Schools" scheme by the Department of De-notified, Nomadic, and Semi-Nomadic Welfare, Government of Madhya Pradesh, reimburses tuition fees for eligible students enrolled in Sainik Schools or Institutions.

name: Haryana Post Matric Scholarship For Minority
description: Launched in June 2006 under the Prime Minister's New 15 Point Programme for the Welfare of Minorities, the "Post-Matric Scholarship for Students Belonging to the Minority Communities" by the Ministry of Minority Affairs, Government of India, aims to provide better opportunities for higher education.
tags: ['M Phil', 'Minority Cummunities', 'Monthly Allowance', 'Ph D', 'Post Graduate', 'Tuition Fee', 'Under Graduate']

name: Khel Chhatravriti (Vritika) Yojana
description: The "Khel Chhatravriti (Vritika) Yojana" implemented by the Directorate of Art, Culture, Sports, and Youth Affairs, Government of Jharkhand, provides financial assistance to athletes based on their performance to encourage sports as a career.

name: Ganga Swarupa Punah Lagna Arthik Sahay Scheme
description: The scheme supports remarried women who are beneficiaries of the Ganga Swarupa Pension Scheme, aiming to reintegrate them into society with financial support.

name: Running of Scheduled Caste Hostel
description: The "Running of Scheduled Caste Hostels" scheme by the Tribal Welfare and Scheduled Caste (SC) Department, Government of Madhya Pradesh, aims to provide housing and a conducive study environment for Scheduled Caste students. Separate junior, senior, and college hostels are operated for boys & girls.

name: Civil Service Incentive Scheme (Madhya Pradesh)
description: The "Civil Service Incentive Scheme (Madhya Pradesh)" scheme by the Tribal Welfare and Scheduled Caste (SC) Department of the Government of Madhya Pradesh provides an incentive amount to encourage SC/ST candidates to appear in Civil Services Examinations.

name: Poshan Sudha
description: This scheme is a government initiative to provide nutrition and healthcare support to pregnant and lactating mothers in tribal districts of Gujarat.

name: Salt Distribution Scheme Jharkhand
description: The "Salt Distribution Scheme" by the Department of Food, Public Distribution and Consumer Affairs, Government of Jharkhand, ensures subsidized salt is provided to AAY, PHH, and Green Cardholders, promoting accessibility and affordability.

name: Banglar Awaas Yojana (BAY)
description: "Banglar Awaas Yojana (BAY)" provides financial assistance to houseless households and those living in kutcha or dilapidated houses, helping them build pucca houses with essential amenities. The scheme offers financial assistance with additional support for toilets and unskilled workdays.

name: Scheme of Post Matric Scholarship to Lower Income Group Student for Studies in India
description: The scheme "Post Matric Scholarship to Lower Income Group Students for Studies in India" aims to provide financial assistance to students from the Lower Income Groups to enable them to complete their education. Students are provided maintenance allowances, tuition fees, and additional benefits.

name: Backward Classes Foreign Study Scholarship Scheme
description: Launched on 1st January 2007, the "Backward Classes Foreign Study Scholarship Scheme" by the Backward Classes and Minorities Welfare Department, Government of Madhya Pradesh provides financial assistance to backward class students for postgraduate, Ph.D., and post-research studies abroad.

name: Empower ST/SC Communities using ICT Tools through IT Knowledge Centre (ITKC)
description: "Empower ST/SC Communities using ICT Tools through IT Knowledge Centre (ITKC)" by the Department of Information Technology, Electronics and Communication, Government of Goa aims to create a large pool of computer literate manpower and to make introducing e-governance solutions meaningful.

name: Excellent Work Award Scheme for Social Worker of De-Notified Communities
description: The "Excellent Work Award Scheme for Social Workers of De-notified Communities" by the Government of Madhya Pradesh awards ₹1,00,000/- to a social worker from De-notified, Nomadic, and Semi-Nomadic communities for outstanding contributions to their social and economic upliftment.

name: Laptop Supply Scheme
description: "Laptop Supply Scheme" by the School Education Department, Government of Madhya Pradesh provides ₹25,000/- for purchasing a laptop to students who score 80% or more in 12th Standard from a Government Higher Secondary School or a Madhya Pradesh Board (MP Board) affiliated school.

name: Mukhyamantri Awas Yojna (HPBOCWWB)
description: The Mukhyamantri Awas Yojna, introduced by the Himachal Pradesh Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HPBOCWWB), provides financial assistance of ₹1,50,000/- to registered worker.

name: INDIRAMMA Widow Pension (Rural)
description: "INDIRAMMA Weavers Pension (Rural)" scheme aims to disburse monthly pensions to widows, irrespective of their age. To be eligible, they should be from a BPL family, be a resident of the district, and not be covered under any other Pension Scheme.

name: Pension Scheme to Widow
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: The scheme is implemented by the Social Welfare Department, aims to provide financial assistance to widows aged between 18-59 years. The scheme offers ₹1,000/- per month to help meet their basic needs, ensuring public assistance for widows in need of support to maintain a dignified life.

name: INDIRAMMA Old Age Pension (Urban)
description: "INDIRAMMA Old Age Pension (Urban)" scheme aims to provide monthly pensions to destitute elderly persons aged 65 years or above with little or no means of subsistence and no family or relative to depend upon. To be eligible, they should be from a BPL family, and be a resident of Andhra Pradesh.

name: Schemes for welfare of School Children belonging to BPL and BC(A) families: Monthly Stipend for BPL Students
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to students from BPL students to support their education. Under this scheme, a monthly stipend is provided to students studying in classes 1 to 12 in Haryana Government schools.

name: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Antyodaya Parivar Suraksha Yojana (DAYALU-II)
description: The aim of this scheme is to provide financial assistance to residents of Haryana in case of accidental death or permanent disability occurred due to stray cattle/animal such as such as cow, bull, oxen, donkey, dog bite, mule, nilgai and buffalo that roam freely.
tags: ['Accidental Death', 'DAYALU-II', 'Dog Bite', 'Financial Assistance', 'Permanent Disability', 'Stay Animals', 'Stray Cattle']

name: Ambedkar International Scholarship - SC
description: The "Ambedkar International Scholarship - SC" Scheme by the Rajasthan Social Justice and Empowerment Department provides financial assistance to meritorious SC students for pursuing Ph.D. studies in foreign universities in Humanities and Social Sciences.

name: Additional Financial Assistance for the Children of Persons Engaged in the Cleaning Profession
description: This scheme aims to provide additional financial assistance of ₹500/- per month to children of individuals working in cleaning/sanitation profession. This assistance is given to students already receiving a scholarship under Post-Matric Scholarship Scheme, ensuring their continued education.

name: Transgender Utthan Kosh - College/Higher/Technical Educational Fees Refund for Transgender Students
description: The scheme aims to promote higher and technical education among transgender individuals by providing financial assistance for their educational expenses. Under this scheme, transgender students receive a refund of their school, college, higher, or technical education fees.

name: Educational Study Scheme
description: The "Educational Study Scheme" provides financial assistance in the form of loans for self-supporting graduate-level courses in professional fields such as Medical, Dental, Engineering, Technology, Pharmacy, Architecture, Nursing, Homeopathy, Veterinary, and similar disciplines.

name: Kisan Parivahan Yojana
description: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to provide financial assistance to farmers for purchasing medium-sized goods vehicles to facilitate the transportation of agricultural produce.

name: Marriage Assistance Scheme (MPBOCWWB)
description: The scheme provides financial assistance for the marriage of a registered female worker herself (including one-time remarriage) and for up to two daughters of a registered worker. The scheme applies to the marriage of the female beneficiary herself and the legal, adopted, or stepdaughter of worker.

name: Transgender Utthan Kosh - Self Employment Programme for Transgender
description: The scheme objective is to provide financial assistance to transgender individuals for self-employment/business establishment. Eligible beneficiaries can receive up to ₹50,000/- or 25% of the project cost.

name: Financial Assistance to SC Students for Pursuing Higher Studies Abroad
description: The scheme aims to support SC students for higher education abroad in fields like Engineering, Sciences, and Humanities. Benefits include up to ₹20,00,000/- for Ph.D. and ₹10,00,000 for Masters, with eligibility criteria including residency and income below ₹8,00,000/-.

name: Transgender Utthan Kosh - Training Programme for Transgender
description: The scheme aims to support the socio-economic development of transgender individuals by providing financial assistance, skill training, and employment opportunities.
tags: ['Employment Opportunity', 'Financial Assistance', 'Skill Development', 'Skill Training', 'Technical Training', 'Transgender', 'Vocational Training']

name: Bhavantar Bharpai Yojana
description: The scheme is implemented by the Department of Horticulture, Government of Haryana, aims to protect horticultural farmers from market price fluctuations and compensate them if they receive low prices for their produce in the market.

name: Financial Assistance to Widower and Unmarried Persons Scheme : For Unmarried
description: The aim of the scheme is to provide Social Security to Unmarried Persons who are unable to sustain themselves from their own sources and are in need of financial assistance from the State.

name: Scheme to Provide Financial Assistance to Farmers for Purchasing Sanedo Agricultural Equipment
description: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to provide financial assistance to farmers for purchasing Sanedo (Mini Tractor) equipment, which enhances efficiency and reduces labor dependency in farming operations.

name: Nari Adalat
state: Ministry of Women and Child Development
description: Nari Adalat, a component of the "Sambal" sub-scheme under Mission Shakti, it aims to provide women with an alternate Grievance Redressal Mechanism for resolving cases of petty nature (harassment, subversion, curtailment of rights or entitlements) faced by them at Gram panchayat level.
tags: ['Affordable Justice', 'Nari Adalat', 'Nyaya Sakhi', 'Women Collectives', 'Women Grievance Redressal']

name: Bhavantar Bharpai Yojana
description: The scheme is implemented by the Department of Horticulture, Government of Haryana, aims to protect horticultural farmers from market price fluctuations and compensate them if they receive low prices for their produce in the market.

name: Free Supply of Text Books
description: The scheme provides textbooks or cash subsidies for textbooks and writing materials to students of Government and Aided Schools. Benefits include financial assistance ranging from ₹550/- to ₹830/- per annum, with additional support for geometry boxes. All students from Nursery to 12th are eligible.

name: Diesel VAT Relief Scheme for Fishermen
description: The "Diesel VAT Relief Scheme for Fishermen" introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, aims to provide financial assistance by subsidizing the VAT levied on high-speed diesel used in fishing boats.

name: Post Matric Scholarship for SC students (Delhi)
description: The scheme "Post Matric Scholarship for SC Students" aims to support SC students financially for post-matriculation studies. Benefits include fee reimbursement and monthly allowances. Intended beneficiaries are SC students with a family income below ₹2,50,000/- annually.

name: Self-Employment Scheme for Unemployed Minority Communities
description: The scheme aims to provide a grant of 25% of the loan amount (for loans ranging from ₹1 lakh to ₹10 lakh) to individuals belonging to minority communities, who are permanent residents of Uttarakhand, for the purpose of self-employment.

name: Maulana Azad Education Finance Foundation Scheme
description: The scheme aims to provide interest-free loans of up to ₹5 lakh to students from minority communities for pursuing higher education in India and abroad.

name: Mukhyamantri Atyant Pichhda Varg Medhavriti Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide ₹10,000/- as a one-time scholarship to extremely backward class students passing class 10th in the first division from the Bihar School Examination Board.

name: Establishment of 1 to 20 Milch Animal Farm
description: The "Establishment of 1 to 20 Milch Animal Farm" scheme introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, provides financial assistance in the form of an interest subsidy to livestock farmers to take up animal husbandry as a sustainable business.

name: Scholarship for Children of Ex-Servicemen for Vocational and Technical Education
description: Under this scheme, a scholarship of ₹15,000 per year is provided to the children of ex-servicemen, from the rank of Sepoy to Havildar, who are pursuing vocational & technical education & have not received scholarship assistance under the Prime Minister's Scholarship Scheme or from any other source.

name: Intensive Castration Scheme
description: The "Intensive Castration Scheme" introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, aims to control the stray animal population by castrating male calves and helps in reducing accidents caused by stray male animals in rural and urban areas.

name: Assistance of Concentrate Feed After Parturition (Scheduled Caste Category)
description: The scheme "Assistance of Concentrate Feed After Parturition (Scheduled Caste Category)" provides 150 kg of BIS Type II concentrate feed to Scheduled Caste Category livestock owners after parturition to support cattle health, increase milk production, and enhance calf development.

name: Assistance of Concentrate Feed for Pregnant Animals (General Category)
description: This scheme provides free BIS type II concentrate feed to pregnant cattle owned by General Category livestock owners in Gujarat to ensure their good health, boost immunity, prevent metabolic diseases, and enhance milk production.

name: BC & EBC Girls Residential +2 High School
description: The scheme aims to provide quality education and holistic development opportunities for girls from backward and extremely backward classes. Free education, accommodation, study material, medical support, and skill development programs are provided.
tags: ['Backward Class', 'Extremely Backward Class', 'Financial Assistance', 'Free Accommodation', 'Girl Student', 'Hostel', 'Vocational Training']

name: Educational Study Scheme

name: Aapki Beti Yojana
description: Under the scheme, financial assistance of ₹2,100/- per year is provided to girls studying in Class 1 to 8 in government schools, belonging to families living below the poverty line (BPL) and whose both or one parent has passed away. Girls studying in Class 9 to 12 receive ₹2,500/- per year.

name: The Goa State Photo Contest And Exhibition Scheme
description: The scheme aims to encourage local youths in photography and photojournalism, providing cash prizes and exhibition opportunities. The scheme offers cash prizes of ₹20,000/-, ₹16,000/-, and ₹12,000/- in each category. Entries from applicants born and residing in Goa are preferred.

name: Employees' Pension Scheme
description: The scheme ensures retirement security for employees covered under the EPF Act, offering monthly pensions, family pensions, and withdrawal benefits. It targets workers in organised sectors, providing financial support post-retirement, during disability, or to dependents after the member’s death.

name: Scheme for Upgradation of Gaushala/ Panjrapole
description: The "Scheme for Upgradation of Gaushala/ Panjrapole"  aims to promote indigenous cow breeds and make cow rearing economically viable.

name: Merit Scholarship: Engineering University
description: The scheme provides ₹1000/- per month to eligible students for pursuing B.E. from a recognized engineering college in Chhattisgarh.  The applicants can either be students who have passed their 10th and 12th standard examinations, or Diploma holders newly admitted to the second year of B.E.

name: Old Age Pension To Handloom Weavers Under Coop. Fold
description: The “Old Age Pension To Handloom Weavers” scheme implemented by the MSME and Textiles Dept., aims to provide monthly financial assistance in the form of pension to a weaver member of a handloom cooperative society.

Girls studying in Class 9 to 12 receive ₹2,500/- per year.

name: The Goa State Photo Contest And Exhibition Scheme

It targets workers in organised sectors, providing financial support post-retirement, during disability, or to dependents after the member’s death.

description: The "Scheme for Upgradation of Gaushala/ Panjrapole"  aims to promote indigenous cow breeds and make cow rearing economically viable.

name: Travel Grants To Goan Authors
description: The objective of the scheme is to enable the Goan writers to come in close contact with the senior writers of a language-region other than their own within India to acquaint them with the writers and the people of that region, and to widen their awareness and sensibility about the country.

name: Rajasthan Varishth Patrakar Samman Yojana
description: Under this scheme, a monthly financial assistance of ₹15,000/- is provided to full-time accredited journalists who are 60 years of age or older & have served continuously for at least 20 years in daily, weekly, fortnightly newspapers, independent publications, electronic media, or news agencies.

name: Bhajan Pakhawaj Workshops
description: The objective of the scheme is to provide knowledge of appropriate and traditional Bhajan Singing and Pakhawaj playing to Bhajan performers through experts from the respective field. Applications are invited by announcement in local print & electronic media. Certificates are awarded to participants.

name: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (Punjab)
description: In this scheme, persons aged between 60 and 79 years receive a pension of ₹200/- per month, while those aged 80 years and above receive ₹500/- per month. The scheme applies only to persons belonging to the Below Poverty Line (BPL) category.

name: Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme (Punjab)
description: The "Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme (IGNDPS)" provides ₹300/- per month to disabled persons (80% or more disability) aged 18 and above. After age 80, the amount increases to ₹500/-. Dwarfs are also eligible.

name: The Goa State Journalist Awards Scheme
description: "The Goa State Journalist Awards Scheme" aims to encourage journalists to publish commendable news items, articles, or reports, fostering mass awareness. It provides awards, including a cash prize of ₹10,000/-, to eligible journalists in Goa.

name: Construction of Water Storage Tanks for Drip Irrigation
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to farmers across Gujarat for constructing water storage tanks to support drip irrigation, with cost-sharing benefits based on farmer category.

name: Travel Grants To Goan Authors
description: The objective of the scheme is to enable the Goan writers to come in close contact with the senior writers of a language-region other than their own within India to acquaint them with the writers and the people of that region, and to widen their awareness and sensibility about the country.

description: Under this scheme, a monthly financial assistance of ₹15,000/- is provided to full-time accredited journalists who are 60 years of age or older & have served continuously for at least 20 years in daily, weekly, fortnightly newspapers, independent publications, electronic media, or news agencies.

name: Bhajan Pakhawaj Workshops
description: The objective of the scheme is to provide knowledge of appropriate and traditional Bhajan Singing and Pakhawaj playing to Bhajan performers through experts from the respective field. Applications are invited by announcement in local print & electronic media. Certificates are awarded to participants.

name: Laado Protsahan Yojana
description: The scheme aims to encourage the birth of girl children in poor families and promote their holistic development. Under this scheme, financial support ₹1,50,000/- is provided in seven installments to the parents or guardians of girls born in Government/authorized Medical Institutions.

name: Scheme for the Award of Scholarship for the Under Graduate Meritorious Students of Various Faculties of Junagadh Agricultural University
description: The "Scheme for the Award of Scholarship for the Under Graduate Meritorious Students of Various Faculties of Junagadh Agricultural University" provides monthly scholarships to students pursuing Under Graduate in various faculties at Junagadh Agricultural University.

name: Pension Scheme for State Agitators Other Than Category of Agitators Who Went to Jail for 7 Days or got Injured during the Uttarakhand State Movement
description: The scheme provides a monthly pension of ₹4,500/- to state agitators not imprisoned for 7 days or injured during the Uttarakhand State Movement, who are not eligible for any other government pension and are not employed in government service.

name: Assistance for Planting Vegetable Crops for Raw and Ripe Mandap
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to farmers in Gujarat for setting up vegetable trellises (Mandap) for raw, semi-ripe, and ripe vegetables, with varying support for General, SC, and ST farmers.

name: Scheme on Promotion of Use of Liquid Fermented Organic Manure (LFOM) for Increasing Organic Carbon in Soil
description: The "Scheme on Promotion of Use of Liquid Fermented Organic Manure (LFOM) for Increasing Organic Carbon in Soil" offers financial assistance to promote the use of Liquid Fermented Organic Manure (LFOM) and enhance organic carbon levels in soil.

name: Scheme to Provide Electric Scooter to Disabled Person
description: The "Scheme to Provide Electric Scooter to Disabled Person" provides financial assistance of up to ₹25,000 for the purchase of electric scooters to eligible persons with orthopedic disabilities.
