description: The "Scheme on Promotion of Use of Liquid Fermented Organic Manure (LFOM) for Increasing Organic Carbon in Soil" offers financial assistance to promote the use of Liquid Fermented Organic Manure (LFOM) and enhance organic carbon levels in soil.

name: Mukhya Mantri Agricultural Mechanization Scheme
description: The "Mukhya Mantri Agricultural Mechanization Scheme" launched by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, offers financial assistance ranging from ₹1,200/- to ₹11,00,000/- to farmers in Gujarat for purchasing agricultural machinery and farm equipment.

name: State Level Awards for Divyang Persons
description: Under this scheme, a cash prize of ₹8,000/-, along with a medal and a certificate of appreciation, is awarded to outstanding individuals in categories such as disabled employees, outstanding sportspersons, and best self-employed service providers.

name: Operation of Sports Hostels
description: The scheme aims to encourage tribal students to participate in sports and prepare them for national & international competitions. Tribal students from Classes 6 to 12 are provided with free accommodation, specialized training, nutritious meals & other necessary facilities in the sports hostels.

name: Organisation of Cultural Programs
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to cultural groups and artists registered with the Department for performing in cultural programs organized during traditional fairs, festivals, regional celebrations within and outside the state, as well as on the occasion of national festivals.

name: State Fisheries Input Scheme
description: The scheme aims to aims to enhance the productivity and income of fish farmers by providing financial support in the form of subsidies on essential fishery inputs such as hand nets, hapa, nets, mini kits, etc.

name: Scholarship for Engineering and Medical Education
description: The scheme aims to support the higher education of dependents of ex-servicemen by providing financial assistance for pursuing engineering, medical, and PhD courses. Under this scheme, annual scholarships are awarded to beneficiaries based on their course of study.

name: Gunavatta Evam Navaachar Nishulk Paathy Pustak Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide free textbooks to all students from Classes 1 to 8 studying in government and government-aided schools, as well as recognized madrasas that follow the state government curriculum.

name: Pandit Dindayal Upadhyay Awas Yojana (Developing Caste Welfare) (EBC)
description: The scheme aims to support Economically Weaker Sections (EWS) by offering financial aid up to ₹1,20,000/- for house construction. This scheme also ensures that Economically Weaker Sections receive support in securing shelter.

name: Operation of Sports Hostels
description: The scheme aims to encourage tribal students to participate in sports and prepare them for national & international competitions. Tribal students from Classes 6 to 12 are provided with free accommodation, specialized training, nutritious meals & other necessary facilities in the sports hostels.

name: Printing and Free Distribution of Sanskrit Textbooks
description: The scheme aims to promote Sanskrit education by providing free Sanskrit textbooks to students studying in Classes 1 to 12. Under this scheme, annual financial assistance ranging from ₹250/- to ₹700/- is provided to each student enrolled in Classes 1 to 12 of Sanskrit schools.

name: Scheduled Tribe/Scheduled Caste Sub Plan
description: The scheme aims to promote fish farming as a sustainable livelihood opportunity among individuals and groups belonging to the Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes.

description: The scheme aims to empower the youth of Uttarakhand by providing free adventure training programs that develop their skills and capabilities through various adventure activities.

name: State Fisheries Input Scheme
description: The scheme aims to aims to enhance the productivity and income of fish farmers by providing financial support in the form of subsidies on essential fishery inputs such as hand nets, hapa, nets, mini kits, etc.

name: Sero Positive Illness Scheme
description: The scheme "Sero Positive Illness Scheme" by the Social Justice and Empowerment Department, Government of Gujarat aims to provide educational scholarships to orphaned and destitute children affected by Sero Positive illness.

name: Self-Employment Scheme for Scheduled Castes and Tribes
description: The scheme aims to support scheduled castes and scheduled tribes families below the poverty line through concessional loans and subsidies for self-employment in various sectors.

name: Training and Tour Unit
description: "Training and Tour Unit" scheme by the Department of Agriculture Extension, Government of Uttarakhand aims to provide agricultural training to farmers, rural youth, and extension workers through university-led programs and field tours.

name: Kailash Darshan Yatra
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to pilgrims from Gujarat undertaking the Kailash Darshan Yatra. To be eligible, the applicant must be a selected pilgrim from Gujarat and submit proof of yatra completion within 90 days. Applications for this scheme are accepted offline.

name: Sindhu Darshan Scheme
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance of ₹15,000/- to pilgrims from Gujarat undertaking the Sindhu Darshan Yatra in Leh-Ladakh, fostering national unity. Intended beneficiaries include native Gujaratis who complete the yatra and apply within 60 days.

name: Varanasi and Amritsar Yatra Scheme
description: This scheme aims to facilitate pilgrimages to Varanasi and Amritsar for individuals belonging to the Scheduled Castes category. The scheme provides financial reimbursement for second-class train travel, enabling eligible beneficiaries to undertake these religious journeys with ease.

name: State Art Exhibition Competition
description: The scheme "State Art Exhibition Competition" by the Sports, Youth and Cultural Activities Department, Government of Gujarat aims to promote fine arts and recognize artistic talents by providing awards and scholarships to artists, art students, and school children across Gujarat.
tags: ['Artist Scholarship', 'Awards', 'Cash Prize', 'Fine Arts Competition', 'State Art Exhibition']

name: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana: Medium Scale Ornamental Fish Rearing Unit (Fresh Water) - Haryana
description: Under this scheme, financial assistance in the form of a subsidy is provided to eligible beneficiaries for setting up infrastructure such as sheds, breeding units, and rearing and culture tanks for ornamental fish.
tags: ['Fish', 'Fish Farmer', 'Fish Production', 'Fish Rearing Unit', 'Fresh Water', 'Ornamental Aquaculture', 'Subsidy']

name: PMMSY: Fish Feed Plants of Production Capacity of at least 100 Ton/Day - Haryana
description: This scheme provides capital subsidy for setting up fish feed plants with a minimum production capacity of 100 tons per day, under the Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY) to general , schedule caste and women beneficiaries .

name: PMMSY: Establishment of New Freshwater Fin Fish Hatcheries-Haryana
description: The scheme aims to support the establishment of new freshwater finfish hatcheries. Through this scheme, financial assistance in the form of subsidies is provided to beneficiaries for setting up these hatcheries.

name: Mill Gate Price Subsidy Scheme
description: The scheme provides 15% subsidy on yarn purchases from NHDC depots to handloom weavers, cooperatives, and NGOs, along with freight reimbursement (1–8.5%). Intended beneficiaries include weavers below the poverty line.

name: PMMSY: Live Fish Vending Centres Scheme - Haryana
description: The scheme aims to support fishers by providing financial assistance for live fish vending centers. A subsidy per unit is provided under PMMSY.

name: Handicraft Mela Participation
description: The scheme enables artisans and handicraft organizations to participate in government-sponsored melas across Gujarat and other states, fostering market access and preserving traditional crafts. Benefits include subsidized stall fees, promotional support, sales opportunities for handmade products.

name: Pashu Palan Yojana (GSKVN)
description: Under this scheme, loans of up to ₹1,00,000 are provided to sanitation workers and their dependents at an interest rate of 6% for self-employment in animal husbandry or related activities.

name: Scheme for the Welfare of Schedule Caste Families in Fisheries Sector: Subsidy on Annual Auction of Notified Waters
description: The objective of the scheme is to provide full-time employment to individuals from Scheduled Caste families in the fisheries sector and uplift their socio-economic status by promoting fish farming through subsidization of fishing contract costs in designated water bodies.

name: Pashupalan (GBCDC)
description: The scheme aims to provide an amount for animal husbandry activities. Low-interest loans are provided to Pashu Palaks.

name: New Akanksha Scheme (Educational Loan) (GTKVN)
description: Under this scheme, education loans are provided at subsidized interest rates to students belonging to Thakor and Koli communities for pursuing graduate and postgraduate studies in fields such as engineering, medical, MBA, and MCA.

name: Foreign Study Loan
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to students from non-reserved categories for pursuing higher studies abroad in medical and post-graduation courses. It offers loans up to ₹15,00,000/- at 4% simple interest per annum to eligible students.

name: Testing Equipment Scheme
description: The Government of Haryana launched the Testing Equipment Assistance Scheme to support Micro and Small Enterprises (MSEs) in enhancing product quality through financial aid for procuring testing equipment.

name: Mahila Samriddhi Yojana (for women only) GNTDNT
description: The scheme aims to create self-employment for women of nomadic and denotified castes and support women entrepreneurs doing independent business. Through this scheme, microfinance is provided to women beneficiaries to pursue a business/occupation of their choice.

description: The scheme aims to provide the best education to meritorious Scheduled Caste students in high-quality residential schools to help them build their careers and improve their living standards.

description: The scheme "Retired Sportsperson Pension Scheme" by the Sports, Youth and Cultural Activities Department, Government of Gujarat aims to ensure financial security to retired state-level medal-winning sportspersons aged above 50 years through monthly pension assistance.

name: Pashupalan (GBCDC)
description: The scheme aims to provide an amount for animal husbandry activities. Low-interest loans are provided to Pashu Palaks.

description: The scheme provides financial support to students from socially and educationally backward classes for higher technical and professional education. It offers loans at concessional interest rates for approved graduate and postgraduate courses like engineering, medical, MBA, MCA, and more.

description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to students from non-reserved categories for pursuing higher studies abroad in medical and post-graduation courses. It offers loans up to ₹15,00,000/- at 4% simple interest per annum to eligible students.

description: The scheme aims to provide the best education to meritorious Scheduled Caste students in high-quality residential schools to help them build their careers and improve their living standards.

name: Pre-Matric Scholarship for the Students of Notified Tribes and Denotified Tribes Castes
description: The scheme supports school education by providing annual scholarships to students from Notified Tribes and Denotified Tribes studying in standards 1st to 10th.

name: Providing Latest Technology to Group of Pottery Artisans (Energy Efficient Kiln)
description: The scheme aims to provide latest technology and equipment to pottery artisans for better productivity, improved quality and reduce health risks. It provides 100% financial assistance for energy-efficient kilns to groups of registered clay artisans and potters in Gujarat state.

name: "Marketing Incentive" under the "Handloom Marketing Assistance" Component of the National Handloom Development Programme
description: The scheme aims to develop and promote marketing channels for handloom products to bring greater visibility to the sector and ensure commensurate remuneration to weavers. It provides Marketing Incentive to eligible handloom agencies for creating conducive conditions for marketing handloom products.

name: Scholarship for Ph.D. Students of Socially and Educationally Backward Classes
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to Socially and Educationally Backward Classes (SEBC) students pursuing M.Phil. or Ph.D. to encourage higher education and research.

name: Providing Latest Technology to Group of Pottery Artisans (Energy Efficient Kiln)
description: The scheme aims to provide latest technology and equipment to pottery artisans for better productivity, improved quality and reduce health risks. It provides 100% financial assistance for energy-efficient kilns to groups of registered clay artisans and potters in Gujarat state.

name: Educational Loan Scheme (GBCDC)
description: The scheme provides financial support to students from socially and educationally backward classes for higher technical and professional education. It offers loans at concessional interest rates for approved graduate and postgraduate courses like engineering, medical, MBA, MCA, and more.

name: Sharodotsav Pandit Nandan Mehta: Plan for Conducting Classical Music Competition and Ceremony
description: The scheme "Sharodotsav Pandit Nandan Mehta: Plan for Conducting Classical Music Competition and Ceremony" aims to promote classical music and percussion by organizing a state-level competition and award ceremony on the death anniversary of Pt. Nandan Mehta, through the provision of cash prizes.

name: "Marketing Incentive" under the "Handloom Marketing Assistance" Component of the National Handloom Development Programme
description: The scheme aims to develop and promote marketing channels for handloom products to bring greater visibility to the sector and ensure commensurate remuneration to weavers. It provides Marketing Incentive to eligible handloom agencies for creating conducive conditions for marketing handloom products.

name: Visvesvaraya PhD Scheme for Electronics and IT: Full Time PhD Candidates
state: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
description: The scheme aims at generating a total of 1000 Full-time PhD Candidates in emerging research areas of Electronic System Design and Manufacturing (ESDM) and IT/IT Enabled Services (ITES) sectors over a period of 5 years.

name: Visvesvaraya PhD Scheme for Electronics and IT: Part Time PhD Candidates
state: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
description: The scheme aims at generating a total of 150 Part-time PhDs in emerging research areas of Electronics System Design & Manufacturing (ESDM) and IT/IT Enabled Services (IT/ITES) sectors over a period of 5 years.

name: Visvesvaraya PhD Scheme for Electronics and IT: Young Faculty Research Fellowships
state: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
description: This fellowship is meant for Young Faculty having regular position at their institution and proven track record in research. Support is provisioned for 50 candidates, for an initial period of support of 2 years, extendible till 5 years based on performance review.

name: Scholarship to Divyang Students (Class 1 to 8)
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance of ₹600/- for students in Class 1 to 5 and ₹960/- for students in Class 6 to 8, to regularly enrolled disable students.

name: Financial Assistance as Interest Subsidy on Home Loan
description: The scheme aims to provide 50% reimbursement of interest on home loans up to ₹1,00,000 for eligible war widows, war bereaved families, war disabled personnel, and attributable peacetime casualties.

name: Coaching Assistance for Pre-preparation for Competitive Exams of ALL INDIA level like IIM, CEPT, NIFT, NLU and IELTS, TOFEL, GRE for going Foreign
description: The scheme aims to assist SEBC and economically backward students in coaching for premier Indian and international exams, the eligible candidates receive up to ₹20,000/- or the actual fee paid.

name: Coaching Sahay for the Preparation of NEET, JEE, GUJCET Examination to both Socially and Educationally Backward Class Trainees/Students and Female Students and Economically Backward Class Students
description: The scheme aims to support Socially and Educationally Backward Class (SEBC) and Economically Backward Class (EBC) students with coaching fee assistance. Up to ₹20,000 or actual fee is provided for one exam preparation.

name: Kishori Balika Yojana- Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to create awareness among adolescent girls aged 14 to 18 years about nutrition, health, and life cycle issues, and also provides supplementary nutrition for 300 days in a year.
tags: ['Adolescent Girls', 'Awareness On Health', 'Awareness On Nutrition', 'Teenage Girl']

name: National Mission on Edible Oil–Oil Palm: Planting Materials
description: The scheme component "Planting Materials" launched under the "National Mission on Edible Oil–Oil Palm" scheme aims to increase oil palm production in the state and reduce dependency on imports through financial assistance to farmers for procuring planting materials.

name: National Mission on Edible Oil- Oil Palm: Nursery
description: The scheme component "Nursery" launched under the "National Mission on Edible Oil–Oil Palm" scheme aims to increase the production of oil palm in the state and reduce dependence on imports through providing subsidy assistance for setting up nurseries for farmers.

name: Inter-Caste / Inter-Religious Marriage Award
description: Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹50,000/- is provided to married couples where, in the case of an inter-caste marriage, one spouse belongs to a Scheduled Caste, and in the case of an inter-religious marriage, both spouses belong to different religions.

name: Assistance in Trellise Mandap for Cultivation of Vegetable Crops
description: The scheme "Assistance in Trellise Mandap for Cultivation of Vegetable Crops" aims to promote structured vegetable farming through the provision of financial assistance for constructing kachha/semi-pucca/pucca trellis mandaps to all farmers across the state.

name: Integrated Horticulture Development Program for Tribal Area Farmers (TASP) HRT-3
description: The scheme "Integrated Horticulture Development Program for Tribal Area Farmers (TASP) HRT-3" by the Agriculture and Co-operation Department, Government of Gujarat, aims to enhance the horticulture sector through financial assistance and subsidies to tribal area farmers across the state.

name: Pre-Matric Scholarship for the Students of Notified Tribes and Denotified Tribes Castes
description: The scheme supports school education by providing annual scholarships to students from Notified Tribes and Denotified Tribes studying in standards 1st to 10th.

name: Mukhyamantri Medhavi Chhatra Puraskar Yojana
description: The scheme aims to encourage academic excellence among students and provides cash prizes to those who secure first, second, or third positions in their graduation or post-graduation studies at the university level.

name: Rishi and Milan Khosla Scholarship Scheme
description: The scheme aims to promote higher education among girl students in the state by providing scholarships to those pursuing their first year of post-graduation in various government colleges across Uttarakhand.

name: Sanskrit Chhatra Pratibha Samman
description: The scheme aims to encourage and motivate students to pursue higher studies in Sanskrit by rewarding those who achieve top positions in the subject at the high school, intermediate, undergraduate, and postgraduate levels.

name: Scholarship on Merit Basis
description: The scheme aims to encourage meritorious students pursuing undergraduate and postgraduate studies at Uttarakhand Sanskrit University by awarding scholarships to those who secure the highest marks in the relevant course, class, or subject.

name: Integrated Dairy Development Scheme Gujarat
description: Under this scheme, tribal women beneficiaries are provided with milch cattle, dairy equipment, and financial assistance of up to ₹90,000 per unit.

name: PMMSY: Construction of  Plant/Storage of Minimum 20 Tonne Capacity - Gujarat
description: The scheme aims to provide financial support for the construction of 20-tonne capacity ice plant/storage units, ensuring hygienic fish storage and improving the income of beneficiaries.

name: PMMSY: Construction of  Plant/Storage of Minimum 30 Tonne Capacity - Gujarat
description: The scheme aims to strengthen fish storage infrastructure for hygienic preservation. Through this scheme, beneficiaries receive financial assistance for constructing 30-tonne capacity plants or storage units.

name: Distribution of Seeds of more productions varieties/ Hybrids varieties Seeds and fertilizer at subsidies etc. to Adivasi farmers in Tribal Area: Castor cake/Neem cake/ Liquid Fermented Organic Manure / Green manure seed (For mix in the soil) Gujarat
description: The scheme aims to help tribal farmers improve their livelihood by increasing agricultural crop production. Through this scheme, subsidies are provided on high-yield and hybrid seeds, fertilizers, and other agricultural inputs to Scheduled Tribe farmers.

name: Distribution of Seeds of more productions varieties/ Hybrids varieties Seeds and fertilizer at subsidies etc. to Adivasi farmers in Tribal Area: Water Carrying Pipe Line (TASP & OTASP) Gujarat
description: The scheme aims to improve the agricultural productivity of Scheduled Tribe farmers through subsidized seeds, fertilizers, and equipment. It provides direct support to tribal farmers for enhancing crop production and livelihood.

name: Distribution of Seeds of more productions varieties/ Hybrids varieties Seeds and fertilizer at subsidies etc. to Adivasi farmers in Tribal Area: Tarpaulin Gujarat
description: The scheme aims to enhance crop production and livelihood. It provides subsidies on seeds, fertilizers, tarpaulins, and other agricultural inputs to Scheduled Tribe farmers.

name: Saksham Scholarship
description: The scheme aims to support meritorious differently-abled students pursuing graduate-level studies in the state by providing them with financial assistance in the form of scholarships.

name: Admission Process in All Government and Non-Government Schools of the State
description: The scheme aims to provide free and accessible education for children from Class 1 to 8 by offering free education and essential learning materials, including books, shoe-bags, and meals, across all government and non-government schools in the state.

name: Shridev Suman State Merit Scholarship
description: The scheme provides monthly scholarship of ₹1,000/- to meritorious students who qualify in eligibility test conducted by SCERT Uttarakhand. The scholarship is awarded to the next 5 students from each development block of Uttarakhand who are not selected for the Dr. Shivanand Nautiyal Scholarship.

name: Girl Education Promotion (Bicycle Scheme)
description: The scheme aims to promote girls' education in the state by providing financial assistance for the purchase of bicycles to girl students studying in Class 9 in government and government-aided secondary schools.

name: PMMSY: Three wheeler with Ice Box including e-rickshaws for fish vending - Gujarat
description: The scheme aims to strengthen fish storage infrastructure for hygienic preservation. Through this scheme, beneficiaries receive financial assistance for a three-wheeler with an Ice Box, including e-rickshaws for fish vending.

name: Cluster Development Scheme
description: The scheme aims to enhance the productivity and competitiveness as well as capacity building of Micro and Small Enterprises through cluster development approach. It provides various assistance including training, subsidies, and marketing facilities to clusters of 25 or more artisans.

name: PMMSY: Support for Acquisition of Deep Sea Fishing Vessels for Traditional Fishermen - Gujarat
description: The scheme aims to strengthen fish storage infrastructure for hygienic preservation. Through this scheme, beneficiaries receive financial assistance for the support for acquisition of deep-sea fishing vessels for traditional fishermen.
tags: ['Construction Of Plant', 'Fish Sellers', 'Storage', 'Support For Acquisition Of Deep Sea Fishing Vessels', 'Traditional Fishermen']

name: PMMSY: Motorcycle with Ice Box - Gujarat
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance for the purchase of motorcycles with ice boxes. Through this scheme, eligible beneficiaries receive subsidies to enhance their livelihood opportunities.

name: Vidhya Sadhana Yojana Gujarat
description: Under this scheme, free bicycles are gifted to girl students across Gujarat to reduce school dropouts among scheduled tribe girls after class 8.

name: Sri Ram Janmabhoomi Shabari Smriti Yatra Sahay Scheme
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to scheduled tribes and tribal communities for pilgrimage to Sri Ram Janmabhoomi in Ayodhya in memory of Maa Shabari. The scheme offers ₹5,000/- financial assistance per pilgrim to enable darshan of Lord Sri Ram for eligible tribal beneficiaries.

name: AYUSH Health and Wellness Centre - Ayushman Bharat Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide accessible, affordable, and holistic healthcare services based on Ayurveda, Yoga, Unani and Homeopathy systems to people of all age groups.

name: Khiladi Protsahan Chhatravriti Yojana
description: The scheme aims to promote sports among talented youth sportspersons aged 14 to 23 years from Uttarakhand by providing a scholarship of ₹2,000/- per month and financial assistance of ₹10,000/- once a year for sports equipment.

name: Funeral Assistance Scheme for Unorganized Workers (Except Construction Workers)
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to heirs of deceased unorganized sector workers for funeral expenses. It offers ₹10,000/- to eligible heirs of e-Shram card holders.

name: Sponsorship Scheme (90% Centrally Funded)
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to children upto age of 18 years, including those who have lost both parents, those whose main earning parent has died, & children who have suffered due to violation of laws, child labor, child trafficking, child marriage & similar circumstances.

name: Kunwar Bai Nu Mameru Yojana Gujarat
description: The scheme aims to provide financial support to ST families during the marriage of girls, providing ₹12,000 per couple as financial assistance to eligible tribal women across the state.

name: Cash Prize to Players and their Coaches for Winning Medals in National and International Competitions
description: The scheme aims to recognize and honor players and their coaches from the state who have achieved remarkable success and won medals at the national and international level in the field of sports. There is a provision to award prize money ranging from a minimum of ₹10,000/- to a maximum of ₹2 crore.

name: Higher Education Assistance Scheme
description: The scheme aims to encourage children of workers and reduce financial burden of education through higher educational assistance. It provides ₹20,000/- for Bachelor of Medicine Bachelor of Surgery admission and ₹10,000/- for other graduate courses to merit students.

name: Documentation And Research Assistantship Scheme
description: The scheme aims to encourage documentation and digitisation of valuable Tiatr-related materials to prevent their loss to posterity. It provides assistance and incentives to holders of such materials and pays honorarium to documentation assistants.

name: National Livestock Mission: Livestock Insurance Scheme - Uttarakhand Livestock Development Board
description: The scheme aims to provide insurance coverage to livestock in order to protect cattle rearers against the loss of their animals due to death, thereby encouraging them to adopt better animal husbandry practices.

name: Assistance to Handloom Artisans - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to provide financial support to disaster-affected handloom artisans for the repair or repurchase of damaged tools, equipment, raw materials, and finished products.

name: Scholarship Scheme for Students Studying in Government Colleges
description: Under this scheme, scholarships of ₹3,000, ₹2,000, and ₹1,000 are provided annually to Science, Commerce, and Arts students to promote higher education.

name: Maitri Prashikshan Karyakram - Uttarakhand Livestock Development Board
description: The scheme aims to enhance livestock productivity and improve  artificial insemination services across the state through the training and capacity building of local youth.

name: Machhali Palan
description: The scheme aims to provide financial support to fishermen for repairing, reconstructing, and replacing damaged boats and nets due to disasters.

name: Financial Assistance to Dramatic Troupes participating in Kala Academy’s Annual Tiatr Competition
description: The scheme aims to encourage non-commercial dramatic troupes participating in Kala Academy’s Annual Tiatr Competition to produce higher quality Tiatrs. It provides financial support for various production aspects, video recording, and expert workshops, benefiting dramatic troupes.

name: Financial Assistance for encouraging production of Traditional Khell-Tiatr
description: The scheme aims to encourage and preserve the traditional Khell-Tiatr folk musical drama of Goa by promoting quality productions. It offers financial assistance and infrastructure support for staging shows, including video documentation, benefiting dramatic troupes and individuals.

name: Promotion of Tiatr Music
description: The scheme aims to encourage individuals to learn blowing instruments crucial for Tiatr music, such as Trumpet & Saxophone, addressing a decline in musicians. It provides financial assistance for tuition and instrument purchase, benefiting youth and other interested persons to preserve Tiatr music.

name: Low Altitude Guide Course
description: The scheme aims to train and certify youth from Uttarakhand as professional low altitude guides and provide them with skill development opportunities to strengthen their role in the state’s tourism sector.

name: Grant for Sex-Sorted Semen to Livestock Farmers
description: The scheme aims to promote breed improvement and increase milk production by encouraging the use of sex-sorted semen for artificial insemination in cows and buffaloes.

name: Operation/implementation of Vidhik Seva Rath
description: The scheme aims to spread legal awareness and provide information about welfare schemes to people in both urban and remote rural areas, ensuring that citizens are informed about their rights and available government benefits.
tags: ['Free Book', 'Legal Awareness', 'Legal Services', 'Mobile Van', 'Vidhik Seva Rath']

name: Enhancement of Spoken English Programme
description: The scheme aims to enhance the spoken English skills of students of Classes 9 to 12 studying in all government schools across the districts of the state of Uttarakhand.

name: Promotion of Acting in Tiatr for School Children
description: The scheme aims to encourage school children to improve their acting abilities in Goan tiatr through organized competitions. It provides cash prizes and certificates to winners in comedy and non-comedy acting categories.

name: 6% Interest Subsidy on Loans taken through Banks for Study Abroad
description: The scheme aims to reduce financial stress for ST students pursuing foreign education by providing up to ₹1,50,000 subsidy on interest for 3 years.

name: Amit Gautam Memorial Scholarship (B.Tech in Electronics Engineering – 4th Year)
description: The scheme aims to support meritorious students pursuing a B.Tech in Electronics Engineering who are in their 4th year of study by providing a one-year scholarship amounting to ₹7,000/-.

name: Hands-on Training and Exposure Visits under Experiential Learning
description: The scheme aims to provide free one-week residential hands-on certificate training programs to undergraduate, postgraduate students, researchers, and faculty members, including accommodation and meals.

name: Scheme To Provide Assistance To Students Seeking Education Outside Goa In Any Field Of Art And Culture
description: The scheme aims to encourage young talents in Goa to achieve the highest possible standard in fields of Art and Culture by providing financial support for training outside the State. Assistance is provided to eligible students for basic or advanced education in art.

name: One-day Seminar on Vedic Mathematics
description: The scheme aims to provide a common platform for officers, teachers, and students from universities, colleges, schools, and other departments to actively participate and gain knowledge about the simplified curriculum of Vedic Mathematics and its easy-to-apply methods.

name: Exhibition of Books on Tiatr, Its Song and Music
description: The scheme aims to help Roman Script Konkani writers and publishers who face difficulties in marketing their books related to Tiatr, its song and music, while promoting Tiatr culture among enthusiasts. The scheme provides bulk purchase of books at 80% of the fixed rate and organizes book exhibition.

name: Divisional Tripartite Competition
description: The scheme aims to promote theatrical arts and drama performances across Gujarat by organizing competitive events at divisional and state levels. Individual performers and theatre organizations receive cash prizes based on their performance rankings in state-level competitions.

name: Ashramshalas (Grant in Aid)
description: The scheme aims to provide schooling, boarding and lodging to Scheduled Tribe students at a single location, enabling better employment opportunities and competitive equality with other sections of society. The scheme offers residential education with complete support including free education.

name: Establishment and Operation of STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics) Laboratories
description: The scheme aims to establish STEM laboratories in schools across Uttarakhand to provide students of classes 6 to 12 with hands-on science, technology, engineering, and mathematics learning opportunities and strengthen their practical understanding of scientific concepts.

name: Empowering Schedule Tribe/Schedule Caste Communities Using Information And Communication Technology Tools
description: The scheme aims to provide Information Technology related trainings free of cost to the Schedule Tribe (ST) and Schedule Caste (SC) communities. Benefits include basic computer skills and job-oriented Information Technology training courses, intended for citizens, students, local youth, etc.

name: Training Programme for Entrepreneurship Development in Biotechnology
description: The scheme aims to train youth in biotechnology and develop entrepreneurial skills by providing technical knowledge, mentorship, and guidance to help them initiate biotech startups.

name: Scheme To Provide Grant To The Institution(s)/Individual(s) For Long Term Project In The Field Of Art And Culture
description: The scheme aims to give financial support to institution(s)/individual(s) involved in long term projects in the field of Art and Culture. It provides a maximum grant of ₹5,00,000/- per annum to eligible organizations and individuals, while also encouraging young talent and offering scholarships.

name: Science Communication and Popularization
description: The scheme aims to promote scientific thinking and awareness among citizens by providing support and funding to educational institutions, R&D organizations, and NGOs to organize science communication activities.

name: Free Uniforms for Students
description: This scheme Launched on 1 July 2004 with the aims to ensure regular attendance and continuity in education by offering uniform assistance to both boys and girls enrolled in Classes 1 to 8.

name: Goa State Logistics and Warehousing Incentives Scheme: Subsidy Towards Annual Interest Rate Payable On Loans
description: The subsidy aims to support the logistics and warehousing sector by reimbursing 50% of the annual interest paid on construction loans. The benefit is capped at ₹25,00,000/- (Indian Rupees Twenty-five Lakhs) annually per project and is available for up to 05 consecutive years for eligible entities.

name: Dr. A.N. Mukhopadhyay Needy Student Fund (B.Sc. Agriculture - Final Year Student)
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance of ₹25,000/- per year to meritorious & needy students pursuing B.Sc. Agriculture course in their final year of study, based on their genuine financial need, thereby helping to reduce their economic burden & support the continuation of their education.

name: Priyank Pathak Scholarship for B.Sc. Agriculture (4th Year) Students
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to meritorious students pursuing a B.Sc. in Agriculture who are in their fourth year of study, by awarding them a monthly scholarship of ₹ 800/- for one year.

name: Pradhan Mantri Anusuchit Jaati Abhyuday Yojana (PMAJAY): Skill Development
description: The scheme aims to generate additional employment opportunities and reduce poverty among Scheduled Castes through skill development. Benefits include various skill training programs of varying duration.

name: Development of Manures & Fertilizers: Assistance for Construction/Installation of Vermi-Compost Units
description: The "Vermi-compost Units" component of the scheme aims to convert available on-field and farm waste material into chemical-free farm resources as farm input for organic farming through vermicomposting processes. The payment of the sanctioned subsidy is through Electronic Clearance System (ECS).

name: Training/Capacity Building Programmes/Research work on Remote Sensing and GIS Applications
description: The scheme aims to strengthen scientific and technical capacity of researchers, students, and government personnel in the field of Remote Sensing and Geographic Information System (GIS) applications by providing training, conducting capacity-building programmes, and supporting research initiatives.

name: Compensation for Crop Damage Caused by Wildlife (in Revenue and Forest Villages)
description: The scheme aims to provide timely financial assistance to farmers for crop damage caused by wildlife, assessed and compensated within 30 working days as per revenue book circular guidelines.

name: Kalakar Kritadnyata Nidhi: Pandemics
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to aged and needy Goan artists who have lost the source of income due to the pandemic. The scheme provides relief in the form of financial assistance amounting to a min. of ₹5,000/- (lumpsum) up to a max. of ₹10,000/- (lumpsum) to eligible artists.

name: Bhagwan Birsa Munda Lakshya Siddhi Yojana
description: The scheme provides financial assistance, in the form of a Scholarship, proportionate to the fees paid by Scheduled Tribe students at the Higher Secondary School Certificate (HSSC) level in order to take offline coaching assistance through reputed institutions for preparation for NEET & JEE.

name: Mukhyamantri Bal Hridaya Upchar Yojana
description: The scheme provides financial assistance ranging from ₹25,000/- to ₹1,00,000/- for treatment, covering 07 identified heart diseases in children. Key features include covering costs for treatment at recognized government or private hospitals.

name: Manav Garima Yojna DCW (Minority)
description: The scheme aims to enable minority persons to become self-employed through business toolkits and support. Under this scheme, business tool-kits are provided to eligible persons from such groups, so they can set up small businesses.
tags: ['Economically Backward Class', 'Educationally Backward Class', 'Self-employed', 'Small Business', 'Tool Kit']

name: Mukhyamantri Sudharit Kamdhenu Scheme
description: The scheme aims to help the farmers to get financial assistance for the purchase of cross bred cows, improved she buffaloes and cows of indigenous breeds namely Sahiwal, Gir, Red Sindhi, Rathi and Tharparkar for their Dairy Unit, to promote self employment in the Dairy Sector.

name: ST Girl Child Literacy Incentive Amount - Class 11th
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to Scheduled Tribe girl students of Madhya Pradesh enrolled in Class 11 to encourage them to continue their education and prevent dropouts.

name: Saral Bijli Bill Scheme
description: The scheme offers free domestic connections and a fixed monthly charge to ensure easy electricity access for eligible beneficiaries.

name: Scheme for Persons with Benchmark Disability Requiring High Support
description: The scheme aims to promote economic self-reliance and ensure the well-being of persons with benchmark disabilities requiring high support. It provides a one-time financial assistance of ₹40,000/- to eligible applicants who are bonafide residents of Goa and belong to the EWS Category.

name: Registration for Crop Procurement
description: The scheme aims to ensure fair crop prices for farmers by facilitating government procurement and provides easy online registration for landholding farmers to sell their crops at minimum support price.

name: Sanitary Napkin Distribution - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to promote menstrual hygiene and prevent reproductive tract infections among adolescent girls aged 10 to 19 years in Uttarakhand by providing sanitary napkins at a nominal cost of ₹6/-, available through all ASHA workers across the state.

name: Raah-Veer Yojana
description: The scheme encourages citizens to help road accident victims during emergencies by providing a ₹25,000 incentive to individuals who save lives through timely medical assistance.

name: Eja-Boi Shagun Yojana
description: The scheme aims to promote the safe health and well-being of mothers and newborns by encouraging institutional deliveries and ensuring that mothers stay in government hospitals for at least 48 hours after childbirth.

name: Immunization Programme - Uttarakhand
description: This initiative aims to protect every child from preventable, life-threatening diseases by providing free and timely vaccination as per the National Immunization Schedule.

name: Nishulk Swasthya Jaanch Yojana - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to ensure accessible, affordable and quality healthcare services for all citizens of Uttarakhand by providing free diagnostic tests across government healthcare facilities.

name: Hybrid Chilli Production Program
description: The scheme aims to provide self-employment opportunities and increase income for Scheduled Caste farmers living below the poverty line by promoting hybrid chilli cultivation.

name: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Sahkarita Kisan Kalyan Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide interest-free loans to farmers and self-help groups for agricultural and non-agricultural activities to promote self-employment and strengthen the rural economy.

name: Mukhyamantri Ghasyari Kalyan Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide affordable and nutritious packed silage and total mixed animal feed to livestock farmers, especially women, in the remote hilly areas of Uttarakhand. Under this scheme, silage is made available to livestock farmers at a subsidized rate of ₹2.75 per kg.

name: Pradhan Mantri Virasat ka Samvardhan
description: PM VIKAS is a Central sector scheme that focuses on socio-economic empowerment of six notified minorities in the country through skilling & training, women leadership & empowerment and education. The scheme integrates erstwhile skilling & education schemes of the Ministry of Minority Affairs.
tags: ['Education Of School Dropouts', 'Minorities', 'Skill Development', 'Socio-economic Empowerment', 'Women Entrepeneurship']

name: Award of Cash Incentive to the Toppers at Regional Level and Students Scoring Centum in the Subjects Involving Theory in Secondary School Leaving Certificate/Secondary School Certificate/Intermediate/Higher Secondary Public Examinations in Government Schools in the Union Territory of Puducherry
description: The scheme aims to award cash incentives to encourage students in their education by recognizing top three regional rank holders and those scoring centum in theory subjects in Secondary School Leaving Certificate/Secondary School Certificate/Intermediate/Higher Secondary Exams in Govt. Schools.

name: District Plan: Inter-Village Road Construction Scheme on Contributory Basis
description: The scheme aims to facilitate the easy and timely transportation of sugarcane from farms to purchasing centers and sugar mills by improving inter-village road connectivity in sugarcane-growing areas.

name: Tribals Development Plan: Motor Driving Training [Light & Heavy Vehicles]
description: The scheme aims to provide full financial coverage for motor driving training, including courses for Light Motor Vehicles and Heavy Motor Vehicles, specifically recognizing Goa’s future in the transport sector. It benefits eligible Tribal families in Goa whose annual income is below ₹1,20,000/-.

name: Various Training and Support Schemes of Kisan Vigyan Kendra - Veer Chandra Singh Garhwali Uttarakhand University of Horticulture and Forestry
description: The scheme aims to enhance the knowledge, skills, and productivity of farmers in Uttarakhand by providing them with the latest technical training in agriculture, horticulture, and forestry.

name: Tea Development Programme in the Hilly Districts of Uttarakhand - Uttarakhand Tea Development Board
description: The scheme aims to promote tea cultivation in the mountainous regions of Uttarakhand, providing sustainable employment, optimal utilization of barren and unused land, and economic upliftment of local farmers.

name: Grant For Oru Kala Pooja
description: The scheme aims to provide annual financial assistance to Hindu Religious Institutions situated in the Union Territory of Puducherry that have poor resources. It benefits the temple authorities by covering expenses associated with the performance of Oru Kala Pooja, Current Consumption Charges, etc.

name: District Plan: Inter-Village Road Construction Scheme on Contributory Basis
description: The scheme aims to facilitate the easy and timely transportation of sugarcane from farms to purchasing centers and sugar mills by improving inter-village road connectivity in sugarcane-growing areas.

name: Grid Connected Rooftop Solar Power Plant Scheme - Uttarakhand Renewable Energy Development Agency
description: The scheme aims to promote the adoption of rooftop solar energy among domestic consumers in Uttarakhand by providing financial support and enabling them to generate clean, renewable electricity, reduce their electricity bills through net metering.

name: Tourist Guide Certification Scheme
description: The scheme aims to train and certify Goan youth as tourist guides through Basic and Advanced modules. It reimburses fees for the Basic course and sponsors the Advanced curriculum, creating employment and entrepreneurial opportunities in Goa’s tourism sector.

name: Grant Scheme for Cultivation of Aromatic Plants - Centre for Aromatic Plants
description: The scheme aims to encourage farmers to adopt the cultivation of commercially valuable aromatic crops such as lemongrass, citronella, palmarosa, khus, damask rose, mint (except Japanese mint), geranium, black cumin, rosemary, bay leaf, timur & sandalwood by providing financial assistance to them.

name: Aromatic Awareness Programme - Centre for Aromatic Plants
description: The scheme aims to raise awareness about aromatic plants and their benefits, and to provide guidance on cultivation practices suitable to different agricultural climates.

name: Financial Assistance For Renovation And Special Repair Works To Hindu Religious Institutions Situated In Economically Weaker Section Areas / Adi-Dravidar Colonies
description: The scheme aims to provide one-time financial assistance of ₹2,50,000/- for renovation and special repairs, specifically targeting the purchase of building materials. The intended beneficiaries are Hindu religious institutions situated in Economically Weaker Section Areas or Adi-Dravidar Colonies.

name: Dr. B.R. Ambedkar’s Yatra Scheme to visit the places connected with Dr. B.R. Ambedkar’s life in India
description: The scheme aims to assist the people who want to visit the places connected with Dr. B.R. Ambedkar’s life in India. It provides comprehensive financial assistance, with all expenses for the tour programme fully borne by the Department, targeting SC/ST applicants of Puducherry.

name: Special Incentive Scheme for Women of Tharu, Boksa and Other Tribes (For Training and Marketing)
description: The scheme aims to empower tribal women artisans through specialized training and marketing opportunities and ensures the provision of financial assistance for travel, logistics, and stall rent for participating artisans.
tags: ['Boksa Tribe', 'Handloom Exhibition', 'Marketing Promotion', 'Tharu Tribe', 'Training Incentive', 'Tribal Women']

name: Uttarakhand Mega Industrial and Investment Policy - 2021
description: The scheme aims to promote large-scale industrial development and investment in the state of Uttarakhand by creating a favourable business environment, encouraging capital investment, and generating employment opportunities.

name: Tea Tourism - Uttarakhand Tea Development Board
description: The scheme aims to promote tea tourism in Uttarakhand by attracting visitors to tea gardens and factories, creating local jobs, and supporting the state’s tea industry.

name: Employment Subsidy Scheme, 2017
description: The scheme aims to create an environment conducive for attracting investment in Goa, incentivise existing units, and boost local employment. It provides a subsidy based on the percentage of Goan employees hired, restricting reimbursement to ₹7,000/- per Goan employee per month.

name: Financial Assistance for ANM/GNM/Technical Courses
description: The scheme aims to provide assistance to the youths of the Tea Tribes and Adivasi Community for training in job-assured technical and professional Diploma and Degree courses. It supports training for courses like ANM, GNM, and Para-Medical, with a minimum duration of one year.

name: Grants To Patients Suffering From Tuberculosis/Cancer And Other Major Diseases
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance for medical treatment to patients suffering from Tuberculosis, Cancer, and other major diseases. It provides a one-time financial grant to patients of the Tea Tribes and Adivasi community.

name: Establishment of Vermicompost Units
description: The scheme aims to promote sustainable agriculture and organic farming by providing financial assistance for setting up vermicompost units to farmers and women self-help groups.

name: Very Dense Apple Plantation Scheme
description: The scheme aims to promote intensive apple cultivation among farmers by establishing modern orchards with high-yielding varieties and providing financial assistance through a 60% subsidy on saplings, thereby enhancing productivity and increasing farmers’ income.

name: The Goa State Incentives to Encourage Investments Scheme
description: The scheme aims to create sustainable employment, accelerate investment, and support environmentally sustainable industrial development in Goa. It provides financial assistance and incentives under separate target schemes to new and existing Micro, Small, Medium, and Large manufacturing units.

name: Incentives To Encourage Purchases From Local Suppliers Scheme
description: The scheme aims to encourage consumption through local purchases and support the economies of ancillary units, local Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises, and traders. It provides a reimbursement of 2% (up to ₹5,00,000/- annually) on eligible local purchases to eligible manufacturing units in Goa.

name: Financial Assistance For Renovation And Special Repair Works To Hindu Religious Institutions Situated In Economically Weaker Section Areas / Adi-Dravidar Colonies
description: The scheme aims to provide one-time financial assistance of ₹2,50,000/- for renovation and special repairs, specifically targeting the purchase of building materials. The intended beneficiaries are Hindu religious institutions situated in Economically Weaker Section Areas or Adi-Dravidar Colonies.

name: Greenhouse Construction
description: The scheme aims to promote protected cultivation of vegetables and flowers by encouraging farmers to adopt greenhouse technology through substantial financial assistance and support, thereby increasing productivity, improving crop quality, and enhancing farmers’ income.

name: Map Simplification Process
description: The scheme aims to provide an efficient online system for landowners in Haridwar district to get approval for their residential and commercial property maps quickly and easily, ensuring transparency and reducing delays.

name: Deen Dayal Antyodaya Yojana - National Urban Livelihoods Mission (DAY-NULM): Self-Help Group - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to empower urban poor women in Uttarakhand by promoting the formation of self-help groups, improving their livelihoods, and supporting them in income-generating and self-employment activities through financial incentives, bank loans, and government subsidies.

name: Simon Sing Horo Special Post-Matric Scholarship
description: The scheme aims to provide a one-time incentive of ₹10,000/- to students of the Tea Tribes and Adivasi Community who have cleared High School Leaving Certificate or Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate examinations during the current year.

name: Providing Model Maps for Residential Construction
description: It aims to provide landowners in Haridwar district with model maps for residential construction according to the size of their plots.

name: Employment Subsidy Scheme, 2017
description: The scheme aims to create an environment conducive for attracting investment in Goa, incentivise existing units, and boost local employment. It provides a subsidy based on the percentage of Goan employees hired, restricting reimbursement to ₹7,000/- per Goan employee per month.

name: Financial Assistance for ANM/GNM/Technical Courses
description: The scheme aims to provide assistance to the youths of the Tea Tribes and Adivasi Community for training in job-assured technical and professional Diploma and Degree courses. It supports training for courses like ANM, GNM, and Para-Medical, with a minimum duration of one year.

name: Grants To Patients Suffering From Tuberculosis/Cancer And Other Major Diseases
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance for medical treatment to patients suffering from Tuberculosis, Cancer, and other major diseases. It provides a one-time financial grant to patients of the Tea Tribes and Adivasi community.

name: Venture Capital Fund for Scheduled Castes
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: The scheme aims to promote entrepreneurship among Scheduled Caste individuals by providing concessional finance. Benefits include investment ranging from ₹10,00,000/- to ₹15,00,00,000/- as debt or equity for eligible Private Limited or Public Limited companies.

name: Scheme for Cottage and Village Industries (Composite Loan Scheme)
description: The scheme aims to extend composite financial assistance (term loan and/or working capital loan) to Artisans, Village and Cottage Industries, and Micro Enterprises promoted by residents of Puducherry. Benefits include loans up to ₹25,00,000/- per unit.

name: Top Class Education For Students With Disabilities
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: A scholarship scheme by DoEPwDs for Students with Disabilities (SwDs) pursuing studies beyond class 12th admitted in a full-time course in one of the 'notified institutions'.

name: Pragati Scholarship Scheme For Girl Students (Technical Degree)
description: A scholarship scheme by MoE for Girl Students admitted in 1st or 2nd Year of the technical degree course in an AICTE approved institution. The benefits are provided for max. 4 years for first-year admitted students and max. 3 years for second-year admitted students through lateral entry.

name: Swachh Bharat Mission – Grameen PHASE I
description: The scheme aims to eliminate open defecation and improve rural sanitation by supporting toilet construction and promoting usage among poor and marginalized rural households.

name: National Overseas Scholarship For Scheduled Caste Etc. Candidates
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: A scholarship scheme by MoSJE for regular, full-time students from Scheduled Castes, Denotified Nomadic and Semi Nomadic Tribes, Landless Agricultural Labourers and Traditional Artisans; to obtain higher education viz., Master degree or Ph.D courses by studying abroad

name: Pragati Scholarship Scheme For Girl Students (Technical Diploma)
description: A scholarship scheme by AICTE for Girl Students admitted in 1st or 2nd Year of the technical diploma course in an AICTE approved institution. The benefits are provided for a period of max. of 3 years for first-year students and a max. of 2 years for second-year admitted students (later entry).

name: PM POSHAN - Prime Minister's Overarching Scheme For Holistic Nourishment
description: PM POSHAN is a centrally sponsored scheme by the Department of School Education & Literacy, Ministry of Education. Under this scheme, one hot cooked meal will be provided to the children studying in Government and Government – aided schools. The Scheme is implemented by the Ministry of Education.

name: Top Class Education For Scheduled Caste Students
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: A scholarship scheme by Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment for Scheduled Caste students pursuing studies beyond class 12th admitted in a full-time course in one of the notified institutions. The total annual family income from all sources must be less than or equal to Rs. 8.00 lakh.

name: National Youth Corps
description: A volunteership scheme by Ministry of Youth Affairs And Sports to tap the potential of the disciplined and dedicated youth In the age group of 18 to 29 years who have the inclination and spirit to engage in nation building exercises, to serve up to two years in Nation Building activities.

name: NBCFDC General Loan Scheme
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: A general loan scheme by the Ministry of Social Justice for Indian citizens from backward classes for various income-generating activities. Loan up to ₹15 Lakh per beneficiary for pursuing income-generating activities.

name: SVAMITVA Yojana (Survey of Villages and Mapping with Improvised Technology in Village Areas)
description: SVAMITVA, a Central Sector scheme of Ministry of Panchayati Raj to provide ‘Record of Rights’ to village household owners with issuance of legal ownership cards (Property cards/Title deeds) to the property owners by mapping of land parcels using drone technology.

name: Health Minister’s Discretionary Grant
description: A health scheme by Ministry of Health & Family Welfare for financially poor patients to defray a part of the expenditure on Hospitalization/treatment in Government Hospitals,for life threatening diseases covered under Rashtriya Arogya Nidhi (RAN), in cases where free medical facilities aren't there.

name: PM POSHAN - Prime Minister's Overarching Scheme For Holistic Nourishment
description: PM POSHAN is a centrally sponsored scheme by the Department of School Education & Literacy, Ministry of Education. Under this scheme, one hot cooked meal will be provided to the children studying in Government and Government – aided schools. The Scheme is implemented by the Ministry of Education.

name: AICTE-INAE Travel Grant Scheme For Engineering Students From AICTE Approved Engineering College/Institution
description: A Travel Grant Scheme by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and by the Indian National Academy of Engineering (INAE), for the students from AICTE approved Engineering College/institutions. The scheme aims at enhancing the quality of engineering education in the country.

name: Coir Udyami Yojana
state: Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
description: The scheme "Coir Udyami Yojana" by the Coir Board, Ministry of MSME, Government of India, aims to modernize the coir industry and generate rural employment. It offers credit-linked financial assistance to establish coir units by eligible applicants.

name: Post Office Monthly Income Scheme
description: POMIS is an investment scheme recognized and validated by the Ministry of Finance. It is one of the highest-earning schemes with an interest rate of 6.6%. The interest in this scheme is disbursed monthly. After opening a POMIS account, individuals can invest a minimum amount of ₹1500.

name: National Scheme Of Welfare Of Fishermen
state: Ministry of Fisheries,Animal Husbandry and Dairying
description: The National Scheme of Welfare of Fishermen provides financial assistance to fishermen. They can use these for constructing houses and community halls for both recreation and work purposes. Further, through the amount availed under this scheme, fishermen can install tube wells.

name: Post Graduate Indira Gandhi Scholarship For Single Girl Child
description: A scholarship scheme by the University Grants Commission for Girl students who are admitted in the first year of PG courses in any designated university or a postgraduate college, and happen to be the only girl child in the family. The amount of fellowship is ₹ 36,200/- per annum.

name: National Scheme Of Incentive To Girls For Secondary Education
description: The National Scheme of Incentive to Girls for Secondary Education promotes the girl child's enrolment of 14-18 years age group at secondary stage, who passes class 8th and subsequently drops out for various socio-economic reasons.

name: Swami Vivekananda Single Girl Child Fellowship for Research in Social Sciences
description: A fellowship scheme by the University Grants Commission (UGC) for Single Girl Child for research in Social Sciences with an aim to compensate for direct costs of higher education, especially for such girls who happen to be the only girl child in their family.

name: Integrated Social Security Scheme - Women In Distress
description: ISSS (Integrated Social Security Scheme) is a State Sponsored Scheme by the Social Welfare Department of the Govt. of Jammu and Kashmir where financial assistance is provided to Old Age Persons, Widows, Divorcees, Women in Distress, Transgenders, and Physically Handicapped Persons.

name: DPIIT Internship Scheme
description: DPIIT has introduced an internship scheme for students pursuing Under Graduate/Post Graduate degrees or Research Scholars enrolled in recognized universities/Institutions within India or abroad. The applicants can choose the  period of their choice ranging from one/two/three months.

name: Dr. D.S. Kothari Research Grant For Newly Recruited Faculty Members
description: The scheme "Dr. D.S. Kothari Research Grant for Newly Recruited Faculty Members" is a research grant scheme by the University Grants Commission (UGC), Department of Higher Education (DoHE). The purpose of the research grant is to provide opportunities to regularly appointed faculty members.

name: Krishonnati Yojana - Sub Mission On Seed And Planting Material (SMSP)
state: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
description: The Sub-Mission on Seeds and Planting Material (SMSP) aims to increase the production of certified / quality seed, increase SRR, upgrade the quality of farm-saved seeds, strengthen the seed multiplication chain, promote new technologies and methodologies in seed production, processing, testing, etc.

name: National Agriculture Market
state: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
description: Launched on 14th April 2016, e-NAM is a pan-India electronic trading platform that links existing mandis to create a unified online market for agricultural commodities, promoting “One Nation One Market” and enabling transparent, efficient, and nationwide agri-trade.

name: Free Education For Sports Medal Winners / Participants Of National/ International Events
description: The scheme of "Free Education for Sports Medal Winners / Participants of National/ International Events" is introduced by UGC, to provide financial assistance to the medal winners\ elite sports persons studying in universities/colleges leading to all the full-time regular courses.

name: Post Graduate Merit Scholarship Scheme For University Rank Holders At Under-Graduate Level Applicable
description: UGC, Dept. of Higher Education introduced a Post-Graduate Merit Scholarship Scheme for University rank holders both in General and Honours Courses at the UG level. The scholarship may be tenable for a period of two years.

name: Nikshay Poshan Yojana
description: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Government of India has announced the scheme for incentives for nutritional support to TB patients. This scheme will be called “Nikshay Poshan Yojana”.

name: Integrated Social Security Scheme - Pension For Physically Challenged Persons
description: ISSS-PPCP is a State Sponsored Scheme by the Social Welfare Dept. of the Govt. of J&K wherein financial assistance is provided to Physically Challenged Person who have meager support or no source of livelihood. A pension of ₹1000 per pensioner per month is deposited into their bank account.

name: Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme
description: The "Lakshmir Bhandar" scheme is a flagship program to provide financial assistance to women from economically weaker sections of society, for the empowerment of women in the age group of 25-60 years, and enrolled in ‘Swasthya Sathi’.

name: Savitribai Phule Scholarship For V.J.N.T. And S.B.C. Girl Students Studying In 5th To 7th Standard
description: Savitribai Phule Scholarship is a Scholarship Scheme by the Social Justice and Special Assistance Dept., Govt. of Maharashtra, to encourage the enrollment and to decrease the dropout ratio of Girl Students of Maharashtra from Vimukta Jati and Nomadic Tribes and Special Backward Classes.
tags: ['Pre-Matric', 'SBC', 'Scholarship', 'Special Backward Classes', 'Vimukta Jati And Nomadic Tribes', 'VJNT']

name: Chief Minister Samagra Gramya Unnayan Yojana
description: A 5-year mega-mission called Chief Minister Samagra Gramya Unnayan Yojana (CMSGUY) was launched in the Financial Year(FY) 2016-17, which is scheduled to culminate in the FY 2021-22, coinciding with 75 years of India's Independence.

name: Kalinga Sikhya Sathi Yojana
description: "Kalinga Sikhya Sathi Yojana (KSSY)" is an Educational Loan Scheme by the Department of Higher Education, Government of Odisha with the aim to bring down the financial burden on the parents of students who want to move forward with higher education.

name: Mukhyamantri Baristha Bunakar and Karigara Sahayata Yojana
description: Mukhyamantri Baristha Bunakar and Karigara Sahayata Yojana is a welfare scheme initiated by the Handlooms, Textiles and Handicrafts Department, Government of Odisha to provide financial assistance to elderly individuals involved in weaving and craft work, who may face economic difficulties.
tags: ['Baristha Bunakar', 'Financial Assistance', 'Karigara Sahayata', 'Senior Artisans And Weavers']

name: Mukhyamantri Bayan Jyoti Yojana
description: The Scheme will be implemented "Mukhyarrantri Bayan Jyoti Yojana" (MBJY) under Chief Minister's Special Package for Handloom weavers.

name: Pension To The Disabled Person
description: The objective of the pension to the disabled person scheme is providing a pension to disabled persons is multifaceted, but generally centers around promoting social welfare, equity, and inclusivity.

name: Gopabandhu Sikhya Sahayata Yojana
description: The "Gopabandhu Sikhya Sahayata Yojana" scheme was launched as an endeavor to make higher education inclusive and to increase the gross enrollment ratio. The scheme aims to further widen access to higher education for students belonging to underprivileged sections of society.

name: Scholarship For Cadets Of Rashtriya Indian Military College (RIMC), Dehradun
description: The objective of the Scheme is to provide financial assistance to Mizo students permanently residing in the States of studying at RIMC, Dehradun, to enable them to qualify and joint National Defence Academy and further to the Armed Forces. The scheme is 100% funding from the State Plan Fund

name: Bidya Lakshmi Loan
description: "Bidya Lakshmi" aims to provide education loans for higher studies to children of Assam State Government employees. Benefits include loans up to ₹10,00,000/- at 4% interest, with subsidies for eligible candidates.

name: Scholarship For Cadets Of Rashtriya Indian Military College (RIMC), Dehradun
description: The objective of the Scheme is to provide financial assistance to Mizo students permanently residing in the States of studying at RIMC, Dehradun, to enable them to qualify and joint National Defence Academy and further to the Armed Forces. The scheme is 100% funding from the State Plan Fund

name: Bidya Lakshmi Loan
description: "Bidya Lakshmi" aims to provide education loans for higher studies to children of Assam State Government employees. Benefits include loans up to ₹10,00,000/- at 4% interest, with subsidies for eligible candidates.

name: Self Employment Scheme
description: Under this scheme, Subsidies will be provided to the religious minority communities with the help of Nationalized / Scheduled banks to start or improve a small-scale handicraft industry, service sector,  and agro-based activities.

name: Financial Assistance To Poor & Needy Widow Women
description: "Financial Assistance to Poor & Needy Widow Women" is a scheme by the Department of Social Welfare, Govt. of Manipur. The objective of the scheme is to provide social security by way of financial assistance to widows in the age group of 18-40 years.

name: Tailoring Training To Scheduled Caste & Backward Classes Widows/Destitute Women/Girls
description: The aim of the scheme is to enable Scheduled Caste Widows/girls/destitute women for self-employment. A stipend of Rs.600/- P.M. and raw material costing Rs.300/- per month per trainee is given to a trainee for getting training from the nearest Kalyan Kendar run by this department.

name: Arunachal Pradesh State Stipend Scheme
description: Under this scheme, provide financial support to scheduled tribe (ST) students pursuing higher and technical education through stipends and book grants.

name: Pension to Widows and Destitute Women
description: Under this scheme, widows and destitute women aged 18 years and above are eligible for a pension if they are domiciles of Haryana and have been residing in the state for at least one year at the time of application submission.

name: Farmer Pension Scheme
description: The scheme aims to provide financial support to elderly farmers residing in the state of Uttarakhand. Under this scheme, a monthly pension of ₹1200/- is provided to farmers who are above 60 years of age, own up to 2 hectares of land, and cultivate their own land.

name: Nirman Shramik Safety Kit Yojana
description: "Nirman Shramik Safety Kit Yojana" is a scheme by the Department of Labour, Employment, Training & Skill Development Govt of Jharkhand. The scheme provides a direct cash transfer of ₹ 1,000/- for purchasing a branded helmet and a pair of safety shoes.

name: Sardar Patel Awas Yojana
description: Sardar Patel Awas Yojana (SPAY) is a housing scheme launched by the government of Gujarat in India to provide affordable housing to economically weaker sections (EWS) and low-income groups (LIG) of society.

name: Sikkim Unmarried Women Pension Scheme
description: The scheme “Sikkim Unmarried Women Pension Scheme (SUWPS)” was launched in 2013 by the Department of Women & Child Welfare, Govt. of Sikkim. Under this scheme, the unmarried women of Below Poverty Line (BPL) families in Sikkim would receive a pension of ₹ 2000/- per month.

name: Krushi Mahotsav
description: The Krishi Mahotsav Yojana is an agricultural development scheme launched by the Government of Gujarat in the year 2010. The scheme aims to boost agricultural productivity and increase the income of farmers in the state.

name: Atal Sneh Yojana
description: Gujarat Chief Minister Shri Vijay Rupani here today announced the Atal ‘Screening of Newborn for Enhancement of Health’ (SNEH) Yojna to be started in the state from the former Prime Minister Atal Behari Vajpayee’s birthday on December 25, 2016.

name: Farmer Pension Scheme
description: The scheme aims to provide financial support to elderly farmers residing in the state of Uttarakhand. Under this scheme, a monthly pension of ₹1200/- is provided to farmers who are above 60 years of age, own up to 2 hectares of land, and cultivate their own land.

name: Nirman Shramik Safety Kit Yojana
description: "Nirman Shramik Safety Kit Yojana" is a scheme by the Department of Labour, Employment, Training & Skill Development Govt of Jharkhand. The scheme provides a direct cash transfer of ₹ 1,000/- for purchasing a branded helmet and a pair of safety shoes.

name: Sardar Patel Awas Yojana
description: Sardar Patel Awas Yojana (SPAY) is a housing scheme launched by the government of Gujarat in India to provide affordable housing to economically weaker sections (EWS) and low-income groups (LIG) of society.

name: Financial Assistance For Purchase Of Stationery To SC/ST/OBC/Minorities Students
description: Welfare scheme of Department For The Welfare Of SC/ST/OBC’s/Minorities to provide help for purchase of stationery to SC/ST/OBC/Minorities Students of 1st to 12th class studying Govt. of India/GNCT of Delhi/Aided Recognized schools.
