name: Dr. B. R. Ambedkar State Award To SC/ST/OBC/Minorities Students
description: This scholarship aims to award the eligible meritorious students.
tags: ['Dr. B.R. Ambedkar', 'Financial Assistance', 'Minorities', 'Other Backward Classes (OBC)', 'Scheduled Castes (SC)', 'Scheduled Tribes (ST)', 'State Award']

name: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme - Sikkim
description: The scheme “Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme (IGNWPS)” by the Department of Women & Child Welfare, Govt. of Sikkim provides financial support is provided to the poor widows of the state of Sikkim. The beneficiary receives a monthly pension of ₹ 2000/- through DBT.

name: Post Matric Scholarship To Scheduled Caste Students Of Nagaland
description: The Directorate of Higher Education (DHE) has launched the Post Matric Scholarship to ST students of the Nagaland scheme for providing socio-economic welfare to the students belonging to the residentship of Nagaland state. The student must be studying or getting admission to the post-matric class.

name: Chief Ministergi Artistesinggi Tengbang (CMAT) – Artiste’s Pension
description: The scheme "Chief Ministergi Artistesinggi Tengbang (CMAT) – Artiste’s Pension" by the Dept. of Art and Culture, Govt. of Manipur provides a monthly pension of up to ₹ 4,000/- to the aged reputed artists who have contributed to making the tradition, culture, and art forms of Manipur more vibrant.

name: Financial Assistance To Disabled For Self Employment
description: The objective of this scheme is to facilitate the self-employment of unemployed disabled persons. Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided to persons with disabilities for self-employment, small-scale business, and agro-based project. This scheme is 100% funded by Govt. of Maharashtra.

name: Nirman Shramik Pucca Ghar Yojana
description: Labour and ESI Department, Government of Odisha has introduced a scheme "Nirman Shramik Pucca Ghar Yojana (NSPGY)" to meet the housing needs of the building and other construction workers in rural areas, registered under the Odisha Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (OB&OCWWB).

name: Special Education And Vocational Training Through Government Institutions
description: In this scheme, Special Education is provided to children with disability between the age group of 6 to 18 years in the Government Special Schools and Vocational Training is provided to special children above the age of 18 years. Only citizens who are permanent residents of Maharashtra are eligible.

name: Financial Assistance For Aids And Appliances For Disabled Persons
description: The "Financial Assistance for Aids and Appliances for Disabled Persons" is a scheme by the Govt. of Maharashtra. The objective of this scheme is to provide assistance to Persons with Disabilities (PwDs) for the purchase of aids and appliances as per their age group and the type of disability.
tags: ['Aids And Appliances', 'Financial Assistance', 'Person With Disability', 'Social Welfare']

name: Junior Merit (Class - 11 To 12)
description: The Department of School & Mass Education, Government of Odisha is awarding "Junior Merit Scholarship" under the Scheme 'e-medhabruti’ to provide financial assistance to the meritorious Higher Secondary School students of Odisha from families whose parental income does not exceed 6.00 lakhs.

name: Odisha State Treatment Fund
description: The Odisha State Treatment Fund will provide financial assistance for treatment of the poor patients suffering from life threatening disorders & diseases. The financial assistance will be released to the Medical Institutions where the patient undergoes treatment.

name: The Post-Matric Scholarship For Scheduled Tribes Students
description: The scheme "Post-Matric Scholarship for Scheduled Tribes Students" by the Ministry of Tribal Affairs, Government of India, and Government of Mizoram aims to provide financial assistance to ST students pursuing post-matriculation education. It covers various recognized courses.

name: Widow/Abandoned/Single Woman Pension Scheme
description: Widow/Abandoned/Single Woman Pension Scheme of Himachal Pradesh Government aims to provide financial help to widows, abandoned women, and unmarried women shall be entitled to receive pension for a sum of Rs.1,150/-per month.

name: Unemployment Allowance
description: Chhattisgarh Berozgari Bhatta Yojana is an important initiative of Chhattisgarh Government for the unemployed. It has been announced by the Chief Minister of the state Mr. Bhupesh Baghel in his budget speech on 06-03-2023.

name: Mukhyamantri Kisan Sahay Yojana
description: The scheme was launched on September 6, 2019, to provide relief and support to farmers in case of crop damage due to natural calamities and was implemented by the Revenue Department of the Government of Gujarat in collaboration with the Agriculture and Co-operation Department.

name: Chief Minister’s Yuva Kaushal Yojana
description: The scheme “Chief Minister’s Yuva Kaushal Yojana (CM YKY)” was launched by the government of Arunachal Pradesh on 1st April 2018 to provide high-end training to the youth across the state to enable them to find jobs in the private sector.

name: Cluster Nutritional Kitchen Garden Scheme
description: The Cluster Nutritional Kitchen Garden Scheme (CNKGS) is an initiative launched by the government of Arunachal Pradesh to promote self-sufficiency and improve nutritional needs by encouraging the establishment of kitchen gardens.

name: Advance For Purchase Or Construction Of House (APB&OCWWB)
description: The scheme “Advance for Purchase or Construction of House” was started by the Department of Labour and Employment, Govt. of Arunachal Pradesh for the registered workers of Arunachal Pradesh Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (APB&OCWWB).

name: Mukhyamantri Vriksharopan Protsahan Yojana
description: Chhattisgarh Mukhyamantri Vriksharopan Protsahan Yojana has been started by the Government of Chhattisgarh with the aim of conserving the environment and doubling the income of the farmers by promoting tree plantation in the state.

name: Arun Pig Development Scheme
description: The scheme “Arun Pig Development Scheme” was launched by the Department of Animal Husbandry, Veterinary & Dairy Development, Government of Arunachal Pradesh in the financial year 2019-20 with a focus on pig rearing.

name: Schemes Of HP Minorities Finance & Development Corporation
description: Social, educational and economic upliftment of the minority class people living below the poverty line of the state.

name: ₹ 5 Lakh Insurance Cover To Farmers
description: Launched on 15 August 2018, the scheme "₹5 Lakh Insurance Cover for Farmers" is an Insurance Scheme by the Department of Agriculture, Government of Telangana. This scheme provides ₹5 lakh insurance coverage to all farmers aged between 18 and 60 years.

name: Financial Assistance To The Child Victims Of Violence Under TheNational Foundation For Communal Harmony
description: The scheme provides financial assistance for the physical & psychological rehabilitation of child victims of communal, caste, ethnic & terrorist violence with special reference to their care, education & training, besides promoting communal harmony,

name: Chief Minister's Jeevan Jyoti Swaniyojan Yojana
description: The Chief Minister's Jeevan Jyoti Swaniyojan Yojana is a self-employment scheme initiated by the Government of Assam. The primary objective of the scheme is to provide avenues of self-employment to educated unemployed youth in Assam.

name: Maintenance Grant for Children with Disabilities from Birth
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance of ₹700/- per month to parents or guardians for the care of children below 18 years of age with more than 40% disability.

name: Innovation In Science Pursuit For Inspired Research (INSPIRE) - Fellowship
description: INSPIRE Fellowship is one of the components of INSPIRE scheme implemented by the Department of Science and Technology (DST), Government of India to strengthen the Science and Technology base of the country. This Component focuses on attracting students to pursue doctoral degree.

name: Mukhyamantri Medhavi Vidhyarti Yojana
description: The scheme aims to cover the tuition fees for meritorious students from Madhya Pradesh admitted to graduate courses. Financial assistance for admission and course fees is provided to eligible students through this scheme.

name: Swanirbhar Naari
description: The Swanirbhar Naari scheme, initiated by the Directorate of Handloom & Textiles, Assam, aims to promote traditional hand-woven items by procuring them directly from indigenous weavers.

name: Chief Minister's Jeevan Jyoti Swaniyojan Yojana
description: The Chief Minister's Jeevan Jyoti Swaniyojan Yojana is a self-employment scheme initiated by the Government of Assam. The primary objective of the scheme is to provide avenues of self-employment to educated unemployed youth in Assam.

name: Advance For Purchase Or Construction Of House (APB&OCWWB)
description: The scheme “Advance for Purchase or Construction of House” was started by the Department of Labour and Employment, Govt. of Arunachal Pradesh for the registered workers of Arunachal Pradesh Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (APB&OCWWB).

name: Nationwide Artificial Insemination Programme
description: The Nationwide Artificial Insemination Programme (NAIP), is a flagship program of the Department of Animal Husbandry and Dairying. The objective of the programme is to increase the productivity of livestock by improving the genetic potential through artificial insemination.

name: Cluster Nutritional Kitchen Garden Scheme
description: The Cluster Nutritional Kitchen Garden Scheme (CNKGS) is an initiative launched by the government of Arunachal Pradesh to promote self-sufficiency and improve nutritional needs by encouraging the establishment of kitchen gardens.

name: Subsidy Scheme For Establishment Of Goat Unit (10+1) For Scheduled Tribe Women
description: The scheme “Subsidy Scheme for Establishment of Goat Unit (10+1) for Scheduled Tribe Women” was launched by the Department of Agriculture, Farmers Welfare & Co-operation, Government of Gujarat to uplift Economically poor livestock breeders of Gujarat State.

name: Subsidy Scheme On Establishment Of 40 R.I.R. Birds Unit For Divyang People
description: The scheme “Subsidy Scheme on Establishment of 40 R.I.R. Birds Unit for Divyang People” was launched by the Dept. of Agriculture, Farmers Welfare & Co-operation, Govt. of Gujarat to provide employment, nutritious diet and to raise the income of Divyang People of the society of Gujarat State.

name: Ashirwad

description: "Goa Tribal’s Employment Generation Programme Scheme" provides a subsidy of 40% on the total loan amount i.e. 95% of the project cost. The scheme is for educated unemployed individuals in the 18 to 45 years age group who are members of the tribal communities of Goa.

description: BIRAC’s E-YUVA Fellows shall apply as a team and pursue their research work at their College/University labs and will also be allowed access to facilities at EYC and EYC Knowledge Partners as and when required.

name: E-YUVA Scheme: BIRAC’s Innovation Fellows (for post graduates and above)
description: BIRAC’s Innovation fellows shall apply as an individual and are required to work full time at EYC. BIRAC’s Innovation Fellows are expected to initiate biotech startups. Hence, only proposals with potential to commercialize innovative products and technologies will be considered for support.

description: 'WIDUSHI' programme aims to encourage and support senior women scientists to conduct research in interdisciplinary areas of Science and Technology.

name: WISE Fellowship for Ph.D.
description: The "WISE Fellowship for Ph.D. (WISE-PhD)" of the Department of Science and Technology aims to provide an opportunity to carry out Doctoral research in basic and applied sciences to women scientists and technologists between the age group of 27-45 years who want to pursue research in STEM fields.

name: Swarnajayanti Fellowships Scheme
description: Under this scheme, a selected number of young scientists, with proven track record, are provided special assistance and support to enable them to pursue basic research in frontier areas of science and technology.

state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: This scheme aims at setting up Disha Centres for early intervention for Person with Disability (PwD) in 0-10 years of age covered under the National Trust Act, through therapies, trainings and providing support to family members.

name: West Bengal Student Credit Card Scheme
description: The Higher Education Department, Government of West Bengal has introduced the Student Credit Card Scheme for the students of West Bengal to enable them to pursue higher education without having any financial constraints.

name: Mukhyamantri Aadharbhut Shiksha Prashikshan Sahayata Yojana
description: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme "Mukhyamantri Aadharbhut Shiksha Prashikshan Sahayata Yojana" for Building and other construction worker on 29 March 2023.

name: Grant of 50% Subsidy for the Purchase of Aquarium and Its Accessories under "Development of Freshwater Aquaculture and Setting up of Aquarium, Ornamental Fish Breeding Centre"
description: "Grant of 50% Subsidy for the Purchase of Aquarium and Its Accessories" is introduced with the objective to propagate the importance of aquarium keeping and to inculcate the art of aquarium keeping among the general public. The scheme is extended to all the regions of Puducherry.

name: Zero Ticket Bus Travel Scheme for Women
description: The scheme aims to provide to eligible women/ transgender beneficiaries of Tamil Nadu under the Zero Ticket Bus Travel Scheme for Women, Free of Cost Travel in Government of Tamil Nadu Buses. No Need to Pay any Fare up to 30 Kilometers.

name: Scheme of Pension for Eminent Sports Persons
description: The scheme “Scheme of Pension for Eminent Sports Persons” was launched by the Department of Sports, Government of Punjab to provide pension to eminent veteran sportsmen who have excelled at International level during their youth and made the nation proud.

name: Chief Minister Breakfast Scheme
description: The objective of the Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Breakfast Scheme is that Breakfast will be provided to primary school children from 1st to 5th standard studying in Government schools on all school working days.

name: Manabik Scheme
description: The Manabik Pension Scheme is a financial assistance program launched in 2018 to provide monthly pensions to individuals with disabilities in West Bengal.

name: Supply of Dhotis and Sarees to Scheduled Caste (SC) People
description: The scheme “Supply of Dhotis and Sarees to Scheduled Caste (SC) People” by the Adi Dravidar Welfare and Scheduled Tribes Welfare Department, Union Territory of Puducherry is introduced to provide clothing items (lungi, shirt, saree, blouse, etc) to the Scheduled Caste (SC) people of Puducherry.

name: Coconut Palm Insurance Scheme
state: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
description: The “Coconut Palm Insurance Scheme (CPIS)” is being implemented by the Coconut Development Board, Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare, Government of India with the objective of insuring coconut palms against natural calamities, climatic risks, pests, diseases, and other perils.

name: Financial Assistance to Old Age Pensioner Suffering From TB/ Cancer
description: “Financial Assistance to Old Age Pensioner Suffering From TB/ Cancer” by the Dept of Women & Child Development, Govt of Puducherry, was introduced to extend a helping hand by way of financial assistance to Old Age/Destitute Pensioners who are suffering from TB/Cancer to meet the medical expenses.

name: Grant of House Construction Subsidy to Scheduled Caste People
description: The scheme “Grant of House Construction Subsidy to Scheduled Caste People” was introduced by the Adi Dravidar Welfare Dept, Govt of Puducherry. The poor Scheduled Caste people, and other Economically backward class people, who meet the eligibility criteria, are provided house construction subsidy.

name: Attendance Scholarship Scheme for Girl Students with Disabilities of Rural Areas
description: The objective of this scheme is to uplift the status of the girls with disabilities in the rural areas & also to make them reliant by paying incentives in the form of Attendance Scholarship to these girls.

name: Pradhan Mantri Uchchatar Shiksha Protsahan Yojana: Central Sector Interest Subsidy Scheme
description: The scheme provides full interest subsidy during the moratorium period on loan availed under Model Education Loan Scheme of Indian Banks’ Association (IBA) to students belonging to economically weaker sections whose annual parental income is up to ₹4.5 Lakhs from all sources.
tags: ['Economically Weaker Sections', 'Education Loan', 'IBA', 'Interest Subsidy', 'Professional Programmes', 'Student', 'Technical Programmes']

name: Grant of Marriage Allowance to the Widow's Daughter
description: This scheme aims to provide financial support to widows for the marriage of their daughters. Eligible widows can receive ₹25,000/- to cover marriage expenses. The scheme is implemented through the Department of Women and Child Development, Government of Puducherry.

name: "Annual Insurance Premium for Boat Owners" under "Financial Assistance for Availing Subsidy Components for the Development of Marine Fisheries"
description: "Annual Insurance Premium for Boat Owners" under "Financial Assistance for Availing Subsidy Components for the Development of Marine Fisheries" is introduced to increase marine fish production through subsidies for the annual premiums for insurance coverage paid by the mechanized boat operators.

name: Reimbursement of Tuition Fees for Typewriting and Shorthand Courses for Children of Widows
description: “Reimbursement of Tuition Fees for Typewriting and Shorthand Courses for Children of Widows” by the Dept of Women & Child Development, Govt of Pondicherry, was introduced to encourage the children of widows to pursue Typewriting and Shorthand courses and facilitate the reimbursement of course fees.

name: Biju Patnaik Sports Award for Excellence in Sports Journalism
description: The award is given to the journalists who have done significant work in the sphere of journalism for the promotion and popularization of sports and games as well as fighting for the causes of sports and sportspersons in the State of Odisha.

name: "Conversion/Modernisation of Mechanised Fishing Boats for Deep Sea Fishing" under "Financial Assistance for Availing Subsidy Components for the Development of Marine Fisheries"
description: The scheme "Conversion/Modernisation of Mechanised Fishing Boats for Deep Sea Fishing" is introduced by the Dept of Fisheries and Fishermen Welfare, Govt of Puducherry to increase marine fish production by extending grants for the conversion/modernization of mechanized boats for deep-sea fishing.

name: Grant of Financial Assistance to Poor Scheduled Caste Pregnant & Lactating Women
description: The scheme “Grant of Financial Assistance to Poor Scheduled Caste Pregnant & Lactating Women” was introduced by the Adi Dravidar Welfare Department, Government of Puducherry. The objective of the scheme is to provide assistance for the well-being of Pregnant and Lactating mothers and their children.

name: Chief Minister Breakfast Scheme
description: The objective of the Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Breakfast Scheme is that Breakfast will be provided to primary school children from 1st to 5th standard studying in Government schools on all school working days.

name: Matritva, Shishu Evam Baalika Madad Yojana
description: "Maatrtv, Shishu Evan Baalika Madad Yojana" is a initiative of Uttar Pradesh state Government to provide the financial assistance to the mother and her girl child.

name: Cash Award (A.B.O.C.W.W.B)
description: Cash awards shall be given to the three male & three female children of the registered construction workers in each district to those students who score 75% or above, 65% or less than 75%, and 55% or less than 65% mark in HSLC, AHM and H.S. examinations.

name: Internship Programme for Women Students / Scholars / Social Activists / Teachers
state: Ministry of Women and Child Development
description: The Ministry of Women and Child Development launched the Internship Programme aims to harness the talent of the trainees, giving them an opportunity to work towards bringing more efficiency in the implementation of the schemes.

name: National Youth Award
description: This award is to motivate young persons to achieve excellence in the field of national development or social service and to develop in them a sense of responsibility to the community and thus to improve their potential as good citizens.

name: Group Insurance for Differently Abled Person Government Employees
description: The scheme “Group Insurance for Differently Abled Person Government Employees" was launched by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry. In this scheme, in the case of death due to accident while in service the sum insured will be given to the family of the deceased employee.

name: Maternity Benefit (A.B.O.C.W.W.B)
description: The scheme “Maternity Benefit” was started by the Assam Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (A.B.O.C.W.W.B), Labour Welfare Department, Government of Assam for providing financial assistance to the registered women beneficiaries as maternity benefits during the period of maternity.

name: Gambhir Bimari Sahayata Yojana
description: The "Gambhir Bimari Sahayata Yojana" is a scheme by the government of Uttar Pradesh, India, to provide financial assistance to registered construction workers for the  treatment from the serious Illness

name: Mukhyamantri Rajya Bridhhabasta Pension Yojana
description: “Mukhyamantri Rajya Bridhhabasta Pension Yojana” is a Social Security Scheme by the Department of Women, Child Development & Social Security, Government of Jharkhand. The scheme provides financial asistance to the age group of 60 years and above.

name: Award of Post-Matric Scholarship to Scheduled Caste Students
description: The scheme “Award of Post-Matric Scholarship to Scheduled Caste Students” was introduced by the Adi Dravidar Welfare Dept, Government of Puducherry. The objective of the scheme is to benefit the students who are studying at the Post-matric level or Post-Secondary stage to complete their education.

name: Grant of Financial Assistance to Poor Scheduled Caste Pregnant & Lactating Women
description: The scheme “Grant of Financial Assistance to Poor Scheduled Caste Pregnant & Lactating Women” was introduced by the Adi Dravidar Welfare Department, Government of Puducherry. The objective of the scheme is to provide assistance for the well-being of Pregnant and Lactating mothers and their children.

name: Matritva, Shishu Evam Baalika Madad Yojana
description: "Maatrtv, Shishu Evan Baalika Madad Yojana" is a initiative of Uttar Pradesh state Government to provide the financial assistance to the mother and her girl child.

name: Masala Shetra Vistar Yojana
description: Masala Shetra Vistar Yojana was launched by the Government of Madhya Pradesh the whose objective is to expand the area and increase the production of selected spice crops through quality high yielding varieties.

name: "Integrated Farming for Productivity Improvement Scheme" by the Coconut Development Board
description: Through the “Integrated Farming for Productivity Improvement Scheme" by the Coconut Development Board, the coconut farmers are provided financial assistance through DBT (Direct Benefit Transfer) mode for the Laying of the Demonstration Plot, and for the Construction of the Organic Manure Unit.

name: Replanting & Rejuvenation of Coconut Garden" by the Coconut Development Board
description: Through the scheme “Replanting & Rejuvenation of Coconut Garden (R&R)" by the Coconut Development Board, the coconut farmers are provided financial assistance through DBT (Direct Benefit Transfer) mode for the cutting & removal, replanting, and for integrated management practices.

name: Fruit Development Scheme
description: The objective of the scheme is to make available to the farmers good quality planting materials in convergence mode and sale at subsidized rates.

name: Plantation Crop Development Scheme
description: The objectives of the scheme are to boost up the area and production of all plantation crops like Arecanut, Cashewnut, Coconut, Pineapple etc., and to provide a 50 % subsidy for planting materials and construction of a soakage tank.

name: Assistance to General Farmers for Installation of Submersible / Centrifugal Motor Pumpsets With Accessories
description: Through this scheme, the farmers from the General Category are provided with a grant of 65% subsidy towards the installation of suitable Submersible / Centrifugal motor pump sets with accessories, subject to a maximum of ₹50,000/‐ per tubewell per individual.

name: PM-YASASVI: Pre-Matric Scholarship for OBC, EBC and DNT Students
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: The objective of the Centrally Sponsored Scheme of Pre-Matric Scholarship for OBC, EBC, and DNT students (who are not covered under SC, ST, or OBC) is welfare and motivation to the children of these categories by providing financial assistance at pre-matriculation or secondary stage.

name: Home for the Aged and Infirm
description: The scheme “Home for the Aged and Infirm" was launched by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry. The objective of this scheme is to cater to the needs of persons who are aged/infirm, i.e. senior citizens, both male and female above the age of 60 years from BPL Family.

name: Assistance to General Farmers for Installation of Submersible / Centrifugal Motor Pumpsets With Accessories
description: Through this scheme, the farmers from the General Category are provided with a grant of 65% subsidy towards the installation of suitable Submersible / Centrifugal motor pump sets with accessories, subject to a maximum of ₹50,000/‐ per tubewell per individual.

name: Mukhyamantri Samajik Sahayata Prakalpa - Persons with Disabilities
description: The scheme “Mukhyamantri Samajik Sahayata Prakalpa - Persons with Disabilities" was launched by the Directorate of Social Welfare and Social Education, Government of Tripura to provide financial assistance to Persons with Disabilities in the form of a monthly pension of ₹2,000/-.

name: "Advance / High Skill Training" Component of the "Development of Industries" Scheme
description: The scheme aims to enhance the skill of those who have completed the basic training and are interested in advanced training in their trade or the candidates having technical qualifications willing to undergo some special high skilled training to start their ventures or to get suitable employment.

name: "Vocational Training" Component of the "Development of Industries" Scheme
description: "Vocational Training" by the Department of Industries and Commerce, Union Territory of Puducherry aims to create more employment opportunities broadly for the unemployed youth particularly women to pursue wide career openings besides self-ventures by giving training in trades.

name: National Awards To Teachers (Higher Education)
description: The purpose of National Awards to Teachers is to celebrate the unique contribution of some of the finest teachers in the country and to honor those teachers who through their commitment and industry have not only improved the quality of school education but also enriched the lives of their students.

name: Pension Scheme for Grade II Deformed Leprosy Patients
description: The scheme "Pension Scheme for Grade II Deformed Leprosy Patients" is a Pension Scheme by the Directorate of Social Welfare and Social Education, Government of Tripura. The scheme provides financial assistance of ₹2,000/- per month to Leprosy Patients who are residents of Tripura.

name: Bio Control Laboratory and Pesticides Testing Laboratory Scheme
description: The objective is the production of Bio Control Agents such as Trichoderma, Trichogramma, etc., and further distribution to farmers as awareness and demonstration for organic Plant Health Management in order to promote organic crop production.

name: Integrated Technology Enabled Agriculture Management System Or iTEAMS
description: The scheme was launched by the Department of Agriculture & Farmers’ Welfare, Govt. of Meghalaya to address critical issues of enabling & facilitating access to remunerative & sustainable markets for farmers produce in most transparent & effective manner through facilitation service iTEAM Dial 1917.

name: Integrated Agriculture Training Centre Scheme
description: The objective of the scheme is to provide training for enhancing the skills of farmers besides imparting updated agricultural technologies to departmental functionaries.

name: Pension Scheme for Cancer Patients
description: The scheme “Pension Scheme for Cancer Patients" was launched by the Directorate of Social Welfare and Social Education, Government of Tripura. The scheme aims to provide a monthly pension of ₹2,000/- to the person suffering from cancer.

name: Nirman Shramik Siksha Kaushal Vikas Yojana
description: The NIRMAN SHRAMIK SIKSHA KAUSHAL VIKAS YOJANA (NSKKVY) is a scheme launched by the Government of Rajasthan to provide financial assistance for education and skill development to the children of registered construction workers in the state.

name: Mukhyamantri Covid-19 Bal Seva Yojana
description: The Mukhyamantri Covid-19 Bal Seva Yojana scheme for children who have lost their parent(s) to the COVID pandemic, the government will provide these children funding for good education and health.

name: Indira Gandhi National Vridhavastha Pension Yojana
description: Under this scheme, the Madhya Pradesh government provides financial support to the citizens whose families live below the poverty line.

name: Mukh‍yamantri Janakal‍yaan (Sambal 2.0) Yojana (Asangathit Karmakaar Man‍da)
description: The Mukhyamantri Jan Kalyan (Sambal 2.0) Yojana is a initiative of Madhya Pradesh government. The scheme will provide much-needed social security to unorganized workers in the state and help them live a dignified life.

name: Award of Pre-Matric Scholarship to Other Economically Backward Class (OEBC) Students
description: The "Award of Pre-Matric Scholarship to Other Economically Backward Class (OEBC) Students" initiated by the Department of Information & Publicity, Union Territory of Puducherry, is designed to extend financial assistance to OEBC students, mitigating the risk of dropouts due to financial constraints.

name: Award of Puducherry State Post-Matric Scholarship Scheme
description: The scheme make sure that no brilliant student is prevented on the grounds of poverty alone from pursuing the academic career. Scholarship is awarded to students in 11th & 12th standards who have secured promotion to the next higher class with 60% & 50% marks in 10th & 11th standard respectively.

name: "Back Ended Investment Subsidy to Paddy Growers" component of the "Crop Production Technology" scheme
description: "Back Ended Investment Subsidy to Paddy Growers" component of the "Crop Production Technology" scheme was introduced by the Dept of Agriculture and Farmer's Welfare, UT of Puducherry. The paddy farmers residing in the Yanam region are provided a back-ended investment subsidy at ₹4,000/- per hectare.

name: PM-YASASVI: Top Class School Education for OBC, EBC and DNT Students
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: The objective of the scheme is to provide premium education to the meritorious students belonging to OBC, EBC, and DNT categories by funding their education from Class 9 onwards till they complete Class 12.

name: The Andaman & Nicobar Islands Allowance to Destitute Women Scheme
description: The scheme “The Andaman & Nicobar Islands Allowance to Destitute Women Scheme” is implemented by the Directorate of Social Welfare, Union Territory of Andaman and Nicobar Islands to provide financial assistance to the poorest and destitute women in the Andaman and Nicobar Islands.

name: The Andaman & Nicobar Islands Widow Pension Scheme
description: The scheme “The Andaman & Nicobar Islands Widow Pension Scheme” is implemented by the Directorate of Social Welfare, Union Territory of Andaman and Nicobar Islands to provide financial assistance to poor and destitute widows in the Andaman and Nicobar Islands.

name: Laxman Award / Rani Laxmi Bai Award Scheme- Differently-abled and Posthumously
description: The scheme “Laxman Award/Rani Laxmi Bai Award” was launched by the Department of Sports, Government of Uttar Pradesh to honor special sports personalities of the state, differently-abled players and the Laxman Award, the highest sports award of the state will be given posthumously to Shahid.

name: "Advance/High Skill Training in Coir" Component of the "Development of Coir" Scheme
description: "Advance/High Skill Training in Coir" aims to enhance the skills of Coir artisans and interested individuals. The objective is to acquire the latest skills and modern technologies through advanced/high-skilled training available across various locations in India, offering valuable benefits.

name: Pension Scheme for Cancer Patients
description: The scheme “Pension Scheme for Cancer Patients" was launched by the Directorate of Social Welfare and Social Education, Government of Tripura. The scheme aims to provide a monthly pension of ₹2,000/- to the person suffering from cancer.

name: Vidhva Vivah Uphar Yojana
description: The Rajasthan government's Social Justice and Empowerment Department launched the "Vidhva Vivah Uphar Yojana" program, a social welfare initiative that aims to improve the lives of widow women.

name: Disability Assistance (ANBOCWWB)
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to registered construction workers who become disabled due to an accident during the course of their employment on the production of a certificate from competent medical authorities in respect of the percentage of disability.

name: Award of Scholarship to the Cadets Belonging to UT of Puducherry and Studying in Rashtriya Indian Military College, Dehradun
description: The objective of this scheme is to extend scholarships worth of ₹20,000/- per annum to the cadets belonging to the Union Territory of Puducherry who come from economically weak backgrounds and have been selected for admission into the Rashtriya Indian Military College, Dehradun.

name: Grant of Annual Scholarship to the Students Belonging to UT of Puducherry Selected and Studying in the Sainik School, Amaravathi Nagar, Tamil Nadu
description: "Grant of Annual Scholarship to the Students Belonging to UT of Puducherry Selected and Studying in the Sainik School, Amaravathi Nagar, Tamil Nadu" is a Scholarship Scheme by the Directorate of School Education, Puducherry. A scholarship of ₹10,000/- per annum per student is provided.

name: Total Health Check-up Scheme (GBOCWWB)
description: This scheme facilitates a complete physical examination of the construction workers, which can diagnose potential illnesses and early treatment can prevent major illnesses. Hence, major illness can be avoided and the construction worker can lead a healthy life.

name: Free Studentship
description: The "Free Studentship" initiative, administered by the Directorate of Higher & Technical Education, Meghalaya, is a state-sponsored program aimed at providing financial assistance to students belonging to the SC/ST/OBC categories for their tuition fees and other fee according to prescribed rates.

name: "SUPER 30" Scheme
description: "Super 30" was launched by the Directorate of Secondary Education, Tripura. The scheme aims to provide free coaching for JEE/ NEET to the students who are appearing in the class 10th Board Final Exam and want to pursue Science Stream in Class 11th & 12th with the aspiration to crack JEE/NEET.

name: Annai Teresa Ninaivu Marriage Assistance Scheme for Orphan Girls-II
description: "Annai Teresa Ninaivu Marriage Assistance Scheme for Orphan Girls-I" was launched by the Social Welfare and Women Empowerment Dept, Govt of Tamil Nadu. The scheme provides financial assistance to the orphan girls for their marriage. The bride should be 18 years or older during her marriage.

name: Indira Mahila Shakti Prashikshan Evam Koshal Sanvardhan Yojana (RS-CSEP)
description: The Indira Mahila Shakti Prashikshan Evam Koshal Sanvardhan Yojana, offered by the Rajasthan Knowledge Corporation Limited (RKCL), provides free training in spoken English and personality development for women and girls.

name: Mukhyamantri Work Form Home-Job Work Yojana
description: The main objective of the "Mukhyamantri Work from Home" Scheme is to provide an opportunity for the women of the state to get employment sitting at home and to empower women by providing them with financial help by giving them work.

name: Diggy
description: Rajasthan Government has started the Diggy Scheme for the welfare of farmers, under which farmers will be provided grants for making dig for irrigation of crops. This scheme is to help farmers improve their farming by using more water resources and encourage them to grow good crops.

name: Winter Cropping & Development of Cultivable Land Scheme
description: The objectives of the scheme are to bring more areas under cultivation during the normally lean winter season under different crops other than paddy and increase production and productivity of various crops like cereals, pulses, oilseeds, and vegetables during the Rabi season.
tags: ['Agriculture', 'Cultivation', 'Farmer', 'Free Distribution Of Inputs', 'Subsidy On Inputs', 'Technology Support', 'Training']

name: Award of Scholarship to the Cadets Belonging to UT of Puducherry and Studying in Rashtriya Indian Military College, Dehradun
description: The objective of this scheme is to extend scholarships worth of ₹20,000/- per annum to the cadets belonging to the Union Territory of Puducherry who come from economically weak backgrounds and have been selected for admission into the Rashtriya Indian Military College, Dehradun.

name: Grant of Annual Scholarship to the Students Belonging to UT of Puducherry Selected and Studying in the Sainik School, Amaravathi Nagar, Tamil Nadu
description: "Grant of Annual Scholarship to the Students Belonging to UT of Puducherry Selected and Studying in the Sainik School, Amaravathi Nagar, Tamil Nadu" is a Scholarship Scheme by the Directorate of School Education, Puducherry. A scholarship of ₹10,000/- per annum per student is provided.

name: Total Health Check-up Scheme (GBOCWWB)
description: This scheme facilitates a complete physical examination of the construction workers, which can diagnose potential illnesses and early treatment can prevent major illnesses. Hence, major illness can be avoided and the construction worker can lead a healthy life.

name: Hostel Assistance Scheme for Children of Migrant Construction Workers (GBOCWWB)
description: Under the scheme, hostel facilities for free accommodation and meals shall be provided to the children of migrant construction workers in primary school. The aim of the scheme is to provide primary, secondary, and higher education to the children of migrant construction workers.

name: Shramik Basera Yojana (GBOCWWB)
description: Under the scheme, the accommodation facilities will be provided @ ₹5/- per day to registered construction workers in temporary prefabricated housing with basic amenities that can be dismantled.

name: Diggy
description: Rajasthan Government has started the Diggy Scheme for the welfare of farmers, under which farmers will be provided grants for making dig for irrigation of crops. This scheme is to help farmers improve their farming by using more water resources and encourage them to grow good crops.

name: Housing Subsidy Scheme (GBOCWWB)
description: The main objective of this scheme is to provide financial assistance to construction workers registered with the Gujarat Building and Other Construction Worker’s Welfare Board to build their own houses.

name: Scheme of Giving Awards to Eminent Artists - Kalai Valarmani Award
description: "Scheme of Giving Awards to Eminent Artists - Kalai Valarmani Award" by the Art and Culture Department, Government of Tamil Nadu aims to promote and preserve the culture of Tamil Nadu. The selected artists are awarded financial assistance ₹6,000/- and certificates of appreciation.

name: Mini Sprinkler Sanyantr
description: The Mini Sprinkler Sanyantr scheme provided a subsidy to the farmers can irrigate more land by getting sprinkler subsidy. The subsidy given by the state government to the farmers will be sent directly to their bank account through DBT.

name: Green House
description: Under the Green House Scheme Farmers can get the benefit of subsidy on green house and earn more income by cultivating horticultural crops like vegetables, flowers, fruits etc. by controlling the ago-climatic factors, temperature, humidity and sunlight.

name: Chhatraon Ke Liye Protsahan Rashi
description: In the "Chhatraon Ke Liye Protsahan Rashi" scheme to encourages girl students to study agriculture subject and provides financial assistance to economically disadvantaged students who may face challenges in accessing education due to financial constraints.

name: Kisan Kaleva Yojana
description: Under the Kisan Kaleva Scheme run by the Rajasthan Government, food is provided at concessional rates through coupons to the farmers and their assistants who come to sell crops in the vegetable market premises.

name: One Time Cash Incentive towards acquiring BEd, BPEd, DTEd, PGDCA (Sainik Welfare)
description: "One Time Cash Incentive towards acquiring BEd, BPEd, DTEd, PGDCA" is a Welfare Scheme by the Armed Forces Flag Day Fund of the Department of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry. Through this scheme, up to ₹20,000/- is provided to the unemployed Ex-servicemen to pursue the mentioned programs/courses.

name: "Outstanding Artisan of the Year" under “Motivation of Entrepreneurs to Start Industries and Fiscal Assistance to Industries - State Awards to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises”
description: The "Outstanding Artisan of the Year" award is conferred upon the artisan who has been a participant for 3 years in National / International handicraft exhibitions/fairs. The awardee is given a cash award of ₹2,00,000/- and a citation. The applications are accepted offline in the prescribed form.

name: Scheme of Extending Financial Assistance to Folk Artists, Troupes for the Purchase of Musical Instruments, Costumes
description: "Scheme of Extending Financial Assistance to Folk Artists, Troupes for the Purchase of Musical Instruments, Costumes" was launched by the Art and Culture Department, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme provides a sum of ₹2,000/- to individual folk artists & ₹6,000/- for cultural troupes.

name: Kam Lagat Pyaaj Bhandaran Sanrachna
description: Under the Kam Lagat Pyaaj Bhandaran Sanrachna yojana Construction of warehouses should be done at a high level to prevent moisture and dampness which occur due to direct contact of onions with soil.

name: Award to Scheduled Castes Students Who Secured Top Ranks at State and District Level in Standard X & XII (Sahuji Maharaj Assistance)
description: Under the scheme, Scheduled Castes Category students who have Secured Top Ranks at State and District Levels in Gujarat in Standard X & XII are given cash prizes. Cash prizes are awarded to the first three students who secure the highest ranks in both Standard X and Standard XII across all streams.

name: Coaching Assistance to Scheduled Castes Students for Preparation of Examination Like IIM, NIFT, NLU, CEPT
description: Under the scheme, financial assistance is provided to Students of the Scheduled Castes category who are preparing for examinations like IIM, NIFT, NLU, and CEPT.

name: Dr. P. G. Solanki Scheme for Loan/Assistance to Law Graduates of Scheduled Caste
description: The scheme was launched in year 1973. Under this scheme, law graduates belonging to the Scheduled Caste who intend to start independent legal practice will receive financial assistance for the purchase of business premises/shops.

name: Grant of Financial Assistance for Purchase of Textbooks/Notebooks to School-Going Children of Industrial Workers/Employees (GLWB)
description: Through this scheme, the children of industrial workers/employees, studying in classes 1st to 4th in recognized/approved schools are provided financial assistance for the purchase of textbooks/notebooks. The scheme aims to provide financial support for the educational needs of the children.

name: Coaching Assistance Scheme for Preparation of Recruitment Exams for Scheduled Caste Students
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to Students of SC category who are preparing for all State Government and Central Government Recruitment Examinations of Class– 1, 2 & 3 conducted by UPSC/GPSC/State Commission/Bank/LIC/Subordinate Services Selection Board/District Panchayat Selection Board.

name: Poompuhar State Award
description: "Poompuhar State Award" was launched by the Dept of Handlooms, Handicrafts, Textiles & Khadi, Tamil Nadu. The awardees are given ₹50,000, a 4-gram gold medal, tamirapathiram and a certificate. The economically backward awardees are also eligible for monthly pension of ₹3,500/- after 60 years of age.

name: Book Allowance to the Wards of Ex-Servicemen/Widows (Sainik Welfare)
description: "Book Allowance to the Wards of Ex-Servicemen/Widows" is a Welfare Scheme by the Dept of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry. Through this scheme, the wards of the ESM / Widows of ESM studying in Government-recognized Institutions are provided allowances towards the purchase of books.

name: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Shramik Pravidhik Shiksha Sahaayata Yojana
description: The Government of Uttar Pradesh initiated a scheme "Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Shramik Pravidhik Shiksha Sahaayata Yojana" to encourage the children towards the education.

name: Ganesh Shankar Vidyaarthi Shramik Puraskar Rashi Yojana
description: The Government of Uttar Pradesh initiated a scheme "Ganesh Shankar Vidyarthi Shramik Puraskar Raschi Yojana" to encourage the children towards the education.

name: Financial Assistance to Meet the Funeral Expenses of Differently Abled Person
description: The scheme 'Financial Assistance to Meet the Funeral Expenses of Differently Abled Person' was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons. In this scheme, financial assistance of ₹2,000/- is provided to meet the expenses in connection with funeral, in the event of the...

name: Assistance for Power Driven Chaff Cutter Scheme under Scheduled Castes Sub Plan (SC Category)
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to dairy farmers belonging to Scheduled Caste category on purchase of electric powered chaff cutters. By using power driven chaff cutter, dairy farmers can reduce wastage of green &dry fodder which is economically important for their profitable dairy farming.

name: Funeral Assistance for the Construction Workers
description: The "Funeral Assistance for the Construction Workers" by the Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Department, Delhi, is a welfare scheme that provides funeral assistance of ₹10,000/- in case of death of a member to their nominees/dependents.

name: Sanitary Napkin Scheme (UKBOCWWB)
description: The scheme aims to provide free sanitary napkins to the daughters of registered construction workers and to women construction workers, in order to promote health and hygiene.

name: Maintenance Allowance for Persons Affected with Muscular Dystrophy
description: The 'Maintenance Allowance for Persons Affected with Muscular Dystrophy' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide a maintenance allowance to the person affected with muscular dystrophy.

name: Maintenance Allowance to Severely Affected Persons
description: The 'Maintenance Allowance to Severely Affected Persons' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons. The scheme aims to provide a maintenance allowance to the severely affected persons who cannot be rehabilitated by any other assistance.

name: Poompuhar State Award
description: "Poompuhar State Award" was launched by the Dept of Handlooms, Handicrafts, Textiles & Khadi, Tamil Nadu. The awardees are given ₹50,000, a 4-gram gold medal, tamirapathiram and a certificate. The economically backward awardees are also eligible for monthly pension of ₹3,500/- after 60 years of age.

name: Alpasankhyak Post-Maitrik Chhaatravrtti Yojana
description: The Alpasankhyak Post-Matric Scholarship Scheme under the Madhya Pradesh Government is to provide financial assistance to students from minority communities in Madhya Pradesh pursuing post-secondary education.

name: Maintenance Allowance to Severely Affected Persons
description: The 'Maintenance Allowance to Severely Affected Persons' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons. The scheme aims to provide a maintenance allowance to the severely affected persons who cannot be rehabilitated by any other assistance.

name: Funeral Assistance for the Construction Workers
description: The "Funeral Assistance for the Construction Workers" by the Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Department, Delhi, is a welfare scheme that provides funeral assistance of ₹10,000/- in case of death of a member to their nominees/dependents.

name: Alpasankhyak Post-Maitrik Chhaatravrtti Yojana
description: The Alpasankhyak Post-Matric Scholarship Scheme under the Madhya Pradesh Government is to provide financial assistance to students from minority communities in Madhya Pradesh pursuing post-secondary education.

name: Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Mandi shramik kalyaan yojana
description: The Agriculture Department of Rajasthan runs the Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Mandi Shramik Kalyan Yojana, a program that offers a range of assistance programs to improve the well-being of mandi laborers.

name: Readers Allowance to Visually Impaired Persons
description: 'Readers Allowance to Visually Impaired Persons' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide readers allowance to visually impaired students, specific allowance rates based on the education level.

name: Sanitary Napkin Scheme (UKBOCWWB)
description: The scheme aims to provide free sanitary napkins to the daughters of registered construction workers and to women construction workers, in order to promote health and hygiene.

name: AlCTE - Distinguished Professional Scheme
description: AICTE-Distinguished Professionals Scheme has been launched by the All India Council for Technical Education, Ministry of Education to improve the quality of Technical Education in India by utilizing the expertise of Professionals, Emeritus professors & Eminent Personalities to share their knowledge.

name: Early Intervention Centre for the Visually Impaired
description: The "Early Intervention Centre for the Visually Impaired" was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. Under this scheme, visually impaired children are identified, assessed and prepared to join main stream education in 6 districts.

name: West Bengal Migrant Workers’ Welfare Scheme: Death Assistance
description: "West Bengal Migrant Workers’ Welfare Scheme: Death Assistance" is a social welfare scheme by the West Bengal Migrant Workers’ Welfare Board, Labour Dept., Government of West Bengal, that provides an one time assistance to the nominee in case of natural death/accidental death of the migrant worker.

name: West Bengal Migrant Workers’ Welfare Scheme: Repatriation of Dead Body
description: "West Bengal Migrant Workers’ Welfare Scheme: Repatriation of Dead Body" is a social welfare scheme implemented by the West Bengal Migrant Workers’ Welfare Board, that provides an one time assistance to the nominee for bringing the dead body of the registered migrant worker in case of death.

name: West Bengal Migrant Workers’ Welfare Scheme: Cremation
description: "West Bengal Migrant Workers’ Welfare Scheme: Cremation" is a social welfare scheme by the West Bengal Migrant Workers’ Welfare Board, Labour Dept., Government of West Bengal, that provides an one time assistance to the nominee of the worker for cremation when the worker dies.

name: Fitter Training to Hearing Impaired Persons
description: The scheme "Fitter Training to Hearing Impaired Persons" was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to give fitter training to the hearing-impaired candidates at the ITI, Guindy for two years and a stipend of ₹300 per month.

name: Chief Minister’s Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme - Tamil Nadu
description: Chief Minister Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme launched on 23.07.2009 as kalaingar Kaappittu Thittam. Now the scheme from January 2022 to 2027 is implemented through United India Insurance Company.

name: AlCTE - Distinguished Professional Scheme
description: AICTE-Distinguished Professionals Scheme has been launched by the All India Council for Technical Education, Ministry of Education to improve the quality of Technical Education in India by utilizing the expertise of Professionals, Emeritus professors & Eminent Personalities to share their knowledge.

name: Scholarship (Above VIII Standard) - Tamil Nadu
description: The 'Scholarship (Above VIII Standard) by Welfare of Differently Abled Persons' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide scholarships to differently-abled students studying in government school/colleges/training centre

name: Early Intervention Centre for the Visually Impaired
description: The "Early Intervention Centre for the Visually Impaired" was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. Under this scheme, visually impaired children are identified, assessed and prepared to join main stream education in 6 districts.

name: Loan for the Purchase of Work Tool for the Construction Workers
description: "Loan for the Purchase of Work Tool for the Construction Workers" by the Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Dept., Delhi, is a welfare scheme that provides an amount not exceeding ₹20,000/- as loan to the members of the fund, for the purchase of work related tools.

name: Supply Free Laptops to Visually Impaired Students Pursuing Higher Education
description: The 'Supply Free Laptops to Visually Impaired Students Pursuing Higher Education' scheme is under the Social Security and Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities Department, Government of Odisha. The scheme aims to provide free laptops to visually impaired students pursuing courses.

name: Bicycle Scheme- Haryana Labour Welfare Board
description: Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹5,000/- is provided to the workers employed in the industrial and commercial establishments of the state of Haryana for the purchase of a new bicycle for commuting on duty from their residence to the establishments.

name: Financial Assistance to Widow/Dependent in case of Death of a Worker- Haryana Labour Welfare Board
description: Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹2,00,000/- is given to the widow or dependent of the worker working in the industrial and commercial establishments of Haryana state in case of his death due to any reason.

name: Assistance for Delivery of a Child or the Miscarriage of Pregnancy or the Termination of Pregnancy
description: The scheme "Assistance for Delivery of a Child or the Miscarriage of Pregnancy or the Termination of Pregnancy" was launched by the Art and Culture Department, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to give financial assistance for the delivery of a child, miscarriage, or termination of pregnancy

name: West Bengal Artisans Financial Benefit Scheme 2024: Grant to Industrial Cooperative Society
description: “Grant to Industrial Cooperative Society” is a sub-scheme under "West Bengal Artisans Financial Benefit Scheme 2024”, by the MSME and Textiles Dept, Government of West Bengal. It aims to create, support and sustain an enabling ecosystem for strengthening creativity and capacity of the artisans.

name: Scheme of Financial Assistance for Publication of Manuscripts/Research Journals
description: The "Scheme of Financial Assistance for Publication of Manuscripts/Research Journals" was launched by the Arts and Culture Department of Puducherry. The scheme aims to provide financial assistance for publishing manuscripts/research journals.

name: Scheme for Conservation and Development of Indigenous Cattle and Murrah Development
description: The scheme is implemented by the Department of Animal Husbandry & Dairying, Government of Haryana with the objective of encouraging the farmers for conservation and development of the indigenous breeds of cows and buffaloes.

name: Scheme for Establishment of Hi-Tech and Mini Dairy Units
description: Under this scheme, unemployed persons will be assisted by way of providing financial assistance in form of subsidy for establishing dairy units of 4, 10, 20 & 50 milch animals like buffaloes, indigenous cows (Hariana, Sahiwal, Belahi, Red Sindhi, Tharparkar and Gir breeds only) and crossbred cows.
tags: ['Animal Husbandry', 'Financial Assistance', 'Hi-Tech', 'Interest Subvention', 'Milch Animal', 'Mini Dairy Unit', 'Self-employment', 'Subsidy', 'Unemployed']

name: Scheme for Providing Employment Opportunities to Scheduled Castes by Establishing Livestock Units
description: This is a credit-linked scheme with a primary objective of providing self-employment opportunities to Schedule castes, the unemployed persons will be assisted by way of establishing Dairy units, Piggery units, and Sheep/Goat units.
tags: ['Employment', 'Financial Assistance', 'Goat Unit', 'Livestock Unit', 'Milch Animals', 'Piggery Unit', 'Scheduled Caste', 'Self-employment', 'Sheep Unit', 'Subsidy', 'Unemployed']

name: Financial Assistance to Indigent Tamil Scholars
description: The scheme "Financial Assistance to Indigent Tamil Scholars" was launched by the Arts & Culture Department, Puducherry. The scheme aims to provide financial assistance of ₹1,500 per month to indigent artists aged 58 years & above & contribution to Tamil language & literature must be of significance.

name: Nehru Child Literature Prize
description: The Arts and Culture Department of Puducherry launched the "Nehru Child Literature Prize" scheme for authors/writers. Financial assistance with a certificate will be provided for their contribution to children's literature books published in Tamil.

name: Financial Assistance for Stage III & IV Cancer Patients
description: The scheme “Financial Assistance for Stage III & IV Cancer Patients” was launched by the Social Justice & Empowerment Department, Government of Haryana. Under this scheme, a monthly financial assistance of ₹3,000/- will be provided to Stage III & IV cancer patients of Haryana from 01.01.2024.

name: West Bengal Artisans Financial Benefit Scheme: Facilitation Supports
description: “Facilitation Supports” is a sub-scheme under "West Bengal Artisans Financial Benefit Scheme 2024”, implemented by the MSME and Textiles Dept, Government of West Bengal. It aims to provide various types of facilitation support to the artisans and Industrial Cooperative Societies.

name: Education Loan for Persons with Disabilities- Haryana
description: Under this scheme, education loans of up to ₹50 lakhs are provided to persons with disabilities (OH/VH/HH/MR) for pursuing professional and technical education both in India and abroad.

name: Comprehensive Educational Loan Scheme - Sikkim
description: The "Comprehensive Educational Loan Scheme" was launched by the Department of Personnel, and Reforms, Training, Public Grievances, Government of Sikkim. The scheme aims to provide loans free of interest for the duration of one particular course of study with one one-year moratorium period offered...

name: Education Loan Scheme- Credit Line 2 for Minority Community
description: The scheme is implemented by Haryana Backward Classes & Economically Weaker Sections Kalyan Nigam, aims to provide education loans to sections of minority population on the basis of "Creamy Layer". These loans support pursuing general/professional/technical courses at graduate levels or higher.

name: State Award for Teachers
description: The scheme "State Awards to Teachers" aims to celebrate the unique contribution of the finest teachers in the state and honor those who have improved the quality of school education and enriched students' lives. Ten state awards consisting of ₹100,000 and a citation each are provided to teachers.

name: Saksham Scheme for Backward Classes
description: Under the scheme, loans of up to ₹10,00,000/- are provided to young professionals for setting up Doctors' Clinics, Nursing Homes, Physiotherapy Clinics, Bio-Medical Labs, Lawyers' Offices, Engineering Units, Chemist Shops, Architect Offices, and similar establishments.

name: Financial Assistive Devices for Persons with Disabilities
description: The scheme is implemented by the Haryana Backward Classes & Economically Weaker Sections Kalyan Nigam. Under the scheme, loans of up to ₹5 lakhs are provided to persons with disabilities who are either employed in reputable organizations or have received confirmed appointment letters.

name: Term Loan Scheme for Backward Classes
description: The scheme is implemented by the Haryana Backward Classes & Economically Weaker Sections Kalyan Nigam. Under this scheme, loans of up to ₹15,00,000/- are provided at an annual interest rate of 6% to 8% to individuals from the Backward Classes to enhance their employability.

name: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS): Scheme For Reimbursement Of Stamp Duty
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: “Scheme For Reimbursement Of Stamp Duty'' under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)”, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims to provide reimbursement on Stamp duty to the new units as well as the units undertaking expansion/ diversification.

name: Scheme for Providing Employment Opportunities to Scheduled Castes by Establishing Livestock Units under Mukhya Mantri Antyodaya Parivaar Utthan Yojana
description: Under the scheme, an unemployed resident of Haryana belonging to the Scheduled Caste category can avail a subsidy for purchasing livestock. This subsidy will be provided after the establishment of the livestock units and can be availed as a loan by the beneficiary.

name: Scheme for Establishment of Backyard Poultry Units
description: The objective of the scheme is to improve the socio-economic and nutritional status of the poor families, small farmers and landless agricultural labourers and other economically weaker section of the society.

name: Subsidy for Developing Business Premises for Persons with Disabilities
description: The scheme is implemented by the Haryana Backward Classes & Economically Weaker Sections Kalyan Nigam. Under this scheme, loans up to ₹3 lakh are provided to persons with disabilities to develop business premises on their own land & start self-employment activities.

name: Chanakya Scheme for Swayam Upadhi
description: The "Chanakya Scheme for Swayam Upadhi” to encourage Brahmin entrepreneurs in Andhra Pradesh. The grant will be given against relevant approved asset acquisition for setting up new business entities or expanding existing/diversifying business entities in different areas.

name: Jharkhand Rajya Fasal Rahat Yojana
description: The scheme was launched by the Department of Agriculture, Animal Husbandry & Cooperative, Government of Jharkhand. This scheme is mainly to provide financial assistance to the farmers in the event of crop damage due to any natural calamity and natural accidents.

name: Grant for the Purchase of Tools/ Protective Gear for the Construction Workers
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: The "Grant for the Purchase of Tools/ Protective Gear for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,  U.T. Administration of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance to the eligible registered member for purchase of tools.

name: Grant of Token Amount for Construction of House for the Construction Workers
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: The "Grant of Token Amount for Construction of House for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,  U.T. Administration of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance to the eligible registered member for construction of house.

name: Sanction of Motorized Three Wheeler to Orthopedically Challenged
description: The "Sanction of Motorized Three Wheeler to Orthopedically Challenged" scheme aims to provide motorized three wheelers to orthopedically challenged persons. This initiative ensures that eligible individuals receive support to enhance their mobility and independence.

name: Education Loan Scheme under NSKFDC- Haryana
description: This scheme offers educational loans of up to ₹10 lakhs for studies within India and up to ₹20 lakhs for studies abroad. These loans are available to eligible students pursuing regular full-time recognized professional/technical courses in India or abroad.

name: Children With Special Needs Under Goa Sarva Shiksha Abhivan
description: The "Children With Special Needs (CWSN)" scheme aims to provide comprehensive educational support and resources tailored to the needs of children with disabilities. It is designed to ensure that every child, regardless of their disability type (intellectual, physical, etc.), receives the necessary a

name: Dairy Farming Scheme (HSFDC)
description: Under this scheme, the Corporation provides loans/benefits to individuals from Below Poverty Line (BPL) families, whose annual family income does not exceed ₹1,80,000/-, in both rural and urban areas for self-employment income generating activities such as dairy farming.

name: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) For Handicraft Artisans: Assistance For Capital Investment To Uplift The Economic Condition Of Artisans/ Persons
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: This is a sub-scheme under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)”, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, that aims to provide additional tools/equipment to SC/ST/OBC/EWS communities to generate adequate income and self-employment.

name: Grant for the Purchase of Tools/ Protective Gear for the Construction Workers
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: The "Grant for the Purchase of Tools/ Protective Gear for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,  U.T. Administration of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance to the eligible registered member for purchase of tools.

name: Grant of Token Amount for Construction of House for the Construction Workers
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: The "Grant of Token Amount for Construction of House for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,  U.T. Administration of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance to the eligible registered member for construction of house.

name: Financial Assistance to Ex-Servicemen of and above the Age of 60 Years and their Widows
description: Under the scheme, financial assistance of ₹3,000/- per month is given to ex-servicemen & widows of ex-serviceman of & above age of 60 years, who are not in receipt of any kind of pension/financial assistance or maintenance allowance either from any Department of Government of India/State Government.

name: Financial assistance for Marriage for the Construction Worker
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: The "Financial Assistance for Marriage for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,  U.T. Administration of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance for marriage of self and for children (upto 2 children) of the building workers.

name: Additional Pension to Widow of Ex-Serviceman having No Child
description: Under the scheme, an additional amount of ₹100/- per month, in addition to the pension amount, is provided to the widow of an ex-serviceman who dies while in service but not in any battle.

name: Term Loan Scheme for Backward Classes
description: The scheme is implemented by the Haryana Backward Classes & Economically Weaker Sections Kalyan Nigam. Under this scheme, loans of up to ₹15,00,000/- are provided at an annual interest rate of 6% to 8% to individuals from the Backward Classes to enhance their employability.

name: Gayathri Scheme for Academic Excellence
description: The "Gayathri Scheme for Academic Excellence" scheme aims to provide awards to the topper of the recognized and reputed School/ College/ Institute for his/her academic excellence in SSC/ Intermediate or equivalent/ Graduation/ Professional Education Course for the Academic year.

name: Tool Purchase Grant for the Construction Workers
description: “Tool Purchase Grant for the Construction Workers” scheme by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Dep.t, West Bengal, is a welfare scheme that provides one time reimbursement to each registered beneficiary who is with the Board for a period of at least 6 months for purchasing tools for his profession.

name: Miscarriage Benefit
description: The "Miscarriage Benefit'' scheme by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,West Bengal, is a welfare scheme that provides financial benefits for miscarriage up to two times in a lifetime to the eligible female beneficiaries or the wives of male beneficiaries.

name: Financial Assistance for Education of Self/ Children of Beneficiaries
description: The "Financial Assistance for Education of Self/ Children of Beneficiaries'' scheme by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, West Bengal, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance to the registered member or their children studying Higher Secondary and above.

name: Integrated Social Security Scheme: Pension to Physically Challenged Persons
description: Under this scheme, a monthly pension of ₹1,000/- is provided to poor physically handicapped persons (including those who are blind, deaf, or dumb) with a degree of disability 40% or above and having no source of income.

name: Scholarship for Fatherless Girls
description: The objective of this scheme is to support the education of girls who have lost their fathers and are studying in government schools. Under this scheme, scholarships ranging from ₹350/- to ₹450/- are provided to eligible girls from Class 1 to Class 12.

name: Digital J&K Internship Scheme
description: The "Digital J&K Internship Scheme" is an opportunity for the students to secure first-hand and practical work experience. It also aims at active participation in the learning process through experimentation and putting into practice the knowledge acquired in the studies.

name: Cost of Spectacle for the Construction Workers
description: The “Cost of Spectacle for the Construction Workers” scheme by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,West Bengal, is a welfare scheme that provides reimbursement for purchasing spectacle to each registered beneficiary if required.

name: Cost of Hearing Aid for the Construction Workers
description: The “Cost of Hearing Aid for the Construction Workers” scheme by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,West Bengal, is a welfare scheme that provides reimbursement for purchasing Hearing Aids to each registered beneficiary if required.

name: Accidental Benefit
description: The "Accidental Benefit'' scheme by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,West Bengal, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance to the beneficiary in case of hospitalization and disability due to an accident.

name: Maternity Benefit
description: The "Maternity Benefit'' scheme by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,West Bengal, is a welfare scheme that provides maternity benefits up to two times in a lifetime to the eligible female beneficiaries or the wives of male beneficiaries.

name: Pension Benefit
description: The "Pension Benefit'' scheme by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,West Bengal, is a welfare scheme that provides a monthly pension after completion of 60 years to the eligible registered member.

name: Mukhya Mantri Mahila Sashaktikaran Yojana
description: Under this scheme, permanent training will be provided for the economic and social upliftment of women suffering from any form of violence and living in difficult circumstances so that they can get employment.

name: Bhraman - Darshan Yojana
description: The "Bhraman-Darshan Yojana" was launched by the Animal and Fisheries Resources Department, Government of Bihar aims to educate fish farmers in Bihar about the latest fisheries techniques through organized excursions, enabling them to adopt and implement these technologies in their water source.....

name: Retirement Relief in Quitting Service for the Construction Workers
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: The "Retirement Relief in Quitting Service for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,  U.T. Administration of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides a certain amount to the eligible registered worker on quitting service after attaining age of 60 years.

name: Distribution of Female Menstrual Hygiene Kit for the Construction Workers
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: The "Distribution of Female Menstrual Hygiene Kit for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, U.T. Administration of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides Menstrual Hygiene Kit to registered female beneficiaries.

name: Mukhyamantri Vidwa Evam Ekal Naari Awas Yojana
description: The "Mukhyamantri Vidwa Evam Ekal Naari Awas Yojana" was launched by the Department of Social Justice and Empowerment, Government of Himachal Pradesh. The scheme aims to provide financial grants for the construction of houses to economically weak widows and single women.

name: Financial Assistance to WW II Veteran and Widows of WW II Veterans
description: Under the scheme, financial assistance of ₹10,000/- per month shall be given to Ex-servicemen of the Pre-Independence Era (World War II Veterans) & their widows, who are not in receipt of any kind of pension/financial assistance either from any Department of Government of India/State Government.

name: Bharati Scheme for Education Professional Education Course - Chartered Accountancy Final
description: The "Bharati Scheme for Education Professional Education Course - Chartered Accountancy Final" encourages Brahmin students of Andhra Pradesh to continue their education. Under this scheme, financial assistance for the academic year will be granted to eligible poor Brahmin students.

name: Disability Relief - Telangana
description: The "Disability Relief" scheme was launched by the Telangana Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, LET&F (Labour) Dept. Telangana aimed at providing financial support to registered building & other construction workers who suffer from total or partial permanent disabilities.

name: Disability Aids and Appliances - Telangana
description: The "Disability Aids and Appliances" scheme was launched by the Telangana Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, LET&F (Labour) Dept. Telangana to provide artificial limbs, wheelchairs, tricycles, & other fabricated appliances to registered construction workers who have lost their limb

name: Sindhu Darshan Scheme in Ladakh
description: The objective of this scheme is to provide financial assistance to the pilgrims of the state going on Sindhu Darshan pilgrimage. Under this scheme, the State Government will reimburse 50% of the total expenses incurred during the pilgrimage, up to a maximum of ₹10,000/- per pilgrim.

name: Sri Lanka's Sita Temple Tour
description: The objective of this scheme is to provide financial assistance to state pilgrims traveling to the Sita Temple & Ashoka Vatika in Sri Lanka and the Angkor Wat Temple in Cambodia. Under this scheme, the State Government will reimburse 50% of the expenses of the journey, up to a maximum of ₹30,000/-.

name: Rehabilitation of Cured Leprosy Persons: Assistance to Parents
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to the parents of Cured Leprosy Persons in order to support such parents in successfully bringing up their children against societal intolerance, stigma, discrimination and violence.

name: Sweekruti: Pre & Post Matric Scholarship
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to Transgender students studying at post matriculation or post-secondary stage to enable them to complete their education. These scholarships are available to transgender students  for studies in India only and awarded where the applicant is studying.

name: Rehabilitation of Cured Leprosy Persons: Pre & Post-Matric Scholarship
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to the parents of Cured Leprosy Persons in order to support such parents in successfully bringing up their children against societal intolerance, stigma, discrimination and violence.

name: Disability Benefit Who Met With an Accident at Worksite
description: The "Disability Benefit Who Met With an Accident at Worksite" was launched by the Tripura Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Dept. The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to registered construction worker who suffer from disabilities due to accident at their worksite

name: State Government ST Scholarship (Class 1 to 8)
description: The scheme was launched by the Tribal Affairs Department, Government of Madhya Pradesh, aims to give benefits for improving the educational status of scheduled tribe students. Under this scheme, scholarships are provided to Scheduled Tribe students in Classes 1 to 8.

name: Financial Assistance for the Education of Children of the Beneficiary (O.B.O.C.W.W.B)
description: The “Financial Assistance for the Education of Children of the Beneficiary” scheme by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, Odisha, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance for education to the children of the registered member of the board for a period of one year or more.

name: Dr. Bhim Rao Ambedkar Meritorious Student Award Scheme
description: This scheme awards special prizes to meritorious Scheduled Caste students who secure the highest marks in the Class 10th and 12th board examinations conducted by the Board of Secondary Education, CBSE, and ICSE in the state.

name: Assistance for Funeral Expenses (O.B.O.C.W.W.B)
