description: The scheme aims to provide training and equipment to boost inland fisheries among Scheduled Tribe beneficiaries.

name: Rotavator/Thresher Machine Equipment Assistance Scheme
description: The scheme aims to support BPL Scheduled Tribe farmers in tribal areas by providing financial assistance to purchase rotavators and thresher machines.

name: Janani Suraksha Yojana (JSY)
description: The scheme aims to reduce maternal and neonatal mortality by promoting institutional deliveries among poor pregnant women. It offers cash assistance for institutional and home deliveries, along with antenatal and postnatal care support, primarily benefiting poor pregnant women across India.

name: Swami Vivekananda Exam Oriented Residential Training
description: The scheme aims to provide exam-oriented residential training for aspiring candidates seeking recruitment in defence and police forces. It offers comprehensive coaching and preparation for Army, Air Force, Navy, Paramilitary and Police recruitment examinations.

name: PMMSY: Refrigerated vehicles - Gujarat
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance for the purchase of vehicles. Through this scheme, subsidy benefits are provided to general, women, and SC/ST category beneficiaries.

name: Trekking Traction Centre Home-stay Grant Scheme
description: The scheme aims to promote tourism and improve local livelihoods in rural areas near trekking routes. The scheme provides financial assistance to villagers for constructing or renovating home-stays in traditional hill-style architecture, ensuring quality accommodation for tourists.

name: Pradhan Mantri Surakshit Matritva Abhiyan
description: The scheme aims to provide fixed-day assured, comprehensive and quality antenatal care universally to all pregnant women in 2nd and 3rd trimester on the 9th of every month. It offers free comprehensive antenatal care services at government health facilities.

name: Promotion of Tiatr Through Academic Activities
description: The scheme aims to foster interest in Tiatr among students and enthusiasts through academic activities like talks, symposia, seminars, and workshops. It covers activity expenditures, honorarium for resource persons, and provides materials, benefiting educational institutions and individuals.

name: Employment Linked Skill Training Programme (ELSTP)
description: The scheme aims to provide free, self-employment-oriented training courses to unemployed/school dropouts/other disadvantaged youth of the state. It is a state-sponsored scheme that offers training in fields such as IT, healthcare, agriculture, beauty and wellness, electronics, and more.

name: Life Saving Technique Water Sports Operator
description: The scheme aims to train youth of the state as certified trainers and operators in water life-saving techniques. Under this scheme, training opportunities are provided to selected beneficiaries to develop water safety and rescue skills.

name: Mobile Learning Centre (UKBOCWWB)
description: The scheme aims to provide education to the children of registered construction workers at construction sites through Mobile Learning Centre buses, ensuring their better and brighter future.

name: 6% Interest Subsidy on Loans taken through Banks up to a Limit of Rs.5 Lakh for Self-Employment
description: The scheme aims to promote self-employment among scheduled tribe (ST) individuals by making business loans affordable. Under this scheme, ST beneficiaries availing loans for self-employment are provided a interest subsidy to reduce financial burden and encourage entrepreneurship.

name: Direct Finance Scheme by NSFDC (GSCDC)
description: Under this scheme, loans are offered at a low interest rate, ranging from 1% to 5%, specifically for self-employment to scheduled caste (SC) individuals.

name: Lifetime Contribution to Tiatr Awards (Non-Commercial)
description: The scheme recognizes and honors non-commercial artistes who have contributed immensely for the development of tiatr, its song and music through yearly Tiatr Festivals/Competitions organized by Kala Academy and by organizing tiatrs in villages, as well as artistes who have enriched Konkani Tiatr.

name: Kala Utsav Pratiyogita - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to promote and encourage artistic talent among school students of Classes 9 to 12.

name: Centrally Sponsored Scheme for Implementation of the Protection of Civil Rights Act, 1955 and the Scheduled Castes and the Scheduled Tribes (Prevention of Atrocities) Act, 1989
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: The scheme aims to ensure effective implementation of Protection of Civil Rights Act, 1955 and Prevention of Atrocities Act, 1989. It provides relief, rehabilitation, and support to Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes victims of atrocities and incentives for inter-caste marriages.

name: Scheme for Economic Empowerment of De-notified, Nomadic and Semi-Nomadic Tribes - "Educational Empowerment" Component
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: The scheme aims to provide good coaching quality for De-notified, Nomadic and Semi-Nomadic Tribes candidates to enable them to appear in competitive examinations. Provides free coaching and stipend support to students from these marginalized communities.

name: Investment Grant for Farmers with More than 2 Hectares of Agricultural Land
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to farmers owning more than 2 hectares of agricultural land who suffer crop losses due to natural disasters.

name: Scheme of Assistance to State Scheduled Castes Development Corporations
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: The scheme aims to provide economic development assistance to Scheduled Castes living below the poverty line through financial support and credit facilitation. It provides share capital, margin money loans, and subsidies to Scheduled Castes families for employment-oriented schemes.

name: Maths Wizard & Spelling Genius - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to enhance the interest of Class 5 students in Mathematics and English by organizing competitions at the school, block, district, and state levels, and encouraging them through rewards.

name: Loktantra Senani Samman Pension (Police Line Yojana) for the democracy fighters of the state imprisoned under MISA/DIR during the emergency period (from 25.06.1975 to 21.03.1977)
description: The scheme provides financial assistance in the form of a monthly pension of ₹20,000/- to the democracy fighters of the state who were imprisoned under MISA/DIR during the Emergency period (from 25.06.1975 to 21.03.1977).

name: Higher Education Scholarship Scheme
description: The “Higher Education Scholarship Scheme” was launched by the Education Department, Government of Gujarat. The scheme objective is that students studying in various courses at Government and Grant-In-Aid Schools and Colleges are eligible for this scheme.

name: Competition of Zomnivoilo Khell
description: The scheme aims to preserve and promote the traditional folk theatre of Goa called 'The Khell'. It provides financial assistance to participating theatre troupes in annual competitions organized across Goa. The applications for this scheme are accepted offline through prescribed application forms.

name: All Goa One-Act Play Competition in Konkani
description: The scheme aims to attract youth towards dramatic activities and promote Goan culture through Konkani theatre. It provides cash awards, mementos, and certificates for best One-Act Play performances along with individual category awards for youth, clubs, and associations.

name: Uttarakhand Compensation Scheme for Women Victims/Survivors of Sexual Offences and Other Crimes, 2020
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance/compensation ranging from a minimum of ₹3 lakh to a maximum of ₹10 lakh to women victims and survivors of sexual offences, as well as to other women victims of crime in the state.

name: Lifetime Contribution to Khell/Khell-Tiatr Awards
description: The scheme aims to recognize veteran Khell/Khell-Tiatr artistes who have made significant contributions to this traditional art form. It honors deserving artistes with lifetime achievement awards and cash burse.

name: Tiatr Script Writing Competition
description: The scheme aims to encourage new generation playwrights to create quality Tiatr scripts and enrich Konkani language. It provides cash prizes and publication opportunities for original traditional format scripts.

name: PM Janjati Adivasi Nyaya Maha Abhiyan (PM JANMAN)
description: The scheme aims to improve the socio-economic status of PVTGs by saturating families and habitations with basic facilities and services. It provides 11 critical infrastructure and welfare interventions, including housing, water, electricity, and connectivity.

name: Prime Minister’s Rural Development Fellows Scheme
description: The scheme aims to provide short term catalytic support to the District Administration in backward districts to improve programme delivery and simultaneously develop a cadre of Development Facilitators. Fellows receive professional experience, structured learning, and a monthly stipend.

name: Centrally Sponsored Scheme of Upgradation of Merit of Scheduled Caste Students
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: The scheme aims to upgrade the merit of Scheduled Caste students by providing them with facilities for all round development through education in residential or non-residential schools, addressing their educational deficiencies that prevent them from taking advantage of reservation quotas.

name: Lifetime Contribution to Konkani Cinema Award
description: The scheme provides a prestigious annual award consisting of a shawl, memento, citation, and cash purse of ₹50,000/-, with recognition given at a special function held on 24th April every year on the anniversary of the release of the first Konkani film 'Mogacho Anvddo' by late Al-Jerry Braganza.

name: Tiatr Competition for Educational Institutions at Higher Secondary/College/University Level
description: The scheme aims to encourage and develop Tiatr activities among students of educational institutions. It provides financial support and awards to participating institutions for staging traditional Tiatr performances in competition format.

name: Compensation for Loss of Life and Property Caused by Wild Animals in and around Forest Areas: Assistance for Loss of Cattle Due to Wild Animal Attacks
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to owners of domestic animals who suffer losses due to attacks by wild animals in forest areas and their surroundings. Under this scheme, a grant ranging from ₹3,000 to ₹40,000 per animal is provided, depending on the species and extent of loss.
tags: ['Compensation', 'Domestic Animals', 'Livestock Loss', 'Loss Of Cattle', 'Wild Animal Attacks']

name: Scholarship Scheme of Sainik School Chhingchhip, Mizoram
description: The scheme aims to award financial scholarships to eligible boys of Mizoram domicile who are admitted to Sainik School Chhingchhip, specifically to foster their development and prepare them for future entry into the officer’s cadre of the Armed Forces. Benefits include coverage for School Fee, etc.

name: Financial Assistance to Commercial Tiatr Troupes/Directors/Producers for Stage Setting
description: The scheme aims to encourage all round development of the Tiatr in all aspects by providing encouragement to commercial tiatr directors and producers to bring in development in stage setting, addressing the need for improved theatrical infrastructure and production quality.

name: Freeship Less than ₹1,00,000/- (UG Students Only)
description: The scheme aims to provide tuition fee concessions to students enrolled in 3-year undergraduate programs and 4-year veterinary programs. Through this scheme, tuition fee concessions are provided to students in higher years of study whose tuition fees are less than ₹1,00,000/-.

name: Mahila Dairy Vikas Pariyojana - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to empower rural women in Uttarakhand by promoting their active participation in the dairy sector through Women Milk Producers Cooperative Societies, enhancing milk production, and providing training, incentives, and awareness programs for sustainable livelihood development.

name: Development and Dissemination of e-Content
description: The scheme aims to provide free, high-quality e-learning materials to students of classes 9 to 12, covering subjects such as Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English, etc. in collaboration with reputed ed-tech platforms.

name: Kutirjyoti Yojana Gujarat
description: The scheme aims to provide free household electricity connections to Scheduled Tribe families in tribal areas.

name: Research Study/Seminar (Grant-in-Aid Scheme)
state: Ministry Of Statistics and Programme Implementation
description: The scheme aims to promote Research Studies, Seminars, and Travel Grants Assistance in official statistics. It provides financial assistance and data support to eligible research institutions/organizations and Central Government officials to bridge data gaps.

name: Mukhyamantri Ayushman Aarogya Yojana
description: The Mukhyamantri Ayushman Arogya Yojana, launched on 1 May 2021, aims to reduce medical expenses by offering free treatment for 1,798 procedures in government and empanelled private hospitals. Eligible NFSA, SECC 2011 families, contract workers, small farmers, and others can avail benefits.

name: Doodh Sanjeevani Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide fortified, flavored, double toned pasteurized milk to students, pregnant women and lactating women. The scheme is implemented by the Anganwadi Centers and also by the Child Development Project Officers.

name: Award of Merit Scholarship for Agricultural Engineering Students (B.Tech 3rd/4th Year)
description: The scheme aims to support meritorious students pursuing B.Tech in Agricultural Engineering in their 3rd and 4th years by providing scholarship of ₹2000/- per month for one year.

name: Kisan Credit Card (Pashupalan)
description: The scheme aims to provide short-term working capital loans for livestock activities by offering eligible livestock farmers interest-subsidized loans for operational purposes through banks.

name: Vishesh Abhiyaan – ‘Hamdard’
description: The scheme aims to organize special campaigns for senior citizens, mentally and physically challenged individuals, and other destitute people in the state to make them aware of welfare schemes, their legal rights, access to benefits, skill development, personal security & protection, etc.

name: Compensation for Human Death or Injury Caused by Wild Animals
description: The scheme aims to provide financial relief to victims or families affected by wild animal attacks in both urban and rural areas through timely monetary compensation.

name: Pandit Omkarnath Music Competition
description: The scheme aims to honour the memory of Pandit Omkarnath and promote classical music among young artists by organizing competitive platforms for singing, vocal, and percussion performances. Classical music artists in two age categories can participate.

name: Research and Development Grant
description: The scheme aims to encourage scientific research to address the state’s problems by providing grants and technical support to scientists, researchers, and academic institutions across the state.

name: Grant In Aid Hostels
description: The scheme aims to provide boarding and lodging facilities to tribal students who wish to pursue primary, secondary and higher secondary education. Free lodging and boarding facilities are provided to intended beneficiaries who are students studying in standards 5th to 12th.

name: PRISM (Promoting Innovations in Individuals, Start-ups and MSMEs): Category-2: Fabrication of Working Model/Process Know-how/Testing & Trial/Patenting/Technology Transfer
description: The scheme aims to promote innovations in individuals, start-ups, and Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (PRISM). It offers financial support (up to ₹20,00,000/-) for Indian Citizens working on innovation projects requiring fabrication of working models, patenting, or technology transfer.

name: Special Scheme for Increasing the Storage Capacity of Perishable Products
description: The scheme aims to increase the storage capacity of perishable products by providing grant assistance for cold storage facilities.

name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to promote & support organic farming among farmers in Uttarakhand. The scheme provides financial assistance of ₹9,000/- per hectare to farmers for the purchase of organic inputs, including seeds, compost, green manure, biofertilizers, biopesticides, neem oil, etc.

name: Sub-Mission on Agricultural Mechanization (SMAM) for Custom Hiring Centres / Big Farmers - Uttarakhand
description: Under this scheme, individual large farmers, farmer groups, cooperatives, self-help groups, and custom hiring centres in the state can purchase agricultural equipment at a subsidized rate, with the Government of India providing a maximum subsidy of 40%.

name: Sub-Mission on Agricultural Mechanization - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to encourage farm mechanization purchasing and providing 50% subsidy/financial assistance to SC/ST, small and marginal, and women farmers (of all categories), while 40% subsidy/financial assistance is provided to other (large) farmers.

name: Goa State Logistics and Warehousing Incentives Scheme: Subsidy towards Upgradation in Transportation through Tracking Devices
description: The scheme aims to provide a one-time financial allowance for upgrading transportation infrastructure by installing tracking devices on goods carriers. It offers a reimbursement of 50% of the installation expenditure, capped at ₹5,000/- (Indian Rupees 5,000/-) per device, to eligible entities.

name: Dr. A.N. Mukhopadhyay Gold Medal Award (B.Sc. Agriculture - Final Year Student)
description: The scheme aims to encourage meritorious students pursuing a B.Sc. Agriculture course in their final year of study, thereby recognizing their academic excellence and providing financial support to reduce their burden.

name: STEM Lab
description: It aims to promote hands-on learning in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics by establishing labs across all blocks, giving students and teachers practical exposure to STEM experiments.

name: Smt. Bimla Rani Memorial Award (B.Sc. Ag., B.V.Sc. & A.H., B.H.Sc. & B.F.Sc.)
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance and encourage meritorious students pursuing Bachelor of Science in Agriculture (B.Sc. Ag.), Bachelor of Veterinary Science and Animal Husbandry (B.V.Sc. & A.H.), Bachelor of Home Science (B.H.Sc.), and Bachelor of Fisheries Science (B.F.Sc.) courses.

name: Smt. Uma Gupta Fellowship for M.Sc. Agriculture (Genetics & Plant Breeding) Students
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance and encourage meritorious students pursuing the M.Sc. Agriculture (Genetics & Plant Breeding) course by offering a fellowship of ₹1000/- for three semesters, thereby reducing their economic burden.

name: Bari (Kitchen Garden) Scheme
description: The scheme aims to promote kitchen gardening among poor and small/marginal farmers and agricultural laborers living below the poverty line by providing free vegetable seed packets.

name: Exhibition Fair and Publicity
description: The scheme aims to promote departmental schemes and disseminate information about the technology of fruit, flower, vegetable, and spice crops to farmers through exhibitions and seminars organized at the district and block levels.

name: State Millet Mission
description: The mission aims to promote millet cultivation, ensure fair prices for farmers, and strengthen food security in the state. It seeks to support farmers, particularly in mountain districts, by procuring millet crops such as Mandua and Jhangora at the minimum support price through cooperative groups.

name: Allotment of Shops in Kisan Bazaar
description: The scheme aims to facilitate trade in products other than agricultural produce by providing commercial shops in Kisan Bazaars. The shops are allotted to eligible residents of Uttarakhand through public notices published in newspapers and displayed at public places.

name: Scheme to Grant Monthly Financial Assistance to the Persons Engaged in Traditional Occupations/Businesses including Motorcycle Pilots
description: The scheme aims to provide Social Security and Financial Support for healthy living to those engaged in traditional occupations/businesses and motorcycle pilots. It offers monthly financial assistance of ₹1,000/- to eligible persons of Goan Origin who meet specified age and income criteria.

name: Madhya Pradesh Lok Vaniki Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide for the management of tree covered areas located on private land and revenue land under the MP Public Forestry Act, 2001. The scheme benefits landowners, Gram Panchayats, or Gram Sabhas by allowing them to undertake the scientific management of their tree covered areas.

name: Free Blood to Patients - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to ensure the availability of blood free of cost to all patients admitted in government hospitals across the state. Under this scheme, blood is provided free of cost by government blood banks to all in-patients who require transfusion during treatment.

name: Sparsh Abhiyan: Surgery to Prevent Disability of Poor and Destitute Disabled People of Madhya Pradesh
description: The scheme aims to provide surgical treatment to prevent disability among poor and destitute disabled persons. Benefits include financial assistance/reimbursement for various surgeries related to visual, hearing, bone impairment, and leprosy, available to eligible residents of Madhya Pradesh.

name: Assistance Towards Sugarcane Supplied By The Sugarcane Growers
description: The scheme aims to assist Sugarcane Growers to take up sugarcane cultivation in the State of Goa. It provides financial support to farmers cultivating sugarcane, paid based on actual tonnage supplied at the factory weighbridge as per the Fair & Remunerative Price.

name: Mukhyamantri Krishak Mitra Yojana
description: The scheme aims to create necessary infrastructure by the distribution company for providing permanent pump connections to farmers or groups of farmers.

name: SC Girl Child Literacy Incentive Amount - Class 11th
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to Scheduled Caste girl students of Madhya Pradesh enrolled in Class 11 to encourage them to continue their education and prevent dropouts.

name: Mukhyamantri Bijli Bill Bakaya Maaf Samadhan Scheme
description: The scheme aims to provide relief in payment of outstanding electricity bills to the registered workers, construction workers, and BPL consumers under the "Mukhyamantri Mazdoor Kalyan (Sambal) Yojana".

name: PRISM (Promoting Innovations in Individuals, Start-ups and MSMEs): Category-2: Fabrication of Working Model/Process Know-how/Testing & Trial/Patenting/Technology Transfer
description: The scheme aims to promote innovations in individuals, start-ups, and Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (PRISM). It offers financial support (up to ₹20,00,000/-) for Indian Citizens working on innovation projects requiring fabrication of working models, patenting, or technology transfer.

name: Annapurna Scheme: Seed Production Programme
description: The scheme aims to enhance the production and economic status of Scheduled Caste and Scheduled Tribe small and marginal farmers. It provides Foundation or Certified Grade I seeds for high-yielding food grain crops with a 75% subsidy to registered farmers operating near Government agricultural farms.

name: Special Scheme for Increasing the Storage Capacity of Perishable Products
description: The scheme aims to increase the storage capacity of perishable products by providing grant assistance for cold storage facilities.

name: Mukhyamantri Yuva Annadoot Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide employment opportunities to unemployed youth/women for 7 years by involving them in the transport of food grains from Madhya Pradesh State Civil Supplies Corporation centers to fair price shops. Benefits include an interest subsidy/grant.

name: Cancer Day Care Centre - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to ensure early detection & timely treatment of cancer by providing accessible & affordable healthcare services within the state. Under this initiative, free screening for common cancers such as oral, breast, & cervical cancer is being conducted across all districts of Uttarakhand.

name: Allotment of Commercial Godown
description: The scheme aims to facilitate ease of doing business for traders by providing licensed traders with access to commercial godowns for storage and management of their goods.

name: Scheme to Grant Monthly Financial Assistance to the Persons Engaged in Traditional Occupations/Businesses including Motorcycle Pilots
description: The scheme aims to provide Social Security and Financial Support for healthy living to those engaged in traditional occupations/businesses and motorcycle pilots. It offers monthly financial assistance of ₹1,000/- to eligible persons of Goan Origin who meet specified age and income criteria.

name: Madhya Pradesh Lok Vaniki Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide for the management of tree covered areas located on private land and revenue land under the MP Public Forestry Act, 2001. The scheme benefits landowners, Gram Panchayats, or Gram Sabhas by allowing them to undertake the scientific management of their tree covered areas.

name: Livestock Mission Scheme - Interest Payment on Loan
description: The scheme aims to promote self-employment opportunities at the local level by encouraging livestock-based entrepreneurship and reducing the financial burden on beneficiaries through payment of 90% of the bank loan interest by the State Government.

name: The Grant of Honorarium to Legal Researcher Scheme
description: The scheme aims to engage Legal Research Assistants to handle legal issues and court matters for major Departments of the Administration, thereby ensuring timely submission of defense documents and reducing departmental embarrassment in Courts. It gives fixed honorarium of ₹25,000/- per month.

name: Micro Finance Scheme of NMDFC
description: Under the scheme, an amount of Rs. 1 lakh under credit Line-1 & upto  Rs. 1.5 lakh under Credit Line-2 is extended to each member of SHG (belong to Minority communities) at interest rate of 7% & 10% respectively.  Concession of 2% is extended to women beneficiaries under Credit Line-2.

name: District Plan - Sugarcane Development Scheme
description: The scheme aims to enhance sugarcane productivity & quality in Uttarakhand by providing financial & technical support to farmers for improved seed production, seed & soil treatment, pest & disease management, thereby promoting sustainable farming & strengthening the livelihoods of sugarcane growers.

name: Uttarakhand Rajya Shilp Ratna Puraskar
description: The scheme aims to honor exceptionally skilled artisans of the state for their outstanding contributions to the traditional craft sector. This annual award celebrates heritage, promotes excellence, and supports artisans whose expertise has preserved and enriched cultural craftsmanship.

name: Ude Desh ka Aam Nagrik (UDAN) Yojana - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to make air travel affordable and accessible for all citizens, enhance regional connectivity within Uttarakhand and promote tourism.

name: Pension Scheme for Craftsmen
description: The scheme aims to provide financial support and social security to traditional artisans of Uttarakhand who are aged 60 years or above and belong to families living below the poverty line.

name: Drip Irrigation Sprinkler
description: The scheme aims to promote efficient and sustainable irrigation for horticultural crops by providing farmers with modern irrigation systems and financial subsidies to enhance productivity and water conservation.

name: Community Food Processing Centre
description: The scheme aims to promote skill development and entrepreneurship in food processing by enabling individuals and farmers to process fruits and vegetables, add value to their produce, and enhance income opportunities through community-based facilities.

name: NIPUN Bharat Mission - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to ensure that all children aged 3 to 9 achieve foundational literacy and numeracy by creating an enabling learning environment across all schools in Uttarakhand.

name: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to promote growth of fisheries sector by providing financial assistance & technical support for modern fisheries activities, thereby increasing fish production,improving livelihood opportunities,& encouraging adoption of advanced fisheries infrastructure among eligible beneficiaries.

name: Ambedkar Social Innovation and Incubation Mission (ASIIM)
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: The scheme aims to boost entrepreneurship and innovation among SC students and SC differently-abled youth by providing focused support to translate innovative, technology-oriented business ideas into successful commercial enterprises. It offers equity funding and hand-holding support.

name: Financial Assistance to Students who Cleared Civil Services Prelims Conducted by UPSC/APSC
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to students belonging to the Tea Tribes and Adivasi Community who have cleared the Civil Services Preliminary Examination. The benefits support their preparation for the Mains Examination to ensure their success.

name: Drip Irrigation Sprinkler
description: The scheme aims to promote efficient and sustainable irrigation for horticultural crops by providing farmers with modern irrigation systems and financial subsidies to enhance productivity and water conservation.

name: Tubewell Installation /Pond Construction
description: The scheme aims to enhance irrigation facilities for farmers in Uttarakhand by providing financial assistance for the construction of tubewells and ponds, thereby improving water availability, supporting horticultural development, and increasing agricultural productivity.

name: Flower Area Expansion
description: The scheme aims to promote and expand flower cultivation by providing cultivators in Uttarakhand access to quality flower planting material at a subsidized cost, thereby increasing flower production and enhancing farmers’ income.

name: Scheme for Providing Counseling to the Trainees of Government Industrial Training Institutes at Directorate of Skill Development & Entrepreneurship
description: The scheme aims to provide youth-friendly counseling services in Government Industrial Training Institutes, delivered by appointed Counselors, to assist trainees suffering from mental, physical, or psychological stress. The benefit is the provision of a safe, confidential space.

name: Incentives to Industries For Training Prospective Employees Scheme
description: The scheme aims to address the skill gap in Goa by supporting industrial units to provide demand-driven Short Term Training Courses through recognized institutions, thereby creating manpower suitable for the industry. It offers reimbursement for 60% of training costs up to ₹60,000/- per trainee.

name: Minimum Support Price for Aromatic Oils/Products - Centre for Aromatic Plants
description: The scheme aims to provide registered farmers engaged in aromatic cultivation with a fair price and a guaranteed market for their produce.

name: Deen Dayal Antyodaya Yojana - National Urban Livelihoods Mission (DAY-NULM): Support for Urban Homeless – Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to provide safe and accessible night shelter facilities to homeless people living under the open sky in urban areas, ensuring they have protection and support at any time.

name: Fruit Area Expansion
description: The scheme aims to increase fruit production by encouraging farmers to establish new orchards, providing fruit plants at a 50% subsidy to support the expansion of fruit cultivation across Uttarakhand.

name: Scheme for Small Road Transport Operators (SRTOs)
description: The scheme aims to extend financial assistance for acquiring new transport vehicles, including goods and passenger vehicles. It provides term loans covering up to 70% of the vehicle cost, excluding road tax and insurance, repayable over a max. of 58 monthly instalments.

name: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme
description: A non-contributory pension scheme to provide social security to widows of poor family (BPL)  of the society.

name: New Swarnima Scheme For Women
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: A term loan scheme by the Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment for women entrepreneurs from backward classes to obtain a loan of up to ₹2,00,000/- @ 5% per annum, thereby providing them social & financial security.

name: Pandit Deendayal Upadhyay National Welfare Fund For Sportspersons
description: The scheme of PDUNWFS is being implemented with the objective of providing financial assistance to outstanding sportspersons/family members living in indigent circumstances for various purposes like ameliorate condition, medical treatment, injuries, procurement of sports equipment etc.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana - Recognition Of Prior Learning
state: Ministry Of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship
description: A skill development scheme by Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship that enables Indian youth with prior learning experience or skills to obtain industry-relevant skill certification.

name: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana
description: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana (PMJJBY) is an insurance scheme offering life insurance cover for death due to any reason. It is a one-year cover, renewable from year to year. The scheme is offered by banks/post offices and administered through life insurance companies.

name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act
description: An employment scheme by the MoRD, providing provide at least 100 days of guaranteed wage employment in a financial year to every rural household whose adult members volunteer to do unskilled work. Any Indian citizen above the age of 18 years and residing in a rural area can apply to this scheme.

name: Janani Shishu Suraksha Karyakram
description: A scheme by Ministry of MoHFW for pregnant women who access government health facilities for their delivery. to absolutely free and no expense delivery, including caesarean section. Essential care is provided to the mother and her neonate within 48 hours.

name: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme-2
state: Ministry Of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship
description:
To promote apprenticeship training in the country, by providing partial stipend support
to the apprentices engaged under the Apprentice Act, 1961, undertaking capacity building of the apprenticeship ecosystem, and providing advocacy assistance to the stakeholders.

name: PM Street Vendor’s AtmaNirbhar Nidhi (PM SVANidhi)
description: PM SVANidhi is a micro-credit scheme launched on 1st June 2020 by the MoHUA to provide handholding support to street vendors. The scheme facilitates a working capital collateral-free loan of ₹10,000, with subsequent loans of ₹20,000 and ₹50,000 with a 7% interest subsidy.
tags: ['Affordable Credit', 'Digital Empowerment', 'Enhanced Livelihood', 'Street Vendors', 'Working Capital Loan']

name: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana
state: Ministry of Women and Child Development
description: The scheme is to provide maternity benefits to women belonging to socially and economically disadvantaged sections of society. For first child the maternity benefit of ₹5,000 is provided in two instalments under PMMVY and second child, it is ₹6,000 is to be provided subject to second child is girl.
tags: ['Cash Incentive', 'Financial Assistance', 'Good Nutrition', 'Maternity Benefit Programme', 'Pregnant Women']

name: State Marriage Assistance Scheme For Poor Girls
description: A social welfare scheme by the Social Welfare Department of the Government of Jammu & Kashmir, for Poor Girls of Marriageable Age who belong to either AAY (Antyodaya Anna Yojana) or PHH (Priority Households) ration card holder families. The scheme is operational in all the districts across the UT.

name: Scheme For Award Of Financial Assistance For Education To The Wards Of Beedi/Cine/IOMC/LSDM Workers – Pre & Post-Matric
description: A scholarship scheme by the Directorate of Social Welfare, Ministry of Labour and Employment wherein financial assistance for education is provided to the Wards of Beedi/IOMC/LSDM Workers, varying from ₹1,000/- to ₹25,000/- per student per annum. The benefits are transferred through the DBT system.

name: AFFDF-Financial Assistance For Treatment Of Serious Diseases To Non Pensioner Ex-Servicemen (All Ranks)/Widows
description: A scheme to provide financial assistance to a non-pensioner Ex-Servicemen of all ranks and widows to meet medical expenses related to treatment of approved serious diseases like cancer, renal failure, knee replacement and heart surgery.

name: National Talent Scholarship Undergraduate
state: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
description: National Talent Scholarship (NTS) was launched by the Indian Council of Agricultural Research for students pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's degree program in an ICAR-recognized agricultural university located outside of his/her state of domicile.

name: NSAP - Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme
description: "Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme" is one of the five sub-schemes of the National Social Assistance Programme. Under IGNOAPS, citizens living Below Poverty Line and 60 years or above in age are eligible to apply. A monthly pension of ₹ 200 up to 79 years and ₹ 500 thereafter.

name: Merit·cum·Means Scholarships For Under Graduate Studies In Various Branches Of Agriculture And Animal Science Subjects
state: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
description: The scheme of "Merit·cum·Means Scholarships For Under Graduate Studies In Various Branches Of Agriculture And Animal Science Subjects" was introduced by ICAR with a view to attracting meritorious undergraduate students to prosecute their studies up to graduation level.

name: AICTE – Mitacs Globalink Research Internship (GRI) Scheme
description: AICTE, on 23rd February 2018, entered into a Memorandum of Understanding with Mathematics of Information Technology and Computer Systems (MITACS) Canada for AICTE – MITACS Globalink Research Internships (GRI) Program to foster cross-border partnerships.

name: National Overseas Scholarship For Scheduled Tribes (ST) Students
description: A scholarship scheme by the Ministry of Tribal Affairs for regular, full-time ST students to obtain higher education (post-graduate courses viz. Masters, Ph.D. and Post-Doctoral Research) from foreign institutes/universities. The Scheme is implemented through the Indian Embassies.

name: National Fellowship & Scholarship For Higher Education Of Scheduled Tribe (ST) Students
description: It is a Central Sector Scheme, fully funded by Ministry of Tribal Affairs to grant scholarship to meritorious Scheduled Tribe (ST) students for pursuing higher education in India.

name: Fellowship For Superannuated Faculty Members
description: The "Fellowship for Superannuated Faculty Members" scheme is a fellowship scheme by the University Grants Commission (UGC), Department of Higher Education to provide opportunities to superannuated faculty members of Universities/Institutes/Colleges, hereinafter “Institutions” to pursue research.

name: Rajiv Gandhi National Fellowship For Scheduled Caste Candidates
description: The Rajiv Gandhi National Fellowship (RGNF) Scheme for Scheduled Caste is formulated and funded by the Ministry of Social Justice &Empowerment. The scheme is open to candidates who belong to Scheduled Caste and are pursuing higher studies such as regular and full-time M.Phil.and Ph.D.degrees.

name: Pratyaksh Hanstantrit Labh / Direct Benefits Transfer For LPG
state: Ministry Of Petroleum and Natural Gas
description: PAHAL (DBTL) has been introduced to curb the diversion of subsidized LPG. Under the scheme, Consumers will pay the market price for the domestic cylinder and the subsidy will be transferred directly to their bank account

name: Junior Research Fellowship (JRF) And Research Associateship (RA) For Foreign Nationals
description: The scheme was initiated keeping in view the political and cultural bilateral relations of India with other developing countries: Asia, Africa, Latin America. The scheme has opened new vistas for foreign students and teachers, enable them to come to India and undertake advanced studies and research.

name: Tripura Journalist Health Insurance Scheme
description: A Health Insurance Scheme by the Directorate of Information & Culture Affairs, for Journalists who are permanent residents of the state of Tripura. The applicant must be an accredited journalist by the state government or PIB. The age must be in between 21-65 years.

name: KCR Nutrition Kit
description: KCR Nutrition Kits Scheme is a welfare initiative launched by the Government of Telangana, India, aimed at providing nutritious food to pregnant. The primary objective of the scheme is to improve the nutritional status of pregnant women.

name: Students Ready

description: The Student Rural Entrepreneurship Awareness Development Yojana (READY)  was launched by Hon'ble Prime Minister on 25 July 2015.

name: E-Medhabruti

name: Maulana Azad National Fellowship For Minority Students
description: Maulana Azad National Fellowship For Minority Students was launched in 2009 by the Ministry of Minority Affairs for providing financial aid to students for their higher studies.

description: The scheme aims to encourage girl students of class IX & X studying at Govt. High Schools & Govt. Higher Secondary Schools who belong to economically weaker families. Under this scheme, a stipend will be provided to two girls from each class, nominated by Headmaster/Principal of concerned school.

name: Dwarf Pension Scheme
description: The scheme aims to provide financial support to individuals suffering from dwarfism to help them meet their basic needs and improve their quality of life. Under this scheme, a monthly pension of ₹1200/- is provided to persons above 21 years of age whose height is less than 4 feet.

name: Mukhya Mantri Vivah Shagun Yojna
description: This scheme is being implemented to honor the girl child and to ensure that the girls from poor families and daughters of widows/destitute women, sports women & orphan girl children, are married gracefully. name: State Pre-metric Scholarship For Disabled
description: The "State Pre-metric Scholarship for Disabled" is a scheme by the Department of Social Justice & Special Assistance, Govt. of Maharashtra. The objective of this scheme is to encourage students with disability (SwDs) to pursue education. This scheme is 100% funded by the Govt. of Maharashtra.

name: Rehabilitation Allowance To Lepers
description: The Himachal Pradesh Rehabilitation Allowance to Lepers is a social welfare scheme initiated by the Government of Himachal Pradesh in India to provide financial assistance to people affected by leprosy.

name: Inter-caste Marriage Scheme
description: The Inter-caste Marriage Scheme is an initiative by the Government of Himachal Pradesh to promote inter-caste marriages and encourage social integration in the state.

name: Skill Development Allowance Scheme
description: The Department of Labour & Employment, Government of Himachal Pradesh introduced a scheme of granting Skill Development Allowance to the unemployed youth aims at providing allowance to educated unemployed persons for their Skill upgradation.

name: Matrimonial Incentives
description: In this scheme, if a Person with Disability (PwD) gets married to a non-disabled person, then the couple is provided a marriage incentive of up to ₹ 50,000. Only citizens who are permanent residents of the state of Maharashtra are eligible to apply for this scheme.

name: Mukhya Mantri Kanyadaan Yojana
description: Under Mukhyamantri Kanyadaan Yojana, the daughters of below poverty line families or widows or destitute or family earning less than Rs. 35000-/ year are given finacial help for their marriage by Government of Himachal Pradesh.

name: LIDCOM 50% Subsidy Scheme
description: The "50% Subsidy Scheme" is a scheme by LIDCOM, Govt. of Maharashtra. In this scheme, 50% amount is being given as a subsidy on a maximum loan amount of ₹50,000/-. The subsidy is subject to the maximum limit of ₹10,000/-. The bank charge of interest is as per the existing rate.

name: Award For Meritorious Students Of Meghalaya In The HSSLC Examination (Science Stream)
description: The Directorate of Educational Research & Training Meghalaya, Shillong is implementing a scheme in providing a one-time award for meritorious tribal students of Meghalaya who passed the current HSSLC Examination (Science) every year.

name: Bhima Bhoi Bhinnakshyama Samarthya Abhiyan

name: Mother Teresa Asahay Matri Sambal Yojana
description: The main purpose of the Scheme to encourage under this Yojana, women who are helpless in upbringing their children (like widows, and destitute) are provided with financial assistance per child per annum for two children.

name: Mukhya Mantri Sahara Yojana
description: The State Government has launched the 'Sahara Scheme' to provide financial assistance of Rs. 3000 per month to the patients belonging to the economically weaker sections of the society, who are suffering from specified diseases such Parkinson, Malignant Cancer, Paralysis etc.

name: Disability Relief Allowance Scheme
description: The Disability Relief Allowance Scheme under the Department of Social Justice, Government of Himachal Pradesh provides financial assistance to individuals with disabilities to help them manage their living costs and improve their quality of life.

name: Border Areas Scholarship
description: The scheme aims to provide annual scholarships to economically weaker students from border areas, supporting them in pursuing education up to the degree level.

name: Old Age Pension Scheme (APB&OCWWB)
description: The scheme “Old Age Pension Scheme” was started by the Department of Labour and Employment, Govt. of Arunachal Pradesh for the registered workers of Arunachal Pradesh Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (APB&OCWWB).

name: Chief Minister’s Scheme For Wood Carving Artists
description: The scheme “Chief Minister’s Scheme for Wood Carving Artists” was launched to sustain the rich tradition of work on wood and is encouraged to propagate with the enhancement of aesthetic sensibilities so that it may be at par with international standards.

name: Vikramaditya Yojna
description: The Department of Higher Education, Government of Madhya Pradesh has created this new scholarship scheme available for candidates belonging to the General categories.

name: Education Loan Scheme
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: A scheme named Education Loan Scheme by National Scheduled Castes Finance and Development Corporation (NSFDC) under the M/o Social Justice and Empowerment provides loans to students from Scheduled Castes who are pursuing full-time professional or technical courses in recognized institutions.

name: Semi-Commercial Duck Farming
description: The scheme “Semi-Commercial Duck Farming” started under the State Sector Scheme "Encouragement of Commercial Poultry Entrepreneur and Promotion of Backyard Poultry Production" to support small entrepreneurs in setting up Duck farms with a capacity of 1000 ducks.

name: Ladies Vocational Centres
description: The Government of Jammu And Kashmir started “Ladies Vocational Centres” with the objective is to impart training in various trades i.e. Cutting, Embroidery, Knitting as well as Stenography to the female folk to enable them to start their income-generating units.

name: State Programme For Rehabilitation Of Persons With Disabilities
description: The scheme “State Programme for Rehabilitation of Persons with Disabilities” is a state sector ongoing scheme implemented for the welfare and providing rehabilitation services to disabled persons of the state under the Person with Disabilities Act 1995.

name: Saur Sujala Yojana
description: The Saur Sujala Yojana is to set up solar irrigation pumps for the irrigation needs of the farmers. The scheme has been started on November 01, 2016, with the aim of empowering the farmers by providing irrigation pumps to the farmers at subsidized rates.

name: Assam Arogya Nidhi Scheme
description: The scheme “Assam Arogya Nidhi Scheme” is a yearly Financial Assistance Scheme provided as reimbursement to members of families whose yearly income is less than ₹5.00 lakhs for treatment of serious diseases including accident cases.

name: Financial Assistance To Gad-Hanjis
description: In the "Financial Assistance to Gad-Hanjis", financial assistance for the purchase of Nylon Twine is provided to the Licensed Fisherman by the Social Welfare Department. The beneficiary shall approach the concerned District Social Welfare Officer (DSWO) for submission of the application.

name: Shikshashree Scheme
description: The scheme "Shikshashree Scheme” was implemented by the Government of West Bengal during the year 2014-15  by merging the existing schemes of Book Grants & Maintenance Grants to provide financial assistance to Schedule Caste students studying in classes V to VIII.

name: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Bunkar Yojana
description: DDUBY is a government initiative in Arunachal Pradesh to provide affordable credit to women weavers, offering an interest subvention of 7% on short-term loans and working capital requirements.

name: Lokprasar Prakalpo Scheme
description: The scheme “Lokprasar Prakalpo Scheme” was launched by the Department of Information & Cultural Affairs, Government of West Bengal in 2014 to revive the Folk and Tribal Culture in their respective genre across various zones and districts in the State.

name: Dr. Ambedkar Medical Aid Scheme (Revised – 2009)

name: Atma Nirbhar Bagwani Yojana
description: The schemes are part of the Atma Nirbhar program announced during the Budget session held in February this year. A total amount of Rs 120 crores – Rs 60 crores for each scheme has been allocated to the two concerned departments of Agriculture and Horticulture.
