description: The scheme aims to transform local varieties of Mango, Ber, Amla, and other indigenous plants into improved varieties. It also provides 20 days of Top Working training to unemployed rural youth.

name: Mhaji Bus Scheme
description: The scheme provides a subsidy of ₹3/- per kilometer operated, 50% reimbursement of the annual insurance premium paid up to a maximum of ₹30,000/-, and assistance of ₹10,00,000/- for replacing buses older than 15 years with new buses having a minimum seating capacity of 27.

name: Operation of Paragliding Activities
description: The scheme aims to promote safe, regulated, and professional paragliding activities in Uttarakhand by permitting certified paragliding companies and licensed tandem pilots to operate within the state.

name: Janani Sahayogi Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide free and safe delivery and newborn care services to BPL families by offering free treatment to pregnant women in government and accredited private hospitals.

name: Seed Program
description: The scheme aims to provide free vegetable seeds to small and marginal farmers and agricultural laborers living below the poverty line.

name: Manav Garima Yojna (NT DNT)
description: The scheme aims to enable nomadic and de-notified castes to live with dignity and become self-employed. Through this scheme, business tool-kits are provided to these beneficiaries to help them start small businesses and achieve financial self-sufficiency.

name: Infrastructure Development Scheme for Dairy Co-operatives
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to Dairy Co-operative Societies for their development, smooth functioning of business, and other allied activities, enabling them to become stable and create better infrastructure. The scheme provides financial support in the form of grant or subsidy.

name: Goa State Logistics and Warehousing Incentives Scheme: Subsidy towards Upgradation in Quality
description: The scheme aims to support environmentally sustainable industrial development while accelerating investment in Goa. The scheme provides a one-time reimbursement equal to 50% of the expenses incurred for establishing a Quality Management System, capped at ₹5,00,000/- per Entity.

name: Infrastructure Development Scheme for Dairy Co-operatives
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to Dairy Co-operative Societies for their development, smooth functioning of business, and other allied activities, enabling them to become stable and create better infrastructure. The scheme provides financial support in the form of grant or subsidy.

name: Scheme to Promote Mechanization for the Development of Horticulture
description: The scheme aims to promote mechanization for the development of horticulture by providing subsidies to farmers for purchasing modern agricultural machinery used in horticultural crops.

name: Manav Garima Yojna (NT DNT)
description: The scheme aims to enable nomadic and de-notified castes to live with dignity and become self-employed. Through this scheme, business tool-kits are provided to these beneficiaries to help them start small businesses and achieve financial self-sufficiency.

name: Virasat Loan Scheme of NMDFC
description: Concessional credit of up to Rs.10.00  lacs can be availed under Credit Line-1 & 2.  to meet Working Capital  and Fixed Capital for purchase of equipment/tools/machineries/raw material by the Minority Artisan.

name: Mukhyamantri Swarozgar Yojana - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to promote self-employment and entrepreneurship among the residents of Uttarakhand by providing financial assistance and subsidies for establishing new enterprises or upgrading existing small-scale units.

name: Mhaji Bus Scheme
description: The scheme provides a subsidy of ₹3/- per kilometer operated, 50% reimbursement of the annual insurance premium paid up to a maximum of ₹30,000/-, and assistance of ₹10,00,000/- for replacing buses older than 15 years with new buses having a minimum seating capacity of 27.

name: Bal Swasthya Karyakram - Uttarakhand
description: This initiative aims to ensure the survival, healthy growth, and overall well-being of children aged 0–5 years by providing accessible, comprehensive and quality healthcare services.

name: Balram Talab Yojana
description: The scheme aims to conserve rainwater in fields to help farmers, ensuring water availability during irrigation and drought conditions. Farmers receive subsidies up to ₹1,00,000/- for pond construction.

name: Mukhyamantri Swarozgar Yojana Ati Sukshm (Nano) Udhyam
description: The scheme aims to promote self-employment and entrepreneurship among the residents of Uttarakhand by providing financial assistance through banks to facilitate the establishment of new micro (nano) enterprises as well as the expansion of existing businesses.

name: Scheme for Goa Rajya Vidnyanik Puraskar
description: The scheme aims to introduce and recognize Goan Innovators/Scientists who have achieved excellence in the fields of Science, Technology, and Innovation. The scheme rewards eligible Students, Startups, Innovators, Research Faculty, and Scientists with three annual cash awards of ₹2,00,000/- each.

name: Scheme To Support Orphan Child/Children Of Widows Belonging To Scheduled Tribe Community
description: The scheme aims to provide crucial financial support for food, clothing, and shelter to children of widows and orphans belonging to the ST community Benefits include a monthly fixed maintenance allowance of ₹1,500/- for a widow’s child or ₹2,000/- for an orphan.

name: Operation of Paragliding Activities
description: The scheme aims to promote safe, regulated, and professional paragliding activities in Uttarakhand by permitting certified paragliding companies and licensed tandem pilots to operate within the state.

name: Promotion of Institutional Delivery
description: The scheme aims to promote safe and institutional deliveries by providing free accommodation to pregnant women, especially from disaster-prone areas, near district hospitals.

name: National AIDS Control Programme - Uttarakhand
description: The programme aims to prevent and control the spread of HIV/AIDS through awareness, testing, and treatment, while providing care and support to affected individuals.

name: Atal Kisan Jyoti Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide affordable electricity to farmers in Madhya Pradesh by offering power supply at concessional rates.

name: Dr. B. R. Ambedkar’s Electric Auto (e-Auto) Subsidy Scheme
description: The scheme aims to socially and economically empower Scheduled Caste / Scheduled Tribe women by supporting them in income-generating activities through electric autos. It provides a subsidy up to 75% of the cost (maximum ₹3,00,000/-) for electric autos to Scheduled Caste / Scheduled Tribe women.

name: Assistance Scheme for Handloom Spinning-Weaving Women Workers
description: The scheme aims to provide financial support to traditional women workers whose primary occupation is handloom weaving, spinning, or related weaving activities. Under this scheme, eligible women workers are provided with handloom equipment, including looms & related equipment, worth upto ₹25,000/-.

name: Government Food Science Training Centre
description: The scheme aims to provide specialized education and skill development in food processing, canning, bakery, confectionery, and cookery to students from Uttarakhand, empowering them with technical knowledge and practical expertise to pursue careers in the food industry and promote entrepreneurship.

name: Aromatic Plants Cultivation - Centre for Aromatic Plants
description: The scheme aims to encourage farmers to grow aromatic plants by providing them with free seeds, planting materials, and technical support, helping them increase their income and promote aromatic farming in Uttarakhand.

name: Tribals Development Plan: Tea/Coffee And Coconut Parlor
description: The scheme aims to attract tourists with better quality mechanized Tea and Coffee shops and tender coconut water parlors, as Goa is a tourist destination, ensuring better hygiene than other restaurants. The scheme provides entire project financing for establishing a parlor.

name: Scheme to Encourage Students for Innovative Projects
description: The scheme aims to encourage students in the State of Goa who have technological innovative ideas, which they want to translate into a working prototype, by providing financial assistance. It offers financial support of up to ₹50,000/- to eligible students for innovative academic projects.

name: Solar Water Heater Yojana - Uttarakhand Renewable Energy Development Agency
description: The scheme aims to promote the use of solar energy for water heating in the state to reduce dependence on conventional electricity and fossil fuels, and to encourage the adoption of green and sustainable energy sources in Uttarakhand.

name: Dairy Equipment Scheme
description: The scheme aims to help Goan dairy farmers purchase essential equipment by offering a 75% subsidy on approved dairy machinery, promoting efficiency and productivity in dairy farming.

name: Goa State 25% Subsidy for Self Employed Scheme
description: The scheme aims to boost self-employment in Goa and subsidize Capital Investment to encourage the creation of fixed assets. The scheme provides a 25% subsidy on fixed capital investment to individuals, partnership firms, or groups of individuals who have availed loans for approved self-employment.

name: Laptop-e Scheme
description: The scheme aims to equip Class XI students with individual portable computer systems to enhance digital learning, knowledge acquisition, and skill attainment for employment or self-employment. Students receive one entry-level Laptop or Notebook equipped with specific technical requirements.

name: Swahid Dayal Das Panika Swaniyojan Achoni
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to the self-employed youths belonging to the Tea Tribes and Adivasi community in Assam to encourage and initiate self-employment activities. The benefit is financial support for self-employed youth to enhance their capabilities.

name: Grant to Films
description: The policy aims to promote film production in Uttarakhand by providing financial grants to films, TV serials, and web series shot in the state, encouraging filmmakers to showcase Uttarakhand’s culture, heritage, and locations, and boosting local employment and the state's film economy.

name: Awareness Programme on Child/Human Trafficking, Family Planning, Legal Awareness, Health etc.
description: The scheme aims to generate awareness among the Tea Tribes and Adivasi community regarding child/human trafficking, family planning, legal awareness, and health. It generates awareness benefits for the Tea Tribes and Adivasi community through Non-Governmental Organizations proposals.

name: National Food Security Scheme (Priority Households - White Ration Card) - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to ensure food security for economically vulnerable and priority households in Uttarakhand by providing them with a guaranteed monthly supply of food grains at subsidized rates. Under the scheme, the eligible households are entitled to 5 kg of food grains per person per month.

name: Mukhyamantri Ekeekrit Bagwani Vikas Yojana
description: The scheme aims to promote horticulture development in Uttarakhand by providing farmers with subsidized fruit plants, seeds, pesticides, & horticulture infrastructure such as Cool Houses & Refrigerator Vans, thereby increasing productivity, reducing post-harvest losses, & enhancing farmers’ income.

name: Map Approval through UDAY App
description: It aims to simplify and expedite the process of residential property map creation and approval for all landowners in Haridwar district through mobile app.

name: Financial Assistance For Procuring Mobility Equipment To Disabled Ex-Servicemen (All Ranks)
description: The scheme provides financial assistance of a maximum of ₹ 1,00,000 from the Armed Forces Flag Day Fund (AFFDF) for the procurement of modified scooters, crutches and wheelchairs for Ex-Servicemen who are disabled after their retirement from service with a disability of 50% or more.

name: RMEWF-Financial Assistance For Education Of Children & Widows Of Ex-Servicemen
description: A scheme to provide financial assistance to Ex-Servicemen and their widows for helping them in educating their child (for maximum two children) up to graduation and also for widows to pursue Post Graduation degree.

name: Women Scientist Scheme-A
description: A Research Grant by MoST for female candidates to pursue research in frontier areas of science and engineering, preferably those having a break in career (minimum two years) and not having regular employment, to explore possibility of re-entry into the profession.

name: Pravasi Bharatiya Bima Yojana
description: A mandatory insurance scheme by Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) for safeguarding the interests of Indian emigrant workers falling under Emigration Check Required (ECR) category going for overseas employment to ECR countries.
tags: ['Employment', 'Financial Assistance', 'Insurance', 'Medical Insurance', 'Non Resident Indian', 'Person With Disability']

name: Women Scientist Scheme-B
description: A Research Grant by MoST for female candidates with break in their career interested in addressing societal challenges through viable S&T interventions. Women scientists who wish to apply under this scheme are required to develop their own project/proposals for scientific and technological solutions

name: SMILE - Comprehensive Rehabilitation For Welfare Of Transgender Persons – Skill Development And Training
description: The scheme aims to provide employment opportunities to the person belonging to transgender person community by providing them market-oriented skills.

name: Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Package : Insurance Scheme For Health Workers Fighting COVID-19
description: The "Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Package: Insurance Scheme for Health Workers Fighting COVID-19" by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Government of India aims to offer financial protection to healthcare workers involved in COVID-19 duties.

name: SMILE - Comprehensive Rehabilitation For Welfare Of Transgender Persons
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: A scheme to provide Financial Assistance in the form of scholarships is provided to Transgender students studying in secondary school (IX & X)  & senior secondary school (XI & XII) to reduce the incidence of dropout and support their educational aspirations.

name: Pre Matric Scholarship For Scheduled Tribe Students
description: A scholarship scheme by Ministry of Tribal Affairs for regular, full time students from Scheduled Tribe studying in Class 9th and 10th, in a Government School or in a School recognized by Govt. or a Central/State Board of Secondary Education.
tags: ['Books', 'Person With Disability', 'Pre Matric', 'PwD', 'Scheduled Tribe', 'Scholarship', 'Social Welfare', 'Student', 'Tuition Fee']

name: Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Package : Insurance Scheme For Health Workers Fighting COVID-19
description: The "Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Package: Insurance Scheme for Health Workers Fighting COVID-19" by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Government of India aims to offer financial protection to healthcare workers involved in COVID-19 duties.

name: AICTE – Saksham Scholarship Scheme For Specially-Abled Student (Diploma)
description: Saksham is a Scholarship Scheme by the Ministry of Education, implemented by AICTE, aimed at providing encouragement and support to specially-abled children to pursue technical education. This is an attempt to give every young specially-abled student the opportunity to study further.

name: Tejaswini-the Radiant
description: A scheme to provide financial assistance to the young women for setting up gainful self-employment ventures, suited to their skills, training, aptitude and local conditions.

name: Digital India Internship Scheme
state: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
description: An opportunity for a student to secure practical work experience under the guidance of a qualified and experienced Supervisor/Mentor in Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) in the form of Digital India Internship Scheme.

name: Pradhan Mantri Gramin Digital Saksharta Abhiyaan
state: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
description: Pradhan Mantri Gramin Digital Saksharta Abhiyaan (PMGDISHA) is a Digital Literacy Scheme by the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY), to make six crore persons in rural areas, across States/UTs, are digitally literate, reaching around 40% of rural households.

name: Credit Card Scheme For Artisans And Weavers Of Handicrafts And Handloom Sector
description: The Credit Card Scheme for Artisans & Weavers is a loan scheme by the Department of Handicraft & Handloom (Govt. of Jammu & Kashmir) under which adequate and timely assistance from the financial institutions is provided to the Artisans and Weavers.

name: Financial Support To The Students Of N.E.R For Higher Professional Courses (NEC Merit Scholarship)
state: Ministry Of Development Of North Eastern Region
description: A scholarship scheme by the North Eastern Council (NEC), Ministry of Development of North Eastern Region for the students of the North Eastern States undergoing studies in different disciplines at different levels in Institutions inside as well as outside the North-East but within the country.

name: Dr. D.S. Kothari Post Doctoral Fellowships In Sciences
description: Dr. D.S. Kothari Post Doctoral Fellowships in Sciences was introduced by the UGC. In addition to the existing RA/PDF positions provided by various funding agencies, a need was felt for a PDF scheme running in a flexible mode, with fast track, online handling, and decision-making.

name: Junior Research Fellowship In Sciences, Humanities, And Social Sciences

name: Boarding House Stipend Scheme (Tripura Govt.)

description: The scheme "Goa Welfare / Pension Scheme for Seafarers" by the Home Department, Government of Goa, provides financial assistance in the form of a Gross Pension of ₹ 2,500/- per month to the beneficiaries. name: Disabled Person Pension Scheme - Punjab
description: Punjab State Government started a pension for disable person of the state.

name: Young Investigators Programme in Biotechnology
description: The programme “Young Investigator’s Programme in Biotechnology (YIPB)” is a research support programme that aims to provide quick research support to young researchers to pursue their ideas in newly emerging and front-line areas of research in Biotechnology.

name: Kala Samman Scheme
description: The scheme "Kala Samman Scheme" grants financial assistance to eminent artists who are in indigent circumstances as a token of respect for their contribution to the field of Art and culture.

name: Kisan Samriddhi Yojana - Chhattisgarh
description: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme "Kisan Samriddhi Yojana" for farmer.

name: Dai Didi Mobile Clinic Scheme
description: Government of Chhattisgarh state, started a scheme named "Dai Didi Clinic Scheme" in 2020.

name: Vishvakarma Durghatana Mrtyu par Antyeshti Evan Anugrah Raashi Bhugataan Yojana
description: Chhattisgarh state Government started a scheme "Vishvakarma Durghatana Mrtyu Par Antyeshti Evan Anugrah Raashi Bhugataan Yojana" for labor workers.

name: DEVELOPMENT OF HANDICRAFTS
description: The government of Puducherry takes the initiative to revive the vanishing crafts and restore the significance of traditional crafts.

name: National Mission on Natural Farming
state: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
description: To motivate farmers to adopt chemical free farming and enhance the reach of natural farming, the Government has formulated National Mission on Natural Farming (NMNF) as a separate and independent scheme from 2023-24 by up scaling the Bhartiya Prakritik Krishi Paddati (BPKP).

name: Biotechnology Young Entrepreneur Award
description: The “Biotechnology Young Entrepreneur Award (BYE)” is a programme to promote commercialisation of bioscience ideas among graduate/post graduate students in Biotechnology and to encourage them to develop biotechnology entrepreneurship.

name: Scheme to Provide Financial Assistance to the Publishers for Publishing Books of Goan Authors
description: "Scheme to Provide Financial Assistance to the Publishers for Publishing Books of Goan Authors"  by the Directorate of Art and Culture, Government of Goa, has been designed to promote Goan publishers to provide them with financial support for the publication of books.

name: Barbershop Renovation Grant
description: The “Barbershop Renovation Grant” scheme is launched by the Backward Communities Development Department, Government of Kerala. Under the scheme, financial assistance will be provided to the traditional barber of rural areas to uplift the standard of the traditional barbershops.

name: Mukhyamantri Avivahita Pension Yojana
description: Madhya Pradesh State Government started the "Mukhyamantri Avivahita Pension Yojana" for unmarried women of the state.

name: ICMR-Junior Research Fellowship
description: ICMR-Junior Research Fellowship (ICMR-JRF) examination is the first step in the process of admission to the PhD/Research Programme through council's support.

name: Post-Graduate Scholarships for Professional Courses for SC/ST Candidates
description: The scheme has been initiated to provide opportunity to deprived sections of the society, viz. SC/ST for undertaking postgraduate level studies in Professional subjects like Engineering & Technology, Management, Pharmacy etc. in recognised Indian Universities/Institutions/Colleges.

name: Dr. Ambedakar Centrally Sponsored Scheme of Post-Matric Scholarships for the Economically Backward Class (EBC) Students
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: The objective of the scheme is to provide financial assistance to the Economically Backward Class (EBC) students studying at the post-matriculation or post-secondary stage to enable them to complete their education. These scholarships shall be available for studies in India only.

name: National Scheme of Apprenticeship Training
description: The primary goal of this scheme is to bridge the gap in practical experience for fresh Graduate Engineers, Diploma holders, and 10+2 Vocational pass-outs in approximately 10,000 industrial establishments. The apprentices undergo a one-year training period, receiving a monthly stipend.

name: Integrated Scheme for Export Promotion & Quality Improvement in Spices and Research and Development of Cardamom: Export Oriented Production: Large Cardamom Certified Nursery (Unit)
description: The scheme "Export Oriented Production: Large Cardamom Certified Nursery (Unit)" is a Sub-Scheme of the Integrated Scheme for Export Promotion & Quality Improvement in Spices and Research and Development of Cardamom by the Spice Board, Department of Commerce and Industry, Ministry of Commerce.

name: Post-Graduate Scholarships for Professional Courses for SC/ST Candidates
description: The scheme has been initiated to provide opportunity to deprived sections of the society, viz. SC/ST for undertaking postgraduate level studies in Professional subjects like Engineering & Technology, Management, Pharmacy etc. in recognised Indian Universities/Institutions/Colleges.

name: Dr. Ambedakar Centrally Sponsored Scheme of Post-Matric Scholarships for the Economically Backward Class (EBC) Students
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: The objective of the scheme is to provide financial assistance to the Economically Backward Class (EBC) students studying at the post-matriculation or post-secondary stage to enable them to complete their education. These scholarships shall be available for studies in India only.

name: Research Associates (RA)
description: The Research Associates (RAs) of the Department of Biotechnology (DBT) in India are individuals who engage in research work under the DBT-Research Associateship Program in Biotechnology and its was started in 1999.

name: Centrally Sponsored Scheme of Post-Matric Scholarship for OBC Students for studying in India
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: The objective of the scheme is to provide financial assistance to OBC students studying at the post-matriculation or post-secondary stage to enable them to complete their education. These scholarships shall be available for studies in India only and will be disbursed via Direct Benefit Transfer.

name: ICMR-Junior Research Fellowship
description: ICMR-Junior Research Fellowship (ICMR-JRF) examination is the first step in the process of admission to the PhD/Research Programme through council's support.

name: National Renewable Energy Fellowship Scheme of the Human Resource Development Programme in New and Renewable Energy
state: Ministry Of New and Renewable Energy
description: Through this scheme, fellowships will be provided for pursuing higher studies/ advanced research in renewable energy. The fellowship scheme is directly aligned with the overall requirement of renewable energy, research thrust areas identified by MNRE.

name: Teachers Associateship for Research Excellence
description: The scheme “Teachers Associateship for Research Excellence (TARE)” was launched by Science & Engineering Research Board, Department of Science & Technology, Government of India which aims to facilitate mobility of faculty members working in State Universities /Colleges/Private Academic institutions.

name: SERB Science and Technology Award for Research
description: “SERB Science and Technology Award for Research (SERB-STAR)” is a prestigious award instituted by Science and Engineering Research Board (SERB) to recognize and reward outstanding performance of Principal Investigators (PIs) of SERB Projects.

name: Teachers Associateship for Research Excellence
description: The scheme “Teachers Associateship for Research Excellence (TARE)” was launched by Science & Engineering Research Board, Department of Science & Technology, Government of India which aims to facilitate mobility of faculty members working in State Universities /Colleges/Private Academic institutions.

name: SERB Science and Technology Award for Research
description: “SERB Science and Technology Award for Research (SERB-STAR)” is a prestigious award instituted by Science and Engineering Research Board (SERB) to recognize and reward outstanding performance of Principal Investigators (PIs) of SERB Projects.

name: SERB - POWER Fellowship
description: The SERB - POWER Fellowship is designed to identify and reward excellent women researchers in Indian academic institutions and R&D laboratories, holding Ph.D. degrees in any branch of science and engineering.

name: Mahila Kamgar Kaushal Unnayan Evan Theka Shramik, Hamaal Tatha Ghareloo Mahila Kamgaar Parivar Sashaktikaran Yojana
description: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme "Mahila Kamgar Kaushal Unnayan Evan Theka Shramik, Hamaal Tatha Ghareloo Mahila Kamgaar Parivar Sashaktikaran Yojana" for unorganized worker on 11 March 2015.

name: Technical Education Scholarship Scheme For Diploma Level
description: This scholarship will be awarded to students who are pursuing Diploma level Courses in Engineering/Technology including Architectural Assistantship or any other equivalent courses as approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE).

name: Dr. Ambedkar Medhavi Chhatravriti Yojna to Scheduled Caste Students
description: The scheme “Dr. Ambedkar Medhavi Chhatravriti Yojna to Scheduled Caste Students” was started by the Dept. of Education, H.P. Under the scheme, scholarship is given to top 1250 meritorious students of SC category as such in the result of Matric Examination conducted by H.P. Board of School Education.

name: Award of Opportunity Cost to Parents of Scheduled Caste Girl Students
description: The objective of the scheme is to financially assist the SC parents for sending school their daughters who otherwise earn livelihood for the family engaging themselves in menial labour.

name: Stipend to Scheduled Caste Trainees in Technical Training Institutions
description: The objective of the scheme is to provide financial support to Scheduled Tribe candidates/trainees who are undergoing training in the Government Technical Training Institutions of the Union Territory of Puducherry.

name: Financial Assistance To Fishermen For Purchase of Fisheries Requisites (Gill Net/ River Gill Net with Accessories)
description: “Financial Assistance To Fishermen For Purchase of Fisheries Requisites” is a scheme by the Department of Fisheries, Government of Goa. Through this scheme, a 50% subsidy is provided to the fishermen of Goa for the purchase of fisheries requisites (gill nets with accessories).

name: Financial Assistance to Fresh Water Aquaculture Farms
description: “Financial Assistance to Fresh Water Aquaculture Farms” is a scheme by the Dept. of Fisheries, Govt. of Goa. Through this scheme, financial assistance is provided to eligible fishermen for the construction and renovation of the Farm, for the purchase of farming equipment, and the purchase of feed.

name: Financial Assistance To Fishermen For Purchase of Fisheries Requisites (Gill Net/ River Gill Net with Accessories)
description: “Financial Assistance To Fishermen For Purchase of Fisheries Requisites” is a scheme by the Department of Fisheries, Government of Goa. Through this scheme, a 50% subsidy is provided to the fishermen of Goa for the purchase of fisheries requisites (gill nets with accessories).

name: Mukhya Mantri Shahri Ajeevika Guarantee Yojna
description: The “Mukhya Mantri Shahri Ajeevika Guarantee Yojna” was launched by the Department of Urban Development, Govt. of Himachal Pradesh. The objective of the scheme is to enhance livelihood security in urban areas by providing 120 days of guaranteed wage employment to every household in a financial year.

name: Financial Assistance to Take up Value Addition to Seafood
description: Through this scheme, individuals who have been residents of Goa for the last 15 years, and are interested in setting up a unit for value-added fisheries products are provided financial assistance as a subsidy of 50% of the cost for the Construction or Renovation of the Unit/ Purchase of Equipment.

name: Goa Value Added Tax-Based Subsidy on H.S.D. Oil Consumed by Fishing Vessels Scheme
description: “Goa Value Added Tax-Based Subsidy on H.S.D. Oil Consumed by Fishing Vessels Scheme” is a scheme by the Department of Fisheries, Govt. of Goa. Through this scheme, the amount equivalent to the actual VAT paid shall be reimbursed to the owner as a subsidy on H.S.D. Oil consumed by the fishing vessel.

name: Natural Calamity Relief to Fishermen of State
description: “Natural Calamity Relief to Fishermen of State” is a scheme by the Dept of Fisheries, Govt of Goa. Through this scheme, financial assistance is provided to the active fishermen who contribute to the Fishermen Corpus Relief Fund, whose fishing vessels are damaged or lost due to natural calamities.

name: Technical Education Scholarship Scheme For Diploma Level
description: This scholarship will be awarded to students who are pursuing Diploma level Courses in Engineering/Technology including Architectural Assistantship or any other equivalent courses as approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE).

name: Dr. Ambedkar Medhavi Chhatravriti Yojna to Scheduled Caste Students
description: The scheme “Dr. Ambedkar Medhavi Chhatravriti Yojna to Scheduled Caste Students” was started by the Dept. of Education, H.P. Under the scheme, scholarship is given to top 1250 meritorious students of SC category as such in the result of Matric Examination conducted by H.P. Board of School Education.

name: Interest Subsidy on Loans for Agriculture and Allied Activities
description: “Interest Subsidy on Loans for Agriculture and Allied Activities” is a scheme by the Dept. of Fisheries, Govt. of Goa. The bonafide agriculturist, individual of the animal husbandry/fisheries sector from Goa are provided a loan of upto ₹ 5,00,000 for the purpose of Agriculture and Allied Activities.

name: Vikaas-Day Care Scheme For Person with Disability Children
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: Vikaas is a Day care scheme, primarily to expand the range of opportunities available to a person with disability attaining the age of 10 years for enhancing interpersonal and vocational skills as they are on a transition to higher age groups.

name: High Risk - High Reward Research
description: The Scheme for Funding "High Risk - High Reward Research" aims at supporting proposals that are conceptually new & risky, & if successful, expected to have a paradigm-shifting influence on the S&T.

name: Indira Gandhi Utkrisht Chattervriti Yojana
description: A merit-based scholarship scheme of ₹18,000 per annum by the Department of Higher Education, Government of Himachal Pradesh will be awarded to 10 toppers each from Class 12 (Arts, Science, and Commerce) and from the merit list of B.A., B.Sc. and B.Com

name: Reimbursement/ Spot Exemption of Sales Tax on High-Speed Diesel Oil
description: The scheme "Reimbursement/ Spot Exemption of Sales Tax on High-Speed Diesel Oil" under "Financial Assistance for Availing Subsidy Components for the Development of Marine Fisheries" introduced to reimburse the sales tax on high-speed diesel oil used by the registered mechanized boat operators.

name: Mukhyamantri Kalakar Sahayata Yojana
description: Mukhyamantri Kalakar Sahayata Yojana is a scheme under the Odia Language, Literature & Culture Department, Government of Odisha aims to offer sustenance and assistance to elderly artists who, despite facing financial hardship, have consistently devoted themselves to enriching culture of the state.

name: Government Hostel for Working Women/ Girl Students
description: The scheme aims to provide suitable, inexpensive, and safe accommodation to women employed in government offices, organizations, and firms, as well as girl students studying in colleges. Essential facilities include a cot with mattress, lockable cupboards, television, newspapers, magazines, etc.

name: KULAVILAKKU
description: This scheme aims to enhance the nutritional status of Pregnant Women. ₹500/- assistance is provided to eligible beneficiaries during their pregnancies. The scheme is a crucial step towards ensuring the well-being of both mother and child. The benefit will be provided for upto two pregnancies only.

name: Scholarships to Students with Disabilities Scheme
description: The objective of the scheme is to assist students with disabilities to secure education, academic, technical, or professional training to enable them to earn a living and to become useful members of society.

name: Financial Assistance to Fresh Water Aquaculture Farms
description: “Financial Assistance to Fresh Water Aquaculture Farms” is a scheme by the Dept. of Fisheries, Govt. of Goa. Through this scheme, financial assistance is provided to eligible fishermen for the construction and renovation of the Farm, for the purchase of farming equipment, and the purchase of feed.

name: Certification Program for Goan IT Professionals
description: The scheme provides reimbursement of up to 50% of the expenditure incurred for obtaining certifications for improving their employability. The scheme has been framed as a part of Goa's IT Policy that envisages Goa as an aspirational geographical and human resource base for IT Units.

name: Bed & Breakfast/Homestay Scheme- Punjab
description: The scheme "Bed & Breakfast/Homestay Scheme” is implemented by the Department of Tourism & Cultural Affairs, Government of Punjab with the aim of providing comfortable Bed & Breakfast (BnB)/Home Stay Facilities and supplementing the availability of accommodation across the State.

name: Pension to Indigent Sportspersons of Odisha
description: The Scheme relating to "Pension to Indigent Sportspersons of Odisha" was launched by the Department of Sports & Youth Services Department, Government of Odisha to provide financial support to sportspersons of yesteryears who are living in indigent conditions.

name: AICTE-QUALITY IMPROVEMENT (FOREIGN UNIVERSITY) PROGRAMME
description: The All India Council for Technical Education in its 55th Meeting of the Council held on 14th August 2018 approved the Quality Improvement Programme (Foreign University) (QIP-FU). The QIP(FU) is an extension of the QIP program launched by the Government of India in the year 1970.

name: AICTE-Technical Book Writing & Translation Scheme
description: AICTE-Technical Book Writing & Translation scheme has been launched by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) to promote the use of 'Scheduled Regional Language' in Technical Education for creating knowledge base in local language.

name: Financial Assistance to Sportspersons to Pursue Sports Coaching Courses Conducted by SAI, NSNIS, Patiala as a Part of Skill Development Programme to Improve their Employability
description: The Scheme was launched by the Department of Sports & Youth Services Department, Government of Odisha to provide financial assistance to sportspersons of Odisha to help them become qualified coaches, by undertaking SAI, NSNIS coaching courses, so as to improve their employability.

name: Distribution of Free House Sites to Scheduled Caste/Other Economically Backward Classes
description: Through this scheme, the homeless poor Scheduled Caste people, and other Economically backward class people, who meet the eligibility criteria, are provided housing sites to enable them to construct their own houses. Approximately 11,000 persons so far have benefitted from this scheme.

name: Biju Patnaik Sports Award for Lifetime Achievement in Promotion of Sports & Games
description: The award is given to the sportspersons who have not only good performances at National and International levels but also have continued to contribute to the promotion of sports and games in his/her individual capacity even after retirement from an active sporting career.
tags: ['Lifetime Achievement', 'Promotion Of Games', 'Promotion Of Sports', 'Sports Award', 'Sportsperson']

name: Free Supply of Sarees and Dhothies to the Poor People
description: The scheme was introduced to provide two sets of clothing items to poor people (other than SC/Fisherman) once in a year as a measure of Social Security. The beneficiaries are identified based on the data from the Civil Supplies and Consumer Affairs Department in Puducherry.

name: Grant of Mahatma Gandhi Memorial Award for Clean Houses
description: “Grant of Mahatma Gandhi Memorial Award for Clean Houses” was introduced by the Adi Dravidar Welfare Dept, Govt of Puducherry. The objective of the scheme is to motivate the Scheduled Caste people to keep their houses neat and tidy. Incentives are in the form of household articles worth ₹500/-.

name: Financial Assistance for Marriage of Poor Scheduled Caste Brides
description: The scheme “Financial Assistance for Marriage of Poor Scheduled Caste Brides” was introduced by the Adi Dravidar Welfare Dept, Govt of Puducherry. The objective of the scheme is to provide financial assistance to poor parents from Scheduled Castes for performing the marriage of their daughters.

name: Financial Assistance to Physically/Mentally Disabled Children of Beneficiary (CBOCWWB)
description: Under this scheme, registered construction workers whose child has a disability of 40% or more will receive financial assistance.
tags: ['Construction Worker', 'Financial Assistance', 'Labour', 'Mentally Disabled Child', 'Physically Disabled Child', 'PwD']

name: Marriage Assistance (A.B.O.C.W.W.B)
description: The scheme “Marriage Assistance” was started by the Assam Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (A.B.O.C.W.W.B), Labour Welfare Department, Government of Assam for providing financial assistance to the registered construction workers for the marriage of their children.

name: Swami Vivekananda Nishakta Swavlamban Protsahan Yojana
description: “Swami Vivekananda Nishakta Swavlamban Protsahan Yojana ” is a Social Security Scheme by the Department of Women, Child Development & Social Security, Government of Jharkhand. The aim of the scheme is to provide social security to differently abled people aged five(5) years and above.

name: Financial Assistance to Pensioners Suffering From HIV and AIDS
description: “Financial Assistance to Pensioners Suffering From HIV/AIDS” is a Social Security Scheme by the Department of Women, Child Development & Social Security, Government of Jharkhand which aims to provide social security through financial assistance to those persons who are suffering from HIV/AIDS.

name: Financial Assistance to Sportspersons to Pursue Sports Coaching Courses Conducted by SAI, NSNIS, Patiala as a Part of Skill Development Programme to Improve their Employability
description: The Scheme was launched by the Department of Sports & Youth Services Department, Government of Odisha to provide financial assistance to sportspersons of Odisha to help them become qualified coaches, by undertaking SAI, NSNIS coaching courses, so as to improve their employability.

name: Kaushal Vikas Yojana
description: The Uttar Pradesh Kaushal Vikas Mission (UPSDM) is a scheme launched by the Government of Uttar Pradesh to equip young people in the state with the necessary skills for employment.

name: Prime Minister’s Scholarship Scheme for the Wards of Central Armed Police Forces & Assam Rifles
description: The scheme was introduced by the Ministry of Home Affairs, Government of India from the academic year 2006-07 to encourage higher technical & professional education for the dependent wards & widows of Central Armed Police Forces & Assam Rifles (CAPFs & AR) Personnel.

name: Assistance to General Farmers for Sinking Tubewell
description: “Assistance to General Farmers for Sinking Tubewell" was launched by the Dept of Agriculture and Farmer's Welfare, UT of Puducherry. Through this scheme, the farmers from the General Category are provided with a grant of 65% subsidy towards the construction of tubewell/filter point per individual.

name: Assistance to Scheduled Caste Farmers for Sinking Tubewell
description: “Assistance to Scheduled Caste Farmers for Sinking Tubewell" was launched by Dept of Agriculture and Farmer's Welfare, UT of Puducherry. Through this scheme, the farmers from the SC Category are provided with a grant of 90% subsidy towards the construction of tubewell/filter points per individual.

name: Reimbursement of College Fees for Scheduled Caste Students in Professional Colleges (Top 20)
description: Through this scheme, reimbursement of tuition fees and examination fees is facilitated for students who have achieved marks above 75% in the Higher Secondary Course Examination and secured a place in the 'Top 20' Rank. The scheme aims to alleviate the financial burden on eligible students.

name: Mukhyamantri Vridhjan Pension Yojna
description: The scheme “Mukhyamantri Vridhjan Pension Yojna” is an old-age pension scheme implemented by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Bihar to provide financial assistance to elderly citizens. Under the scheme, a monthly pension is given to individuals who are aged 60 years or above.

name: Cash Award to the Meritorious Visually Impaired Students Obtaining First Three Ranks at the State Level in the SSLC and HSC Examination
description: The objective of this scheme is to award cash prizes to meritorious differently-abled persons (visually challenged students) who are studying in government and private schools of Puducherry and secure first, second and third rank concerning total marks in the SSLC and HSC exams.

name: Reimbursement of College Fees for Scheduled Caste Students in Professional Colleges (Top 20)
description: Through this scheme, reimbursement of tuition fees and examination fees is facilitated for students who have achieved marks above 75% in the Higher Secondary Course Examination and secured a place in the 'Top 20' Rank. The scheme aims to alleviate the financial burden on eligible students.

name: Mukhyamantri Vridhjan Pension Yojna
description: The scheme “Mukhyamantri Vridhjan Pension Yojna” is an old-age pension scheme implemented by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Bihar to provide financial assistance to elderly citizens. Under the scheme, a monthly pension is given to individuals who are aged 60 years or above.

name: Cash Award to the Meritorious Visually Impaired Students Obtaining First Three Ranks at the State Level in the SSLC and HSC Examination
description: The objective of this scheme is to award cash prizes to meritorious differently-abled persons (visually challenged students) who are studying in government and private schools of Puducherry and secure first, second and third rank concerning total marks in the SSLC and HSC exams.

name: SAHAKAR MITRA: NCDC’s Scheme on Internship Programme
state: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
description: The programme aims at providing an opportunity to professional graduates to get experience in areas of functioning of NCDC and related aspects of cooperatives.

name: Grant of Stipend to Differently Abled Trainees
description: "Grant of Stipend to Differently Abled Trainees" by the Dept of Social Welfare, Govt of Puducherry was introduced to provide financial assistance to differently abled individuals undergoing technical or professional training. The objective is to enable them to successfully complete their training.

name: Vegetable Development Scheme
description: The objective of the scheme is to promote vegetable production through HYV Seeds/ Hybrids/ Improved/ Open Pollinated seedlings, including assistance to farmers.

name: Plant Protection Scheme
description: The objective of the scheme is to control pests and diseases including weeds and rodents of horticultural crops by the distribution of bio-pesticides/Bio-agents and equipment at 50% subsidy.

name: Pradhan Mantri Rashtriya Bal Puraskar
state: Ministry of Women and Child Development
description: The Pradhan Mantri Rashtriya Bal Puraskar (PMRBP) is organized to celebrate the energy, determination, ability, zeal, and enthusiasm of our children.

name: Samagra Samajik Suraksha Vridhavastha Pension Yojana
description: Initiative of the Department of Social Justice and Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities under the Madhya Pradesh started the scheme "Samagra Samajik Suraksha Vridhavastha Pension Yojana" for the older age people of the state.

name: Free Motorized Tricycle Scheme for Persons with Disabilities
description: The scheme “Free Motorized Tricycle Scheme for Persons with Disabilities”, who are facing the mainstream of society due to their disabilities are provided motorized tricycles free of cost to those unable to connect.

name: Motivation of Unemployed Persons to Start Self-employed Enterprises
description: The scheme “Motivation of Unemployed Persons to Start Self-employed Enterprises” by the Dept of Industries and Commerce, UT of Puducherry was introduced to encourage self-employment among the youth in manufacturing and service activities, supporting the growing economy of Puducherry.

name: Visitor's Award
description: The Awards are given to recognize excellence in research and innovation of faculty members/researchers of the Central Universities

name: PM-YASASVI: Top Class College Education for OBC, EBC and DNT Students
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: The objective of the scheme is to recognize and promote quality education amongst Students belonging to OBC, EBC and DNT categories by providing full financial support. The Scheme will cover OBC/EBC/DNT students for pursuing studies beyond Class XII.

name: Samagra Samajik Suraksha Vridh Ashram Mai Nivaasarat Ant-vasi Pension Yojana
description: Under this scheme, the Madhya Pradesh government provides financial support to the citizens who live in old age homes recognized by the Department of Social Justice.

name: Samagra Samajik Suraksha Parityakta Pension Yojana
description: Under the Scheme, Madhya Pradesh government provides financial benefits to Be from a family living below the poverty line.

name: PM-YASASVI: Post-Matric Scholarship for OBC, EBC and DNT Students
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: The objective of the scheme is to provide financial assistance to the OBC, EBC and DNT students studying at post-matriculation or post-secondary stage to enable them to complete their education.

name: Horticulture Mission for North Eastern Hill Scheme- Meghalaya
description: The objective of the scheme is to improve productivity, quality planting material, canopy management of fruit trees, support marginal and small farmers, upscaling protected cultivation, and drip irrigation.

name: Mission for Integrated Development of Horticulture Sub Scheme Horticulture Mission for North East and Himalayan Region- Meghalaya
description: The scheme is implemented by the Department of Agriculture & Farmers’ Welfare, Government of Meghalaya to promote holistic growth of Horticulture sector thorough promotion, extension, post-harvest management, processing and marketing.

name: Fruit Processing Centre
description: The objective of scheme is to disseminate technical knowhow to youth entrepreneurs, farmers & housewives through practical demonstration on importance of fruit preservation & to manufacture quality processed fruit products such as Squashes, Jams, Jelly & Juices under trade name ‘Meg Fruits Product'.

name: Production Incentive / Back-Ended Subsidy for Cultivation of Horticulture Crops
description: Through this scheme, the farmers who possess farmer's identity cards / authenticated land records/documents are provided with One-Time Assistance/ Bi‐Annual Assistance/ Annual Assistance for the Cultivation of Horticulture Crops such as Mango, Guava, and Sapota.

name: State Agriculture Scholarship for B.Sc. & M.Sc. Agriculture
description: The scheme “State Agriculture Scholarship for B.Sc. & M.Sc. Agriculture” was launched by the Department of Agriculture, Government of Nagaland to provide educational assistance to students who are undergoing undergraduate (B.Sc. Agriculture) and post-graduate programme (M.Sc. Agriculture).

name: Regional Centre for Training and Production of Mushroom
description: The objective of the scheme is to train farmers in the method of mushroom cultivation and to supply quality spawn and pasteurized compost to farmers.

name: "Subsidy for Cultivation of Fodder Crops" Component of the "Crop Production Technology" Scheme
description: The "Subsidy for Cultivation of Fodder Crops" scheme was introduced by the Department of Agriculture and Farmer's Welfare, Union Territory of Puducherry. Through this scheme, cash incentives are distributed to Farmers and Self Help Groups for undertaking fodder cultivation in the Puducherry region.

name: Soil Resource Management and Inputs Quality Control
description: Through the scheme “Soil Resource Management and Inputs Quality Control", the farmers can give their soil and water samples to the soil testing lab for analysis and recommendation at completely free of cost.

name: Incentive For Eye Donors
description: The scheme “Incentive For Eye Donors” by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry was introduced to create awareness among the public about the eye donation and to pay an amount of incentive to the donors of eye. In this scheme, an amount ₹ 10,000/- per beneficiary is provided.

name: State Technical Scholarship for ST Student
description: The financial assistance is provided to students of Scheduled Tribe Communities who are pursuing Diploma/ Degree/Post Graduated/course in Engineering Institutes recognized by All India Council for Technical Education and, also provided to students who are pursuing UG or PG in Forestry courses.

name: Agriculture Engineering (Mechanical) Scheme
description: The objective of the scheme is to provide agricultural machinery such as power tillers/ bulldozers/ tractors etc. on hiring at subsidised rate.

name: Basic Agriculture Training Centre Scheme
description: The objective of the scheme is to provide short-term vocational training for rural educated unemployed youths in agriculture and allied sectors to develop entrepreneurship skills and employment generation.

name: "Training in Handicrafts" Component of the "Development Of Handicrafts" Scheme
description: The "Training in Handicrafts" Component of the "Development Of Handicrafts" Scheme by the Department of Industries and Commerce, Government of Puducherry, aims to create better employment opportunities and enhance the livelihood of the rural poor. The training adopts a Gurukulam model.

name: “Exposure Tour for the Coir Artisans” Component of the "Development of Coir" Scheme
description: The scheme “Exposure Tour For The Coir Artisans” by the Dept of Industries and Commerce, Union Territory of Puducherry is introduced for acquiring the latest techniques and innovative ideas in various coir units located in other states, the exposure tour will be conducted for the coir artisans.

name: "Entrepreneurship Development Programme" Component of the "Development of Coir" Scheme
description: The scheme aims to provide Entrepreneurship training, to encourage prospective entrepreneurs to start the coir industry. Awareness programmes will also be arranged for the existing coir industries about the modern technology and scheme, and incentives available under the State Grant.

name: "Monthly Grant To Old Crafts Persons (Pension)" Component of the "Development of Handicrafts" Scheme
description: "Monthly Grant To Old Crafts Persons (Pension)” by the Department of Industries and Commerce, Union Territory of Puducherry, aims to provide pensions to artisans in their old age, recognizing their contribution to traditional crafts. Eligible craftspersons receive a monthly grant of ₹2,000/-.

name: "Conducting of Exhibitions" Component of the "Development of Coir" Scheme
description: The scheme "Conducting of Exhibitions" aims to enhance awareness of diverse coir products and promote their market presence. It extends financial support, including a daily allowance of ₹150 per participant and travel reimbursements, to both local and outstation participants.

name: Insurance Scheme For Artisans Component of the Development of Handicrafts Scheme
description: Under the scheme "Insurance Scheme For Artisans", artisans are covered under Jana Shree Bima Yojana LIC or any other suitable policy. The premium amount, as stipulated in the insurance policy, is shared, with 50% from the Social Security Fund and the remaining 50% from the Government.

name: The Andaman & Nicobar Islands Old Age Assistance Scheme
description: The aim of the scheme is to provide social security by way of financial assistance to destitute, senior citizens who are without any means of subsistence and having no one to give financial support to them for their livelihood.

name: Mukhyamantri Vishesh Yogyajan Sammaan Pension Yojana
description: The "Mukhyamantri Vishesh Yogyajan Samman Pension Yojana" (MVSYS) stands as a testament to the commitment of the Government of Rajasthan towards the welfare of its citizens, particularly those with disabilities.

name: Mukhyamantri Vriddhjan Samman Pension Yojana
description: The Rajasthan government's Social Justice and Empowerment Department launched the "Mukhyamantri Vriddhjan Samman Pension Yojana" program, a social welfare initiative that aims to improve the lives of senior citizens residing in the state by providing them with monthly financial assistance.

name: Differently Abled Pension Scheme
description: The 'Differently Abled Pension Scheme' aims to provide a pension of ₹1,000/- to differently-abled persons with disability level 40% and above. The scheme provides other benefits every year during the Pongal and Deepavali festival saree, dhoti and a nutritious meal is supplied through Anganwadi.

name: Maternity Benefit (ANBOCWWB)
description: The scheme offers maternity benefits to female employees registered as beneficiaries for one year during their maternity period. Additionally, male employees, registered for a year, with wives aged 19 or older and not beneficiaries, are also eligible for maternity benefits.

name: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme - Tamil Nadu
description: 'Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme' was launched by the Social Welfare and Women Empowerment Dept, Tamil Nadu. A pension of ₹1,000 is provided to destitute widows who are 40 years and above in age and belong to households below the poverty line.

name: Destitute Widow Pension Scheme
description: 'Destitute Widow Pension Scheme' was launched by the Social Welfare and Women Empowerment Dept, Tamil Nadu. A pension of ₹1,000 is provided to destitute widows who are 18 years and above in age. One free saree during Pongal and Deepavali and free rice in the Anganwadi Centres are also provided.

name: Mukhyamantri Sports Development Scheme - Unemployed Young Professional Sportsperson
description: Launched on 9th February 2024, "Mukhyamantri Sports Development Scheme - Unemployed Young Professional Sportsperson" was launched by the Directorate of Youth Affairs & Sports, Govt. of Tripura. The scheme aims to generate employment opportunities for young experienced professional sportspersons

name: Marriage Benefit (MBOCWWB)
description: Under the scheme, financial assistance shall be provided to registered construction workers for their own marriage. This assistance shall also be sanctioned for the marriage of all adult children of a worker subject to production of proper documentation such as Marriage Certificates etc.

name: Medical Assistance (MBOCWWB)
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to registered construction workers who are hospitalized for five or more days due to an accident or any disease.

name: Free Bus Pass for Media Persons
description: "Free Bus Pass for Media Persons" scheme by the Dept of Information & Publicity, Puducherry, aims to provide a free bus pass facility to media persons working in Puducherry in Puducherry Road Transport Corporation buses (except town buses) to undertake journeys for their professional requirements.

name: Sathiyavanimuthu Ammaiyar Ninaivu Free Supply of Sewing Machine Scheme
description: The 'Sathiyavanimuthu Ammaiyar Ninaivu Free Supply of Sewing Machine Scheme' was launched by the Social Welfare and Women Empowerment Department, Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide sewing machines to destitute, deserted women/widows, differently abled men & women to increase self-employment.

name: The Andaman & Nicobar Islands Old Age Assistance Scheme
description: The aim of the scheme is to provide social security by way of financial assistance to destitute, senior citizens who are without any means of subsistence and having no one to give financial support to them for their livelihood.

name: Kantedar Tarbandi Yojana
description: A initiative of Rajasthan State for the farmer to protect crops from damage caused by Nilgai and stray animals. Financial assistance will be provided to the farmers by the Rajasthan government for fencing their fields.

name: Loans for Tools (MBOCWWB)
description: Under the scheme, a one-time grant will be granted to all members of the fund for the purchase of tools subject to the conditions.

name: Medical Assistance Scheme (PBAOCWWB)
description: The "Medical Assistance" scheme provides financial assistance to Construction Workers hospitalized for five or more days due to an accident or disease. The financial assistance shall be ₹500/- for the first 5 days and ₹50/- each for the remaining days, subject to a maximum of ₹1,5000/-.

name: Sathiyavanimuthu Ammaiyar Ninaivu Free Supply of Sewing Machine Scheme
description: The 'Sathiyavanimuthu Ammaiyar Ninaivu Free Supply of Sewing Machine Scheme' was launched by the Social Welfare and Women Empowerment Department, Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide sewing machines to destitute, deserted women/widows, differently abled men & women to increase self-employment.

name: Diwali Gift Benefit Scheme (PBAOCWWB)
description: Through the "Diwali Gift Benefit" scheme, the Board sanction sum of ₹ 2,000/- to each beneficiary enrolled in the Board every year to celebrate the Diwali festival. The amount is credited through DBT into the bank account of the registered construction worker. The applications are accepted offline.

name: Vishist Coaching Scheme (GBOCWWB)
description: The “Vishist Coaching Scheme” is implemented by Gujarat Building & Other Construction Worker’s Welfare Board, Labour, Govt. of Gujarat. Under this scheme, both the registration fee & coaching/tuition fees will be reimbursed/paid for the career development of the children of construction workers.

name: Sinchai Pipeline Karyakram
description: In "Sinchai Pipeline Karyakram" Rajasthan government will provide subsidies to farmers on purchasing irrigation pipelines. So that farmers can get rid of the problem of irrigation. And their income can increase.

name: Drip Sanyantr
description: Under the Drip Sanyantr scheme, the government gives subsidies to farmers. There is an immense saving of water in this method. Under this method, water is applied drop by drop to the roots of the plants and wastage of water will negligible.

name: Labour Accident benefit Scheme- Gujarat Labour Welfare Board
description: Under the scheme, financial assistance is provided to workers (Shramyogis) who become disabled during their duty period due to an accident or any other reason at the working premises of the establishment.

name: Scheme for Giving Awards to Junior Artists in Contemporary Art Field
description: The "Scheme for Giving Awards to Junior Artists in Contemporary Art Field" was launched by the Art and Culture Department, Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to encourage junior artists towards Painting & Sculpture arts by giving an award of ₹10,000/- at the state-level contemporary art exhibition.

name: Shramik Parivahan Yojana (GBOCWWB)
description: The registered construction workers will be provided a bus pass through the Municipal Corporation at a concessional rate for commuting from Kadianaka to the workplace.

name: Kantedar Tarbandi Yojana
description: A initiative of Rajasthan State for the farmer to protect crops from damage caused by Nilgai and stray animals. Financial assistance will be provided to the farmers by the Rajasthan government for fencing their fields.

name: Integrated Farming in Micro Watershed Scheme
description: The objective of the scheme is to promote integrated farming activities for improved livelihood in a complementary manner.

name: Fawara Sanyantra
description: Under the Fawara Sanyantra Through this scheme, the government will provide subsidies to farmers to install sprinkler plants. This will save water and farmers will also be able to irrigate their fields through sprinklers.

name: Scheme of Giving Awards to Eminent Artists - Kalai Sudarmani Award
description: "Scheme of Giving Awards to Eminent Artists - Kalai Sudarmani Award" by the Art and Culture Department, Government of Tamil Nadu aims to promote and preserve the culture of Tamil Nadu. The selected artists are awarded financial assistance ₹10,000/- and certificates of appreciation.

name: Go-Green Shramik Scheme (GBOCWWB)
description: Under the scheme, a one-time subsidy will be provided on the purchase of electric two-wheelers to construction workers who are registered with the Gujarat Building and Other Construction Worker’s Welfare Board.

name: Shramik Annapurna Yojana (GBOCWWB)
description: Under the scheme, registered construction workers are entitled to receive nutritious meals at concessional rates at the workplace or on Kadianaka. This benefit extends to the registered worker's family members as well.

name: Scheme of Grant-In-Aid for Conduct of Art Exhibitions: One-Man Shows
description: "Scheme of Grant-In-Aid for Conduct of Art Exhibitions: One-Man Shows" was launched by the Art and Culture Department, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to encourage talented artists in the field of painting, and sculpture by granting ₹25,000/- for conducting "one-man show" art exhibitions.

name: Go Green Scheme- Gujarat Labour Welfare Board
description: The objective of the scheme is to encourage Labourers/Industrial Workers to purchase of battery operated electric two-wheelers that reduce carbon emissions.

name: Khet Talai
description: Under the Khet Talai scheme, the Rajasthan Government gives subsidies to the farmers on the construction of farm ponds so that the farmers can collect rainwater and irrigate their fields by making farm ponds in their fields.

name: Manav Garima Yojana
description: The scheme offers financial assistance to Scheduled Caste individuals who wish to establish cottage industries for self-employment without requiring bank loans. Employment/tool kits are provided to those who seek self-employment opportunities.

name: Grant to Meritorious Wards of Ex-Servicemen in Academics (Lump Sum Grant)
description: Through this scheme, the academically meritorious wards of the ESM / Widows of ESM who have secured the top three ranks in academics are provided with lump sum grants of upto ₹18,000. The application should be submitted within three months from the date of publication of the result.

name: Funeral Assistance (GBOCWWB)
description: "Funeral Assistance (GBOCWWB)" is a Welfare Scheme by the Goa Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board of the Department of Labour and Employment, Government of Goa. Through this scheme, the nominee/dependant of the deceased worker is provided with financial assistance of ₹5,000/-.

name: Special Scholarship to SC Students in Selected Schools
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to SC students studying in famous private selected schools i.e. Doon School, Dehradun; Sofiya School, Abu; Mayo school, Ajmer; Sainik School, Balachadi; Mahila Sainik School, Kherva; Dist. Mehsana, etc. will be paid actual fees upto limit of ₹50,000/- p.a.

name: Concession in Railway Travel
description: The scheme "Concession in Railway Travel" was launched by the Dept. of Art & Culture, Tamil Nadu. Under the scheme, individual artists and troupes are allowed to travel in the train on concession by the Railways. A concession certificate will be issued by Mandram.

name: Hearing Aid Grant (Sainik Welfare)
description: "Hearing Aid Grant" scheme by the Armed Forces Flag Day Fund of the Dept of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry, provides ₹8,000/- for the purchase of Hearing Aid to the ESM/Widows of ESM registered with the Dept. The members of the Ex-Servicemen Contributory Health Scheme (ECHS) are not eligible.

name: Rajiv Gandhi Krishak Sathi Sahayta Yojana
description: The Rajiv Gandhi Krishak Sathi Sahayta Yojana offers financial support to farmers, farmworkers, and market laborers who are accidentally injured or killed while working in agriculture or at agricultural markets.

name: Thatched House Repair Grant for Re-thatching & Repairs (Sainik Welfare)
description: Through the "Thatched House Repair Grant for Re-thatching & Repairs" scheme, up to ₹40,000/- is provided to the registered ESM / Widows of ESM / Dependents of ESM every three years, for the re-thatching & repair of their house. The applicant should be receiving a Subsistence Allowance.

name: One Time Cash Incentive towards Learning Driving (Sainik Welfare)
description: "One Time Cash Incentive towards Learning Driving" is a Welfare Scheme by the Dept of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry. Through this scheme, up to ₹4,000/- is provided to the unemployed Ex-servicemen to learn to drive. The driving course should be taken from a Government-recognized School/Institution.

name: Dr. P. G. Solanki Scheme for Stipend to Scheduled Caste Lawyers
description: Under the scheme, a monthly stipend is provided for three years to law graduates belonging to the scheduled caste category, as well as to the senior lawyer who trains such individuals. This support is extended due to their poor financial condition, aiming to prevent mid-practice dropout.

name: Manav Garima Yojana
description: The scheme offers financial assistance to Scheduled Caste individuals who wish to establish cottage industries for self-employment without requiring bank loans. Employment/tool kits are provided to those who seek self-employment opportunities.

name: Grant to Meritorious Wards of Ex-Servicemen in Academics (Lump Sum Grant)
description: Through this scheme, the academically meritorious wards of the ESM / Widows of ESM who have secured the top three ranks in academics are provided with lump sum grants of upto ₹18,000. The application should be submitted within three months from the date of publication of the result.

name: Plastic Mulching
description: Under the Plastic Mulching scheme, the Rajasthan government provided subsidies to farmers. In this, the soil surface of the field is covered with plastic film. Farmer can also use crop residues for laying mulch.

name: Dr. P. G. Solanki Scheme for Stipend to Scheduled Caste Lawyers
description: Under the scheme, a monthly stipend is provided for three years to law graduates belonging to the scheduled caste category, as well as to the senior lawyer who trains such individuals. This support is extended due to their poor financial condition, aiming to prevent mid-practice dropout.

name: Post-Matric Scholarships for Scheduled Castes Students- Gujarat
description: The objective of the scheme is to appreciably increase the Gross Enrolment Ratio of SC students in higher education with a focus on those from the poorest households, by providing financial assistance at post-matriculation or postsecondary stage to enable them to complete their education.

name: Scheme for Award of Scholarships to School or College-Going Children of Employees/Industrial Employees in Various Establishments
description: "Scheme for Award of Scholarships to School or College-Going Children of Employees/Industrial Employees in Various Establishments" by the Dept of Labour and Employment, Goa provides financial assistance to the children of industry workers to support their educational pursuits.

name: Mahadevi Verma Shramik Pustak Kraya Dhan Yojana
description: The Mahadevi Verma Shramik Pustak Kraya Dhan Yojana (MVSPKDPY) is a scheme launched by the Uttar Pradesh government in 2022 to provide financial assistance to the daughters of construction workers for purchasing books.

name: Marriage Assistance to Normal Persons Marrying Orthopedically Differently Abled Persons
description: The scheme 'Marriage Assistance to Normal Persons Marrying Orthopedically Differently Abled Persons' was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide marriage assistance to a normal person.

name: Gen Next Competition
description: The "Gen Next Competition" scheme was launched by the Department of Handlooms, Handicrafts, Textiles & Khadi, Govt. of Tamil Nadu. A craft competition was started from the year 2013-2014 to encourage the youth to retain the traditional handicrafts of Tamil Nadu & pass them on to the next generation.

name: Alpsankhyak Merit-Cum-Means Chatravriti Yojana
description: Under the Alpsankhyak Merit-Cum-Means Chatravriti Yojana, the Government of Madhya Pradesh provided financial support to those people who are not able to study due to financial circumstances.

name: Fodder Minikits under Integrated Fodder Development Scheme (General Category)
description: The scheme “Fodder Minikits under Integrated Fodder Development Scheme” is implemented by the Directorate of Animal Husbandry, Government of Gujarat to provide an improved variety of fodder seeds to beneficiaries for widespread publicity, demonstration, and adaptation by farmers.

name: Pichda Varg Post Matric Chhatravritti
description: Under Pichda Varg Post Matric Chhatravritti Madhya Pradesh Government aimed at providing financial assistance to economically disadvantaged students belonging to these marginalized communities.

name: Hearing Aid Grant (Sainik Welfare)
description: "Hearing Aid Grant" scheme by the Armed Forces Flag Day Fund of the Dept of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry, provides ₹8,000/- for the purchase of Hearing Aid to the ESM/Widows of ESM registered with the Dept. The members of the Ex-Servicemen Contributory Health Scheme (ECHS) are not eligible.

name: Financial Assistance for Education (GBOCWWB)
description: Through the "Financial Assistance for Education (GBOCWWB)" scheme, the worker registered with the Board is provided with financial assistance, as determined by the Board, for the education of their children. The applications are accepted offline.

name: Interim Relief to the Beneficiaries Affected by Disaster (GBOCWWB)
description: Through "Interim Relief to the Beneficiaries Affected by Disaster (GBOCWWB)" , the beneficiaries of the Board who are affected by disasters, catastrophes or natural calamities are extended immediate relief of up to ₹10,00,000/-. This shall include cash payment to beneficiaries of the affected area.

name: Marriage Assistance to Differently Abled Persons Marrying Differently Abled Persons
description: The scheme 'Marriage Assistance to Differently Abled Persons Marrying Differently Abled Persons' was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to differently-abled couple.

name: Ex-gratia Payment for the Construction Workers
description: The "Ex-gratia Payment for the Construction Workers" by the Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Department, Delhi, is a welfare scheme for the registered workers of the board that provides an ex-gratia amount of ₹1,00,000/- in case of permanent disability.

name: Son/Daughter Education Assistance (UKBOCWWB)
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to the children of registered building and construction workers pursuing education from Class I up to higher education or professional courses.

name: Bicycle/Sewing Machine Assistance Scheme (UKBOCWWB)
description: Under the scheme, bicycles are provided to registered building & construction workers in plain areas, while sewing machines are provided to registered workers or their dependents in mountainous/hilly areas. These benefits are granted only once in a lifetime.

name: Unemployment Allowance to Differently Abled Persons
description: The scheme "Unemployment Allowance to Differently Abled Persons" was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide unemployment allowance to differently-abled persons.

name: Financial Assistance for Miscarriage for the Construction Workers
description: "Financial Assistance for Miscarriage for the Construction Workers" by the Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Department, Delhi, is a welfare scheme that provides an amount of ₹3,000/- as financial assistance in case of miscarriage.

name: Assistance to Law Graduates
description: The "Assistance to Law Graduates" scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹50,000 will be given to the differently abled Law graduates for enrolment in the Bar Council as lawyer.

name: Book Binder Training by Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons
description: The 'Book Binder Training by Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons' was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide book binder training to visually impaired candidates.

name: Special Education - Tamil Nadu
description: The scheme 'Special Education by Welfare of Differently Abled Persons' was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide free special education, & vocational training to the visually impaired, hearing-impaired person.

name: Smart Phone for Hearing and Visually Impaired Persons
description: The scheme 'Smart Phone for Hearing and Visually Impaired Persons' was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to distribute smart phone to needy visually impaired & hearing impaired students, unemployed youth, self-employed.

name: Calipers and Crutches - Tamil Nadu
description: The 'Calipers and Crutches by Welfare of Differently Abled Persons' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Tamil Nadu. In this scheme, calipers & crutches are given to the needy & deserving orthopedically differently-abled persons for their easy mobility.

name: Goggles by Welfare of Differently Abled Persons Department
description: The 'Goggles by Welfare of Differently Abled Persons Department' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to distribute goggles to needy visually impaired persons to enable them to protect themselves from sunlight.

name: Book Binder Training by Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons
description: The 'Book Binder Training by Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons' was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide book binder training to visually impaired candidates.

name: Assistance for Purchase of House (HBOCWWB)
description: Under this scheme, interest free loan is provided to registered construction workers, who have minimum five year’s regular membership, for purchase or construction of their houses. This facility is available once in lifetime.

name: Funeral Assistance (HBOCWWB)
description: Under this scheme, the “Haryana Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board” (HBOCWWB) provides financial assistance for funeral expenses to the nominee or legal heir of a registered worker in the event of their death.

name: Modular Functional Artificial Limbs
description: The 'Modular Functional Artificial Limbs' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. Under this scheme, modular functional artificial limbs are provided for orthopedically differently-abled students, employed or self-employed.

name: Maternity Financial Assistance (UKBOCWWB)
description: The scheme aims to provide financial support to registered women construction workers during the maternity period. This assistance is admissible only for the birth of up to two children.

name: Yatra Pass in DTC non AC Buses for the Construction Workers
description: The "Yatra Pass in DTC non AC Buses for the Construction Workers" by the Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Department, Delhi, is a welfare scheme that provides a pass of ₹ 2400/- per three months for non AC DTC bus to the registered workers for purchasing.

name: Goggles by Welfare of Differently Abled Persons Department
