description: The 'Goggles by Welfare of Differently Abled Persons Department' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to distribute goggles to needy visually impaired persons to enable them to protect themselves from sunlight.

name: Pashu Bima Yojana
description: The scheme 'Pashu Bima Yojna' was launched by the Directorate of Dairy Development, Government of Bihar. The scheme aims to provide insurance security to farmers against the financial loss caused by cattle death and to improve the rural economy.

name: Himachal Pradesh Patrakar Kalyan Yojana
description: The scheme "Himachal Pradesh Patrakar Kalyan Yojana" was launched by the Director of Information and Public Relations Department, Govt. of Himachal Pradesh aims to provide financial assistance to the serving accredited journalists & retired accredited journalists in adverse situations as accident.

name: Mukhyamantri Pragatishil Pashupalak Protsahan Yojana
description: The "Mukhyamantri Pragatisheel Pashupalak Protsahan Yojana" is an initiative under the "Nand Baba Milk Mission" aimed to encourage the trend of rearing indigenous breed of cows with high quality and productivity in the state & motivate cattle farmers for breed improvement of cows, their better care.

name: Divyang Pension Scheme - Uttarakhand
description: The scheme aims to support persons with disabilities in meeting their basic needs and improving their quality of life. Under this scheme, a monthly pension of ₹1,500/- is provided to persons with disabilities who are above18 years of age & have a disability of more than 40%.

name: Grant for the Marriage of Daughter of Destitute Widow
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance of ₹50,000/- per daughter for the marriage of up to two daughters of destitute widows who are receiving widow pension and whose total monthly income from all sources does not exceed ₹4,000/-, or who belong to BPL families.

name: Solar Energy Corporation of India (SECI) Internship
state: Ministry Of New and Renewable Energy
description: The SECI Internship Policy is designed to provide practical experience to students in the renewable energy sector. The program aims to give interns exposure to SECI's various divisions, helping them understand the renewable energy sector.

name: Financial Assistance to Indigent Artistes
description: The scheme "Financial Assistance to Indigent Artistes" was launched by the Arts and Culture Department, Puducherry. The scheme aims to provide financial assistance of ₹1,000/- per month to indigent artists aged 50 years and above and contributions to music, dance, drama, folk, painting, sculpture.

name: Widow Pension (HBOCWWB)
description: Under this scheme, a monthly pension of ₹3,000/- is given to the widow of a registered construction worker who is not receiving a similar benefit from any other Government/ Department/ Board/ Corporation /PSU.

name: Awarding of Tamil Mamani, Telugu Ratna and Malayala Ratna
description: The Arts and Culture Department of Puducherry launched the "Awarding of Tamil Mamani, Telugu Ratna and Malayala Ratna" scheme with the aims to provide a cash award to the author/writer who have published books.

name: Awarding of Tamil Mamani, Telugu Ratna and Malayala Ratna
description: The Arts and Culture Department of Puducherry launched the "Awarding of Tamil Mamani, Telugu Ratna and Malayala Ratna" scheme with the aims to provide a cash award to the author/writer who have published books.

name: Award of Puduvai Kalaimamani
description: The "Award of Puduvai Kalaimamani" scheme was launched by the Arts and Culture Department, Puducherry. The scheme aims to provide prizes and awards to artists or authors/writers in the fields of Literature, Music, Dance, Drama, Painting and Sculpture, and Folk arts.

name: Scheme for Providing Employment Opportunities by Establishing Piggery, Sheep and Goat Units (General) under Mukhya Mantri Antyodaya Parivaar Utthan Yojana
description: Under this scheme, an unemployed resident of Haryana who is between 18 and 60 years of age can avail a 25% subsidy on the cost of livestock, provided they have taken a loan for establishing a 10+1 Piggery unit or a 15+1 Sheep/Goat unit.

name: Mukhyamantri Divyangjan Sashaktikaran Chhatra Yojana
description: "Mukhyamantri Divyangjan Sashaktikaran Chhatra Yojana" aims to provide comprehensive support to the disabled community in Bihar. A significant component of this scheme involves the distribution of battery-operated tricycles to beneficiaries to enhance their mobility and independence.

name: Widow Pension (HBOCWWB)
description: Under this scheme, a monthly pension of ₹3,000/- is given to the widow of a registered construction worker who is not receiving a similar benefit from any other Government/ Department/ Board/ Corporation /PSU.

name: Small Industries Unit for Persons with Disabilities
description: This scheme provides loan of up to ₹25 lakhs is provided to persons with disabilities for establishing small industrial units focused on manufacturing, fabrication, & production. Permanent residents of Haryana, aged 18 or older, with a disability of 40% or more, is eligible to avail the benefits.

name: Purchase of Vehicle for Commercial Hiring Purpose for Persons with Disabilities
description: Under the scheme, loans are provided to differently-abled persons for commercial hiring purposes up to ₹10.00 lakhs, and for the purchase of special category vehicles like JCBs, trucks, road rollers, etc., loans up to ₹25.00 lakhs are available.

name: Chief Minister's Self Employment Scheme
description: The "Chief Minister's Self Employment Scheme" was launched by the Department of Personnel, and Reforms, Training, Public Grievances, Government of Sikkim. The scheme aims to provide loan to unemployed youth who belong below the poverty line.

name: Mahila Adhikarita Yojana under NSKFDC- Haryana
description: Under this scheme, loan is provided to woman Safai Karamchari and their dependent daughters for projects with a maximum project cost of up to ₹2,00,000/- for small and petty trade/businesses, and various income-generating activities such as beauty parlors, boutiques, cosmetic shop, bangle shop, etc.

name: Micro Credit Finance (NSFDC)
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: The scheme is implemented by the National Scheduled Castes Finance & Development Corporation, Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment, Govt. of India. Under this scheme, loans are provided to individuals from the SC community for units costing up to ₹1,40,000/- for income-generating activities.

name: Permanent Disability/ Death Benefit for the Construction Workers
description: The "Permanent Disability/ Death Benefit for the Construction Workers" by the Sikkim BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, is a welfare scheme of the board that provides financial assistance is provided to the nominees/ dependents of a member, in case of his/her death or Permanent Disability.

name: Pension Benefit for the Construction Worker
description: The "Pension Benefit for the Construction Workers" by the Sikkim BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, is a welfare scheme of the board that provides pension to the registered beneficiaries of the Board who have completed the age of 60 years.

name: Deen Dayal Swasthya Seva Yojana
description: To facilitate and take the medical services to the next level, the State of Goa envisaged the present scheme to provide its people with quality medical care and treatment of diseases, hospitalization and surgery through Government and private hospitals.

name: Bharati Scheme for Education - 6th Class to 10th Class
description: "The Bharati Scheme for Education - 6th Class to 10th Class" encourages Brahmin students of Andhra Pradesh to continue their education. Under this scheme, financial assistance for the academic year will be granted to eligible poor Brahmin student applicants.

name: Establishment of Regional Semen Production Laboratory and Semen Bank for sheep and goat
state: Ministry of Fisheries,Animal Husbandry and Dairying
description: Under the Establishment of Regional Semen Production Laboratory and Semen Bank for Sheep and Goat Scheme, the Central Government will provide assistance for the establishment of frozen semen production laboratories for goats and liquid semen production laboratories for sheep at the regional level.

name: Financial Assistance for Education for the Construction Workers
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: The "Financial Assistance for Education for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,  U.T. Administration of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides reimbursement for education of up to two children of the members.

name: Internship Scheme
description: The aim of this scheme is to allow short-term exposure to youth about working of the different sections of the Department of Forests and Wildlife, GNCTD as ‘Interns’.

name: Kanya Saksharta Protsahan Yojana (For Scheduled Caste Girls)
description: Under this scheme, Scheduled Caste girls who pass the Class 10th and enroll in the Class 11th at a government or recognized institution and study regularly are given an incentive of ₹3,000/- per year.

name: Death Benefit (O.B.O.C.W.W.B)
description: The "Death Benefit'' scheme by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour and Employment Department, Odisha, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance to the nominee(s) of the beneficiary as death benefit.

name: Matsya Pokhari Yojana
description: The "Machha Chasa Pain Nua Pokhari Khola Yojana (Matsya Pokhari Yojana)" aims to boost fish production in Odisha by creating new water bodies through pond excavation. It targets income generation & employment via freshwater aquaculture. Subsidies are available for pond areas between 0.2 to 2 hectare

name: Grant for the Purchase of Working Tools (O.B.O.C.W.W.B)
description: The scheme “Grant for the Purchase of Working Tools” by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, Odisha, is a welfare scheme that provides one-time reimbursement to each registered beneficiary of the Board for purchasing tools.

name: Hostel Scheme for Disabled Students
description: The objective of the scheme is to provide hostel facilities to such disabled students who are taking admission in class 11th and above on a regular basis and in case hostel facilities are not available in the schools/colleges, by renting private buildings.

name: Scholarship for Children of Deceased/Disabled/Retired Government Employees
description: The objective of this scheme is to motivate children of government employees who are deceased, retired, or disabled. Under this scheme, scholarships ranging from ₹50/- to ₹250/- are provided to children of these government employees who are studying in Class 1 to Class 12 in government schools.

name: State Government SC Scholarship (Class 1 to 10)
description: The scheme was launched by School Education Department, Govt. of Madhya Pradesh, aims to improve educational status of SC students by providing scholarships. Under this scheme, scholarships are provided to SC girl students in Classes 1 to 5,and to both boys & girls in SC category in Classes 6 to 10.

name: Student Welfare Scheme
description: The objective of the scheme is to provide assistance to economically weaker ST students to meet their emergency needs in special circumstances. Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided to ST students studying in Class 1 to 10 in cases of urgency or emergency.

name: Marriage Grant to Orphan Daughter of Ex-Servicemen
description: The scheme is implemented by the Sainik and Ardh Sainik Welfare Department, Government of Haryana. Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹51,000 is provided for the marriage of each dependent orphan daughter of an ex-serviceman, for up to two daughters, who are at least 18 years old.

name: Cycle Distribution Scheme
description: Under this scheme, tribal girl students in Class 11th who travel more than 2 km to reach school and did not receive a bicycle in Class 9th are given a cash amount equivalent to the cost of a bicycle.

name: Maternity Benefit (O.B.O.C.W.W.B)
description: The “Maternity Benefit” scheme by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, Odisha, is a welfare scheme that provides maternity benefits to the female beneficiaries subject to a maximum of two children who  are registered beneficiaries for a period of more than one year under the board.

name: Poshan Aahaar- Madhya Pradesh
description: The scheme was implemented by the Women and Child Development Department, Government of Madhya Pradesh. Under this scheme, children from 6 months to 6 years, pregnant women, and malnourished children are given nutritious food through Anganwadis.

name: Scheme for Maternity Benefit
description: The Scheme for Maternity Benefit was launched by the Tripura Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, under the Labour Department of Tripura. The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to registered female construction workers after delivery

name: State Government SC Scholarship (Class 1 to 10)
description: The scheme was launched by School Education Department, Govt. of Madhya Pradesh, aims to improve educational status of SC students by providing scholarships. Under this scheme, scholarships are provided to SC girl students in Classes 1 to 5,and to both boys & girls in SC category in Classes 6 to 10.

name: Marriage Grant to Orphan Daughter of Ex-Servicemen
description: The scheme is implemented by the Sainik and Ardh Sainik Welfare Department, Government of Haryana. Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹51,000 is provided for the marriage of each dependent orphan daughter of an ex-serviceman, for up to two daughters, who are at least 18 years old.

name: Maternity Benefit (O.B.O.C.W.W.B)
description: The “Maternity Benefit” scheme by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, Odisha, is a welfare scheme that provides maternity benefits to the female beneficiaries subject to a maximum of two children who  are registered beneficiaries for a period of more than one year under the board.

name: Skill Development Training - 15 Days Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL) Training Programme at Work Site
description: The Telangana Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board offers offers a 15-day Recognition of Prior Learning training programme for registered construction workers. The programme aims to enhance the employability of workers, ensuring they meet industry standards for future opportunities.

name: Leave Travelling Concession Scheme (P.B.O.C.W.W.B)
description: The "Leave Travelling Concession Scheme'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Department of Labour, Punjab, is a welfare scheme that provides leave travel concession to the registered construction workers for journeys to religious/ historical places in India or visiting their hometown.

name: Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme- Chhattisgarh
description: Under this scheme, a monthly pension of ₹500/- is provided to severely disabled (with a disability of 80% and above) and multi-disabled individuals aged 18 to 79 years who are living below the poverty line (BPL) to support them in living a respectful life.

name: Tool Kit Scheme (P.B.O.C.W.W.B)
description: The "Tool Kit Scheme'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Department of Labour, Punjab, is a welfare scheme that provides reimbursement for purchasing tools to registered construction workers who have obtained training under the Skill Upgradation or RPL Scheme of the Board.

name: Mukhyamantri - Majhi Ladki Bahin Yojana
description: The "Mukhyamantri - Majhi Ladki Bahin Yojana" is for the economic freedom of women in the state age group of 21 to 65, improving their health and nutrition and strengthening their decisive role in the family. The women will receive a financial benefit through direct benefit transfer.

name: Chief Minister Pension Scheme
description: The scheme provides a monthly pension of ₹500/- to senior citizens, widows, and abandoned women listed on the basis of the survey list of Social, Economic and Caste Census 2011 in the state.

name: Accident Assistance (K.B.O.C.W.W.B)
description: The "Accident Assistance'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Department of Labour, Karnataka, is a welfare scheme that aims to provide compensation of a certain amount both from the employer and the Board.

name: Santwana Scheme - Karnataka
description: The "Santwana Scheme" offers loans to religious minority individuals whose houses or shops have been destroyed by natural calamities or communal violence. The scheme provides up to ₹5,00,000/- per unit, with 50% as a loan and 50% as a subsidy

name: Funeral and Ex-Gratia (K.B.O.C.W.W.B)
description: The "Funeral and Ex-Gratia'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Department of Labour, Karnataka, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance to the nominee of a deceased registered construction worker to cover funeral expenses and an ex-gratia payment to alleviate financial hardship.

name: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme- Bihar
description: Under this scheme, a monthly pension is provided to elderly people (women/men) aged 60 years or above belonging to Below Poverty Line (BPL) families to support them financially. This scheme is centrally sponsored.

name: Financial Assistance to Traditional Artisans (Panchavrutthi Scheme)
description: The "Financial Assistance to Traditional Artisans (Panchavrutthi Scheme)" provides financial assistance to traditional artisans of the Vishwakarma community in Karnataka. The scheme aims to help these artisans purchase modern tools & upgrade their technological skills to enhance their trade.

name: Scheme for Adolescent Girls- Bihar
description: This scheme is implemented in Bihar since 2011 through the Anganwadi centers under the Integrated Child Development Project. Under this scheme, adolescent girls aged 11 to 14 years who are not attending school receive a monthly take-home ration and skill development training.

name: Mukhyamantri Vidyarthi Protsahan Yojana
description: Under this scheme, an incentive amount is provided to minority students who pass the Intermediate/Matriculation/Fauquania/Maulvi examinations with first-class marks from the Bihar School Examination Board/Bihar Madrasa Education Board.

name: Distribution of Manually Operated Plant Protection Equipment
description: The "Distribution of Manually Operated Plant Protection Equipment" scheme provides farmers with a subsidy of 50% on the cost of equipment to enhance agricultural practices.

name: Distribution of Gypsum-Oil Seeds
description: The "Distribution of Gypsum-Oil Seeds" scheme provides a subsidy on the cost of gypsum material and transportation cost, to farmers who produce and supply Foundation and Certified Class seeds.

name: Organizing Block Demonstration
description: The “Organizing Block Demonstration” scheme provides a 50% subsidy or ₹2,000/- (whichever is less) on input costs for demonstrating the cultivation of Pulses crops over 5 hectares.

name: Organizing Block Demonstration Through Department And Also Through TNAU
description: The scheme "Organizing Block Demonstration Through Department And Also Through TNAU" offers grants to farmers for maize cultivation. Farmers can avail a subsidy for demonstrating cultivation practices on a 1-hectare plot.

name: Alpsankhyak Muslim Parityaqta/Talaqshuda Mahila Sahayata Yojana
description: The objective of this scheme is to strengthen the economic condition of minority Muslim abandoned/divorced women and make them self-dependent by providing financial assistance of ₹25,000/-.

name: Distribution of Nuclear Poly Hedrosis Virus
description: The "Distribution of Nuclear Poly Hedrosis Virus" scheme provides subsidies for the distribution of Nuclear Poly Hedrosis Virus (NPV) to farmers raising seed farms with Pulses crops.

name: Shramashakthi Special Women's Scheme
description: The "Shramashakthi Special Women's Scheme" is a special scheme for the economic empowerment of widowed, divorced, unmarried women of the minority community.

name: Quality Paddy Seed Distribution
description: The “Quality Paddy Seed Distribution” Scheme offers a subsidy of ₹5/- per kg on certified paddy seeds.

name: Summer Internship Programme (PRL)
description: The Physical Research Laboratory (PRL) Summer Internship Programme aims to provide a platform for highly motivated students & teachers to interact with PRL’s scientists, gaining exposure to the lab’s research areas and facilities. Participants will work on projects in fundamental science, technology

name: PRL's Vikram Sarabhai Postdoctoral Fellowship (VISHWAS)
description: The Vikram Sarabhai Postdoctoral Fellowship (VISHWAS) program is an initiative by the Physical Research Laboratory (PRL) to honor the legacy of Prof. Vikram Sarabhai by supporting young doctorates to pursue groundbreaking research in fundamental science with societal impact.

name: Hari Om Ashram Prerit Doctor Vikram Sarabhai Research Award
description: The Shri Hari Om Ashram Prerit Doctor Vikram Sarabhai Research Awards are biennial awards established with funds from Pujya Shri Mota of Hari Om Ashram, Nadiad, to recognize outstanding contributions by Indian scientists under the age of 45 in the fields of Space Sciences etc.

name: Adi Dravidar and Tribal Welfare Department: Incentive/Award of Prizes-For Each Subjects
description: The scheme offers cash awards to students from the Adi Dravidar, Tribal communities, and Adi Dravidar converts to Christianity for excelling in academic subjects in 10th and Plus 2 examinations.

name: Providing Scholarships to Children of BOC Workers
description: The Andhra Pradesh Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board provides scholarships to children of registered workers. The scheme covers up to two children per family. Students of 9th to 12th grade (Intermediate), ITI and Graduation level will receive financial assistance.

name: Direct Loan Scheme Karnataka
description: The "Direct Loan Scheme" offers financial assistance to unemployed scheduled caste individuals from the leather artisan community to start small businesses.

name: Training to Farmers
description: The scheme “Training to Farmers” provides training to maize farmers across various districts, aiming to enhance farming practices and increase productivity.

name: Grant for Purchase of Bicycle (BBOCWWB)
description: The scheme is implemented by the Bihar Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board. Under this scheme, financial assistance of up to ₹3,500/- is provided to registered construction workers who have been members of the Board for at least one year, for purchasing a bicycle.

name: Adi Dravidar and Tribal Welfare Department-Incentive/Award of Prizes
description: The scheme “Adi Dravidar and Tribal Welfare Department-Incentive/Award of Prizes” offers incentives to One Boy and One Girl each from Adi Dravidar/ Tribal/ Adi Dravidar Converted to Christianity who have secured highest mark who have achieved top marks in 10th and 12th standard examinations.

name: Production of Certified Seeds of Maize
description: The "Production of Certified Seeds of Maize" scheme, aims to promote the production of certified maize seeds by providing subsidy to farmers in select districts of Tamil Nadu.

name: Bihar Shatabdi AIDS Pirit Kalyan Yojana
description: The objective of this scheme is to provide financial assistance to AIDS patients in the state. Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹1,500/- per month is given to AIDS patients in the state. This scheme is fully funded by the Government of Bihar.

name: Workers In Case Of Permanent Disablement-JKBOCWWB
description: The "Workers In Case of Partial Permanent Disablement" scheme by the JKBOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, Jammu & Kashmir, provides financial assistance to registered Building and Other Construction (BOC) workers in the case of permanent disablement.

name: Workers In Case Of His Partial Permanent Disablement-JKBOCWWB
description: The "Workers In Case of Partial Permanent Disablement" scheme by the JKBOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, Jammu & Kashmir, provides financial assistance to registered BOC workers in the event of their partial permanent disablement.

name: Maternity Benefit For Female Workers- JKBOCWWB
description: The "Maternity Benefit for Female Workers" scheme by the JKBOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, Jammu & Kashmir, is a welfare program that provides maternity benefits to eligible registered female workers up to two times in their lifetime.

name: Financial Assistance to dependents in Case of Death of Registered Workers(JKBOCWWB)
description: The scheme “Financial Assistance to Dependents in Case of Death of Registered Workers” is administered by the Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Jammu and Kashmir. In this scheme, ₹2,00,000/- is provided to the dependents in case of the death of the registered worker.

name: Registered Construction Worker in case of his/her Natural Death (JKBOCWWB)
description: The "Registered Construction Worker in Case of His/Her Natural Death" scheme by the JKBOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, Jammu & Kashmir, provides financial assistance to the nominee or dependents of a registered construction worker in the event of their natural death.

name: Registered Construction Worker in case of his/her Natural Death (JKBOCWWB)
description: The "Registered Construction Worker in Case of His/Her Natural Death" scheme by the JKBOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, Jammu & Kashmir, provides financial assistance to the nominee or dependents of a registered construction worker in the event of their natural death.

name: Direct Loan Scheme Karnataka
description: The "Direct Loan Scheme" offers financial assistance to unemployed scheduled caste individuals from the leather artisan community to start small businesses.

name: Production of Certified Seeds of Maize
description: The "Production of Certified Seeds of Maize" scheme, aims to promote the production of certified maize seeds by providing subsidy to farmers in select districts of Tamil Nadu.

name: First Self Marriage Expenses
description: The Maharashtra Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board implemented the "First Self Marriage Expenses" scheme. Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹30,000/- towards the first self marriage expenses to the registered worker.

name: Financial Assistance to 75% or Permanent Disability
description: The Financial Assistance to 75% or Permanent Disability was launched by the Maharashtra Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (MBOCWW), Labor Department Maharashtra. In scheme, financial assistance of ₹2,00,000/- to the registered worker in case of 75 % or more permanent disability.

name: District Central Cooperative Banks and through its Branches: Small Road Transport Operators Loan (SRTO Loan)
description: The scheme aims to provide financial support to small-scale road transport operators through loans up to ₹10,00,000/- with 13% rate of interest.

name: Grant of Stipends to the Physically Handicapped Students
description: "Grant of Stipends to the Physically Handicapped Students" scheme aims to improve the educational status of handicapped children studying in standards 1st to 10th. Monthly stipends (₹200 to ₹300) are provided to parents who are unable to send their children to school due to economic reasons.

name: Merit Based Scholarship Scheme for Dhangar Students
description: "Merit Based Scholarship Scheme for Dhangar Students" by the Directorate of Social Welfare, Government of Goa aims to motivate students by providing merit-based awards and financial incentives (ranging from ₹5,000/- to ₹20,000/-) to high-performing students who are economically weak.

name: National Family Benefit Scheme (Maharashtra)
description: The scheme "National Family Benefit Scheme (Maharashtra)" is a social welfare scheme by the Social Justice & Special Assistance Department, Government of Maharashtra. Under this scheme, ₹20,000/-. is provided to the family in the event of the death of their primary breadwinner.

name: Financial Assistance for Widow or Widower of Registered Construction Worker
description: The scheme is implemented by the Maharashtra Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board. Under this scheme, financial assistance of ₹24,000/- p.a. up to 5 years to the widow or widower in case of death of a registered worker during the course of employment.

name: Vasantrao Naik Tanda / Basti Development Scheme
description: The scheme "Vasantrao Naik Tanda/Basti Development" is implemented by the Govt. of Maharashtra. The scheme provides essential amenities to the Tandas and Bastis of Vimukta Jatis and Nomadic Tribes. The scheme focuses on improving access to drinking water, electrification, latrines, drainage, etc.

name: Fal Podharopan Yojana
description: The objective of this scheme is to expand the area under fruit plantation in the district and increase the fruit production. This scheme is implemented in all the 52 districts of the state.

name: Training Centre for Specially-Abled Persons
description: The Training Centre for Specially-Abled Persons scheme offers vocational courses for specially-abled individuals, funded by the Government of Mizoram. The centers provide courses in tailoring for females and tailoring/shoemaking for males, with a monthly stipend of ₹250 for the training period.

name: Reimbursement of the MS-CIT Course
description: The Reimbursement of the MS-CIT Course scheme was launched by the Maharashtra Building And Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (MBOCWW), Labour Department Maharashtra.

name: Aam Aadmi Bima Yojana (Maharashtra)
description: The "Aam Aadmi Bima Yojana" scheme is implemented by the Social Justice & Special Assistance Department, Government of Maharashtra. This Centrally Sponsored Scheme is aimed at providing insurance and scholarship benefits to landless labourers in rural areas, aged 18 to 59 years.

name: Primary Cooperative Agriculture and Rural Development Bank: For Horticulture
description: The scheme offers a horticulture loan to support farmers with funds ranging from ₹25,000/- to ₹2,00,000/- per 0.4 hectare at an interest rate of 11%-12.75%.

name: Swarnima
description: The Swarnima Scheme provides loan assistance to female beneficiaries from Other Backward Classes (OBC) residing in Maharashtra to support self-employment activities, empowering them to establish a stable livelihood.

name: Distribution of Iron Boxes at Free of Cost
description: The scheme provides complimentary iron boxes to support individuals from Backward Classes (BC), Most Backward Classes (MBC), and Denotified Communities (DNCs) engaged in washing work, aiming to improve their livelihood.

name: Primary Cooperative Agriculture and Rural Development Bank: Jewel Loans
description: The scheme offers jewel loans to farmers, enabling them to access up to ₹2,00,000/- at an interest rate of 11.5% for agricultural purposes.

name: Tool/Equipment Purchase Subsidy Scheme (MPBOCWWB)
description: Launched on January 1, 2018, the "Tool/Equipment Purchase Subsidy Scheme" provides financial assistance to construction workers registered under the M.P. Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board for the purchase of tools and equipment related to their work.

name: Nariwal Paudha Vitaran Yojana
description: The scheme aimed at promoting coconut cultivation in non-traditional areas like Bihar. Under this scheme, farmers and urban residents can obtain coconut saplings at a subsidized rate to encourage widespread plantation and utilization.

name: Mukhyamantri Bagwani Mission: Anjeer Vikas Yojana
description: The Scheme aims to expand plantain cultivation across all districts in Bihar. Farmers can receive subsidies for up to 10 acres and access high-quality tissue-cultured plants for cultivation.

name: National Family Assistance Scheme (Madhya Pradesh)
description: Launched on 15th August 1995, the "National Family Assistance Scheme" by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Madhya Pradesh provides ₹20,000/- to ensure social security for bereaved families living below the poverty line in case of death of their breadwinner.

name: State Scholarship of Class 6th to 10th (Scheduled Caste)
description: Launched in 1966-67, the "State Scholarship for Class 6th to 10th" is a scheme by the Scheduled Caste Welfare Department, Govt of MP. It provides ₹200 per year for boys and ₹600 per year for girls from Scheduled Caste communities, until 31st October.

name: Incentive For The Inter Caste Marriage Couple (Scheduled Tribe)
description: The "Incentive for Inter Caste Marriage Couple" scheme was launched by the Tribal Welfare Department, Karnataka. The scheme provides incentives to the couple in which one spouse is from a Scheduled Tribe (ST) and the other spouse is non-ST. An incentive of ₹5,50,000/- is provided to the couple.

name: Self-Certification Scheme
description: The Labour Department, Government of Tripura, launched the Self-Certification Scheme aims for employers to self-certify their compliance with multiple labor laws, aiming to simplify inspections and reduce bureaucracy.

name: Mukhyamantri Vyavsayik Pathyakram Margdarshan Evam Utpreran Yojana
description: This initiative offers free coaching to the students belonging to the backward class (BC) and extremely backward class (EBC) of Bihar, helping them prepare for competitive exams like NET, GATE, JRF, Ph.D., and M.Phil.

name: Mukhyamantri Anusuchit Jati / Anusuchit Janjati Udyami Yojana
description: This is a flagship scheme of the Bihar government aimed at promoting entrepreneurship and self-employment among the youth by providing financial assistance for setting up businesses.

name: Free Employment Oriented Training to Educated Unemployed Youth of Backward Class and Minority Class
description: "Free Employment Oriented Training to Educated Unemployed Youth of Backward Class and Minority Class" aims to provide quality pre-examination training for various employment-oriented competitive examinations to talented but economically disadvantaged young men and women.

name: Jharkhand State Scheduled Tribe Pre-Matric Scholarship Scheme
description: The "Jharkhand State Scheduled Tribe Pre-Matric Scholarship Scheme" aims to promote education and reduce dropout rates among Scheduled Tribe students. It provides financial assistance to students from Class 1st to 10th who are studying in government schools in Jharkhand.

name: Bihar Shatabdi Asangathit Karyakshetra Kamagaar Evan Shilpakar Samajik Suraksha Yojana: Accidental Death
description: The component “Accidental Death” under the “Bihar Shatabdi Asangathit Karyakshetra Kamagaar Evan Shilpakar Samajik Suraksha Yojana” launched by the Labour Resources Department, Bihar, provides financial assistance of ₹1,00,000/- to the families of workers or craftsmen in case of accidental death.

name: Bihar Shatabdi Asangathit Karyakshetra Kamagaar Evan Shilpakar Samajik Suraksha Yojana: Natural Death
description: The component “Natural Death” under the “Bihar Shatabdi Asangathit Karyakshetra Kamagaar Evan Shilpakar Samajik Suraksha Yojana” launched by the Labour Resources Department, Bihar, provides financial assistance of ₹30,000/- to the families of workers or craftsmen in case of natural death.

name: Incentives to Students who Passed the Civil Service Examination
description: The "Incentives to Students Who Passed the Civil Service Examination" scheme provides incentives to Scheduled Tribe candidates who clear the Civil Services exams (Preliminary, Main, and Interview) conducted by M.P. PSC and UPSC.

name: Coaching by Private Institutes for All India Services Civil Services Examination
description: Launched on 12th September 2013, the scheme "Coaching by Private Institutes for All India Services Civil Services Examination (Scheduled Tribes)" provides financial assistance, education, and training to Scheduled Tribe candidates preparing for the Civil Services Examination.

name: Janani Bal Suraksha Yojana
description: This health initiative aimed at improving maternal and infant health by increasing institutional deliveries, reducing infant and maternal mortality rates, and promoting immunization in Bihar.

name: Mukhya Mantri Shramik Seva Prasuti Sahayata Yojana
description: Launched on 1st April 2018, the scheme "Mukhya Mantri Shramik Seva Prasuti Sahayata Yojana" by the Labour Department, Government of Madhya Pradesh, provides maternity support to pregnant women over 18 years of age who are registered as unorganized workers.

name: Jharkhand State Scheduled Tribe Pre-Matric Scholarship Scheme
description: The "Jharkhand State Scheduled Tribe Pre-Matric Scholarship Scheme" aims to promote education and reduce dropout rates among Scheduled Tribe students. It provides financial assistance to students from Class 1st to 10th who are studying in government schools in Jharkhand.

name: Rani Durgavati and Shankarshah Puraskar Scheme (Reward Scheme for Meritorious Students)
description: "Rani Durgavati and Shankarshah Puraskar Scheme (Reward Scheme for Meritorious Students)" provides awards ranging from ₹3,000/- to ₹51,000/- to the meritorious students from the Scheduled Tribe community based on their performance in the 10th and 12th board examinations.

name: Aatmanirbhar Gujarat Scheme for assistance to MSMEs: Assistance for Interest Subsidy to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprise (Service Sector)
description: The "Aatmanirbhar Gujarat Scheme for assistance to MSMEs" aims to empower the state's dynamic MSME sector, which significantly contributes to employment, GDP, and exports.

name: Vandan Matru Yojana
description: This scheme is a Gujarat government initiative providing financial assistance to pregnant and lactating women from economically weaker sections to promote maternal and child health.

name: Saksham Jharkhand Kaushal Vikas Yojana
description: The "Saksham Jharkhand Kaushal Vikas Yojana" is an initiative by the Jharkhand government to equip youth aged 18-35 years with quality skills training aligned with the National Skills Qualification Framework (NSQF). The scheme aims to create job opportunities for 70% of successful trainees.

name: Jharkhand Sports Excellence Cash Award Scheme to Coaches
description: The “Jharkhand Sports Excellence Cash Award Scheme to Coaches” aims to provide cash awards to coaches who train athletes and teams to achieve excellence in national and international competitions under the Jharkhand Sports Policy, 2022.

name: Shaheed Gram Vikas Yojana
description: The scheme "Shaheed Gram Vikas Yojana" by the Welfare Department, Government of Jharkhand, aims to develop villages linked to tribal freedom fighters. It provides housing, infrastructure, and other facilities to eligible Scheduled Tribes and Scheduled Castes.

name: PURNA Scheme
description: The scheme aims to reduce malnutrition, anemia, and early marriage among adolescent girls in Gujarat by educating them on health, nutrition, life skills, and legal rights, while promoting self-empowerment through various activities.

name: Mahila Swavlamban Scheme
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to women from rural and urban areas for undertaking economic activities, with support in the form of a subsidy and loans.

name: Chief Ministers House Rent
description: The "Chief Minister's House Rent" scheme by the Department of De-notified, Nomadic, and Semi-Nomadic Welfare, Government of Madhya Pradesh, provides ₹1,000 to ₹2,000 per student per month in Bhopal, Indore, Jabalpur, Gwalior, and Ujjain.

name: Sugar Distribution Scheme
description: The "Sugar Distribution Scheme" by the Department of Food, Public Distribution and Consumer Affairs, Government of Jharkhand, aims to provide subsidized sugar to AAY households under NFSA, ensuring access to essential food commodities at affordable rates.

name: Haryana Merit Cum Means Scheme For Minority
description: The scheme "Merit Cum Means Based Scholarship" by the Ministry of Minority Affairs, Government of India, provides financial assistance to meritorious students from minority communities in Haryana for pursuing professional and technical courses.

name: Post Metric Scholarship (Denotified, Nomadic and Semi-Nomadic)
description: The "Post-Metric Scholarship" scheme, implemented by the Department of Denotified, Nomadic, and Semi-Nomadic Welfare, Government of Madhya Pradesh, provides financial assistance to students from class 11 to college level, including medical, engineering, science other courses.

name: Pandit Deen Dayal Upadhyay Samoohik Pashudhan Beema Yojana
description: The scheme "Pandit Deen Dayal Upadhyay Samoohik Pashudhan Beema Yojana" aims to provide socio-economic security to livestock farmers in the state by covering livestock under an insurance scheme. Financial protection against the risk of loss due to animal death is extended to livestock owners.

name: Special Livestock Insurance Scheme
description: "Special Livestock Insurance Scheme" is a welfare initiative targeting SC families engaged in livestock rearing. The scheme provides free insurance for livestock, enhancing the economic security of resource-poor SC families. The scheme covers milch animals, sheep, goats, pigs, camels, etc;

name: Valmiki Chhatravritti Yojana
description: The "Valmiki Chhatravritti Yojana" by the Department of Higher and Technical Education, Government of Jharkhand, aims to provide financial assistance and encouragement to orphaned and differently-abled students to pursue higher education and benefits include full tuition fee reimbursement.

name: Scheme for Wage Compensation to Handloom Weaver Families
description: "Scheme for Wage Compensation to Handloom Weaver Families" by the Dept. of Handlooms & Textiles, Andhra Pradesh aims to provide wage compensation relief to handloom weaver families. A relief assistance of ₹4,000 per weaver family is provided to compensate for wage loss during the rainy season.

name: Hostel Facility Scheme (HPBOCWWB)
description: The Hostel Facility Scheme, introduced by the HPBOCWWB , provides financial assistance ranging from ₹15,000 to ₹20,000 annually. This support covers accommodation, boarding, and food expenses for the children of registered worker while they reside in a hostel.

name: Panchayat Secretariat Strengthening Scheme
description: The "Panchayat Secretariat Strengthening Scheme" by the Panchayati Raj Department, Government of Jharkhand, aims to provide financial assistance of ₹15,000 per month to each Gram Panchayat for operational and maintenance purposes, ensuring efficient governance at the grassroots level.

name: Haryana State Meritorious Incentive Scheme for the Students Who Attain First Position in CBSE Annual Exams in the State
description: The scheme "Haryana State Meritorious Incentive Scheme" aims to encourage meritorious students who attain top positions in CBSE annual exams by providing them with financial incentives. Selected students receive an annual incentive covering their school/college fees up to their graduation.

name: Pension Scheme to Old Age Persons (Senior Citizen)
state: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
description: The objective of this scheme is to provide financial support to eligible senior citizens to cater to their basic needs. The scheme benefits senior citizens aged 60 years and above, providing a monthly pension of ₹1,500/- for those aged 60–69 years and ₹2,000/- for those aged 70 years and above.

name: Divyangjan Scholarship Scheme
description: "Divyangjan Scholarship Scheme" provides financial assistance for the education and training of differently-abled children, who are regular students in a school or college. The application needs to be submitted to the District Office, Panchayat and Social Welfare / Janpad Panchayat Office.

name: Paternity Benefit Scheme (BBOCWWB)
description: The "Paternity Benefit Scheme" by the Bihar Building & Other Construction Workers' Welfare Board, Labour Resources Department, Government of Bihar, provides ₹6,000/- per childbirth to the male workers, provided that their wife is not registered with the Board.

name: INDIRAMMA Weavers Pension (Urban)
description: "INDIRAMMA Weavers Pension (Urban)" scheme aims to provide monthly pensions to destitute weavers aged 50 years or above. To be eligible, they should be from a BPL family, and be a resident of Andhra Pradesh. The eligible individuals will be identified by their respective Ward Sabhas.

name: Composite Loan Scheme
description: "Composite Loan Scheme" aims to provide need-based financial support to individuals from Scheduled Castes, Scheduled Tribes, Other Backward Classes, Minorities, and PwDs to help them pursue various income-generating activities. The scheme encourages self-employment and entrepreneurship.

name: Goa Mediclaim Scheme
description: “Goa Mediclaim Scheme” provides financial assistance to avail super-speciality treatments that are not available in the Government Hospitals of Goa, such as dialysis, plastic surgery, ICU care, angiography and angioplasty, open-heart surgery, kidney transplantation, neurosurgery, etc.

name: Chief Minister Small and Marginal Farmers Older Pension Scheme
description: The "Chief Minister Small and Marginal Farmers Older Pension Scheme" by the Department of Social Justice and Empowerment, Government of Rajasthan, aims to provide financial assistance to elderly small and marginal farmers.

name: e-Adhigam Scheme - Free Tablet
description: This scheme was launched with objective of promoting digital education & providing online learning to children from poor & needy families, proving to be a boon for them. Under this scheme, free tablets are provided to students, enabling access to state-of-the-art software & learning materials.

name: Reimbursement of Tuition Fee and Transport Facility to Scheduled Castes Students Studying in Technical Institutions in Haryana
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to Scheduled Castes students pursuing AICTE-approved technical courses. Under this scheme, eligible students receive tuition fee reimbursement and transport facility benefits.
tags: ['Scheduled Caste', 'Student', 'Technical Courses', 'Technical Institutes', 'Transport Facility', 'Tuition Fee Reimbursement']

name: Free Books Scheme for Scheduled Caste Students Pursuing Higher Education
description: The scheme was launched by the Department of Higher Education, Govt. of Haryana, on 1st July, 2008, with the aim of attracting SC students towards higher education. Under this scheme, SC students studying in govt. colleges will receive ₹2,000/- per annum for purchasing books.

name: Free Passport Scheme
description: The scheme aims to facilitate higher education and global career opportunities for students by covering the cost of passport issuance. Under this scheme, final-year UG and PG students in government colleges receive reimbursement for passport application fees.

name: Transport Loan Scheme
description: "Transport Loan Scheme" aims to promote self-employment among target groups by providing term loans for Light Motor Vehicles. The scheme benefits Scheduled Castes, Other Backward Classes, Minorities, and Safai Karamcharis with financial assistance up to ₹5,00,000/-.

name: Consolidated Stipend Scheme for Scheduled Caste Students Pursuing Higher Education
description: The scheme was launched by the Department of Higher Education, Government of Haryana, on 1st July, 2008, with the aim of attracting SC students towards higher education. Under this scheme, SC students studying in Govt. Colleges will receive a stipend of ₹1,000 per month.

name: Vivah Sahayata Yojana (Labor Welfare Board Madhya Pradesh)
description: Under this scheme, ₹15,000 is provided per case for the marriage of a daughter (above 18 years of age) of workers/employees working in institutions covered under the Madhya Pradesh Labor Welfare Fund Act, 1982, or to a female worker herself.

name: Free Passport Scheme
description: The scheme aims to facilitate higher education and global career opportunities for students by covering the cost of passport issuance. Under this scheme, final-year UG and PG students in government colleges receive reimbursement for passport application fees.

name: Vivah Sahayata Yojana (Labor Welfare Board Madhya Pradesh)
description: Under this scheme, ₹15,000 is provided per case for the marriage of a daughter (above 18 years of age) of workers/employees working in institutions covered under the Madhya Pradesh Labor Welfare Fund Act, 1982, or to a female worker herself.

name: Uchch Shiksha Puraskar Yojana
description: "Uchch Shiksha Puraskar Yojana" aims to encourage and motivate students from weaver families to pursue higher education. ₹20,000/- is provided to talented students from weaver families who get admission in first year of Engineering/Medical/CA/MBA courses in any government college in Chhattisgarh.

name: Mukhya Mantri Sarvajan Uchcha Shiksha Chhatravriti Yojana
description: This scheme aims to provide financial assistance to students from all sections of Rajasthan who are pursuing higher education at IITs, IIMs, and other national-level institutions. Under this scheme, 50% of the non-refundable fees are reimbursed to eligible students.

name: To Assist the Farmers for Construction of Community Base Water Tank/Storage Structure for Efficient Use of Water Through Drip Irrigation
description: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to provide financial assistance to farmers for constructing community-based water tanks/storage structures to ensure efficient water use through drip irrigation.

name: Academic Scholarship Scheme (Labor Welfare Board Madhya Pradesh)
description: Under this scheme, up to two children of workers employed in industrial institutions/establishments covered under the Board are eligible for scholarship benefits. The scholarship is provided to students from Class 5th to 12th and higher education, who have passed their previous class.

name: Coaching Help Scheme for JEE-GUJCET-NEET Exams
description: The "Coaching Help Scheme for JEE-GUJCET-NEET Exams" scheme provides financial assistance to non-reserved category students from the science stream who are getting coaching in institutions with three years or more experience.

name: Training Assistance for Competitive Examinations
description: The "Training Assistance for Competitive Examinations" scheme provides financial assistance to non-reserved category students who are undergoing training in recognized institutions for competitive recruitment examinations.

name: Financial assistance to Meritorious Scheduled Tribe Students who have Passed First Division from Board and University
description: The objective of the scheme is to motivate meritorious Scheduled Tribe students of Rajasthan by providing one-time financial assistance of ₹3,500/- to those pursuing regular college courses and achieving first division.

name: Devnarayan Pratibhawan Chhatra Protsahan Yojana
description: The scheme aims to encourage academic excellence among students belonging to Special Backward Classes (SBC). It provides an annual financial incentive of ₹3,500/- to students pursuing education from Class 10th to postgraduate level in government schools or colleges.

name: Scholarship/Merit Scholarship Schools SC/ST/OBC/Min (Studying in College/Technical/ Professional Institutions)
description: The scheme provides monthly financial aid to SC/ST/OBC/Minority students pursuing higher education. Benefits include scholarships for hostellers and day scholars, with eligibility based on academic performance and income criteria.

name: Scheme of Providing Assistance to Encourage Farmers for Adoption of Organic Farming
description: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Dept., Gujarat. It aims to promote organic farming by providing financial assistance to farmers for certification, input subsidies, and residue testing.

name: Farm Storage Structure Scheme
description: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Dept., Gujarat. It aims to help farmers to protect their harvested crops from damage due to natural calamities and store them safely for better financial returns by selling at optimal prices.

name: Chief Minister BC & EBC Chhatravas Anudan Yojana
description: The "Chief Minister BC & EBC Chhatravas Anudan Yojana", implemented by the Backward Classes and Extremely Backward Classes Welfare Department, provides financial assistance to students from Backward Classes (BC) and Extremely Backward Classes (EBC) residing in government hostels.

name: Union Territory of Lakshadweep Pension Scheme for Old Age
description: The scheme aims to provide monthly financial assistance of ₹1,500/- to senior citizens in the UT. The scheme covers persons above 60 years of age who do not have any source of income.

name: Construction of Hostels for OBC Boys and Girls
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: The Scheme aims at providing hostel facilities to students belonging to socially and educationally backward classes, especially from rural areas, to enable them to pursue secondary and higher education.

name: Women Helpline
state: Ministry of Women and Child Development
description: Women Helpline provides 24X7 emergency and non-emergency response through telephonic short-code 181 to women

name: To Assist the Farmers for Construction of Community Base Water Tank/Storage Structure for Efficient Use of Water Through Drip Irrigation
description: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to provide financial assistance to farmers for constructing community-based water tanks/storage structures to ensure efficient water use through drip irrigation.

name: Pre-Matric Scholarship Scheme for the Children of Parents/Guardians Engaged in Unclean and Hazardous Occupations - Goa
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to children whose parents belong to Other Disadvantaged Categories, supporting their education at pre-matric level. This initiative seeks to enhance student participation & reduce dropout rates, particularly during the transition from primary to upper

name: Grant on Passing the Written Examination of Competitive Examinations for Recruitment in Armed Forces
description: Under this scheme, a grant of ₹15,000/- is provided from the Amalgamated Fund to the children of ex-servicemen who pass the written examination of CDS, NDA, IMA, OTA, Air Force, or Naval Academy, for the purpose of coaching.

name: Construction of Hostels for OBC Boys and Girls
state: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
description: The Scheme aims at providing hostel facilities to students belonging to socially and educationally backward classes, especially from rural areas, to enable them to pursue secondary and higher education.

name: Women Helpline
state: Ministry of Women and Child Development
description: Women Helpline provides 24X7 emergency and non-emergency response through telephonic short-code 181 to women

name: Mukhyamantri Hunar Vikas Yojana- Professional/Technical Training
description: Under this scheme, vocational/technical training is provided to Palanhar beneficiary boys & girls through recognized training providers such as the Rajasthan Skill & Livelihood Development Corporation, Rajasthan Knowledge Corporation Ltd., it is etc. recognized by the State or Central Govt.

name: Mukhyamantri Hunar Vikas Yojana- Higher Education/Technical Education
description: Under this scheme, the State Government provides financial assistance to eligible boys and girls enrolled under the Palanhar Scheme to pursue higher or technical education, based on their qualifications and interest in employment-oriented courses.

name: Mukhyamantri Asahaya Punarwas Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance and rehabilitation support to destitute individuals who are orphaned, abandoned by their parents, or have no one to care for them. Beneficiaries receive one-time financial aid and support for admission to day-care centers or old-age homes.

name: Incentive Scheme for Meritorious Students of Economically Backward Class of General Category
description: Under this scheme, a one-time financial assistance of ₹15,000/- along with a certificate of appreciation is awarded to top 100 meritorious students of Class 10 & each stream of Class 12, who are listed in state-level merit list of Rajasthan Board of Secondary Education, Ajmer.

name: Free Travel in Uttarakhand Transport Corporation Buses to Widowed Daughters-in-Law of Freedom Fighters
description: The scheme aims to provide free travel facilities in Uttarakhand Transport Corporation (UTC) buses to the widowed daughters-in-law of freedom fighters. Beneficiaries under this scheme are entitled to avail complimentary travel across all UTC bus services within the state.

name: Old Age Pension Scheme- On Completion Of 65 Years (UKBOCWWB)
description: The scheme aims to provide a monthly pension of ₹1,500/- to construction workers registered with the Uttarakhand Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board who have attained the age of 65 years.

name: Mukhyamantri Hunar Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide free training in trades such as sewing, embroidery, knitting, plumbing, electronics, and in Information Technology fields including computer hardware, software, networking, accounting, and more, to individuals belonging to minority communities.

name: Merit cum Means Scholarship: Polytechnic Institutions
description: "Merit cum Means Scholarship: Polytechnic Institutions" is a scholarship scheme by the Technical Education Department, Government of Chhattisgarh. The scheme provides ₹600/- per month to eligible students for pursuing education from recognized Polytechnic Institutions in Chhattisgarh.

name: Awarding Teleeducation Scholarships To Afghan Students
description: The "Awarding Teleeducation Scholarships To Afghan Students" scheme under e-VidyaBharati Network Project, launched by the Ministry of External Affairs, offers 1000 annual scholarships to Afghan students for UGC-approved online UG and PG programs from Indian universities.

name: Planting Assistance Program for Hybrid Seeds of Vegetable Crops
description: This scheme offers financial assistance to farmers for the plantation of hybrid seeds and promotion of natural farming in vegetable crops across Gujarat.

name: Assistance Program for Expansion of Fruit Crop Cultivation
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to farmers in Gujarat for expanding fruit crop cultivation like mango, banana, papaya, etc., through intensive and ultra-intensive farming methods.

name: Assistance for Area Expansion of Spice Crops
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to farmers for the area expansion of spice crops, including seed and rhizomatic spices, to enhance spice production in Gujarat.

name: Incentive Scheme for Meritorious Students of Economically Backward Class of General Category
description: Under this scheme, a one-time financial assistance of ₹15,000/- along with a certificate of appreciation is awarded to top 100 meritorious students of Class 10 & each stream of Class 12, who are listed in state-level merit list of Rajasthan Board of Secondary Education, Ajmer.

name: Tiatr Competition
description: The "Tiatr Competition" aims to encourage and promote the unique Goan theatre form of Tiatr. Participation in this scheme is open to Goan institutions registered under the Societies Registration Act, 1860 (with renewed registration). Entries are invited through press notes in local dailies.

name: Crop Input Subsidy to the Farmers for Crop Loss Due to Natural Calamities
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to farmers in Gujarat who suffer crop losses due to natural calamities, based on crop damage surveys conducted by the district administration.

name: Assistance Program for the Cultivation of Lotus Fruit (Dragon Fruit)
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to farmers to support the cultivation of dragon fruit (lotus fruit), with higher benefits for SC/ST and priority for small-scale and women farmers.

name: Scheme to Encourage Farmers to Add Value to Crops
description: The scheme provides financial assistance to farmers across Gujarat in adding value to their crops by providing financial assistance for purchasing machinery.

name: Pension Scheme to the Dependents (Husband/Wife) of Identified State Agitators, Other than those Who either went to Jail for 7 Days or were Injured During the Uttarakhand State Movement, after the Death of the Agitator
description: The scheme provides a monthly pension of ₹4,500/- to the dependents (husband/wife) of identified state agitators, excluding those jailed for 7 days or injured during the Uttarakhand movement, who were not receiving any government pension or in government service.

name: Assistance for Power Driven Chaff Cutter scheme
description: The "Assistance for Power Driven Chaff Cutter Scheme" introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, is designed to help farmers reduce fodder wastage and improve their dairy farming efficiency.

name: Bicycle Distribution Scheme for Girl Students of Economically Weaker Section
description: Under this scheme, free bicycles will be distributed to 5,800 girl students belonging to the Economically Weaker Section (EWS), who are studying in government schools from Class 6 to Class 8, to facilitate their commute between home and school.

name: Dr. Bhimrao Ambedkar Sanskrit Scholarship Scheme for Scheduled Caste and Scheduled Tribe Students
description: The scheme aims to encourage and motivate students belonging to Scheduled Caste (SC) and Scheduled Tribe (ST) communities who are studying in Sanskrit schools from Class 6 to Class 12 in Uttarakhand by providing financial scholarships to support their education.

name: Shodhgrantha Chayan Yojana
description: The scheme aims to invite scholars from any state in India to submit research manuscripts on Sanskrit literature, as well as socially relevant research books related to Sanskrit literature in the context of Uttarakhand.

name: Akhil Bhartiya Sanskrit Kavi Sammelan
description: The scheme aims to promote and popularize Sanskrit language and literature by encouraging poets who compose and recite in Sanskrit. 15 poets from Uttarakhand and other states are invited to present their works at national/state festivals, each receiving ₹2501/-.

name: Nishulk Ganavesh Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide free uniforms to all girl students studying in Classes 1 to 8 of government and government-aided schools, as well as to all boys belonging to Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes, and boys from the General category who fall under the BPL category.

name: Pashupalan Dhiran Yojana
description: "Pashupalan Dhiran Yojana" by the Social Justice and Empowerment Department provides loan assistance for animal husbandry to Rabari and Bharwad castes from the socially and educationally backward classes.

name: Research Fellowship Scheme for Scheduled Tribe Candidates
description: The scheme aims to support the Scheduled Tribe candidates from Scheduled Areas and the Saharia Area of Rajasthan to register themselves as research scholars with all recognized Central/State/Deemed/Private University located in any part of India for pursuing Ph.D. Programme.

name: Planning for Best Livestock Keeper's Award Function
description: The "Planning for Best Livestock Keeper's Award Function" scheme by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department honors outstanding pastoralists in Gujarat by awarding them at Taluka, District, and State levels for their excellence in animal husbandry.

name: Assistance for Purchase of Traditional Musical Instruments and Costumes for Scheduled Caste/Tribe Individuals
description: The scheme aims to support scheduled caste and scheduled tribe individuals whose livelihood depends on traditional arts by providing them with essential musical instruments and costumes.

name: Mukhyamantri Chhatravritti Yojana
description: The "Mukhyamantri Chhatravritti Yojana" is a scholarship scheme for NCC cadets who have cleared 10th or 12th standard, completed two years of NCC training with 80% attendance, and are pursuing higher education.

name: Mukhyamantri Matsya Sampada Yojana
description: The scheme aims to enhance fish production, generate employment opportunities, and improve the livelihoods of fish farmers by providing free training, field visits, and seminars on various fisheries-related activities.

name: Financial Incentive to SC Meritorious Boy Students
description: The scheme provides a financial incentive of ₹5,000/- to the meritorious boys from Scheduled Castes who have secured 80% or above marks in the HSSLC examination. The objective is to motivate and encourage SC students to pursue higher studies and bring them at par with the rest.

name: Financial Assistance to OBC Students Appearing in the Mains Examination of UPSC
description: The scheme provides financial grants to the OBC students for appearing in the UPSC Mains Exam. An amount upto ₹50,000/- is provided to each beneficiary. The assistance is extended depending on the applicant meeting the eligibility criteria and the documents submitted.

name: Akhil Bhartiya Sanskrit Kavi Sammelan
description: The scheme aims to promote and popularize Sanskrit language and literature by encouraging poets who compose and recite in Sanskrit. 15 poets from Uttarakhand and other states are invited to present their works at national/state festivals, each receiving ₹2501/-.

name: Nishulk Ganavesh Yojana
description: The scheme aims to provide free uniforms to all girl students studying in Classes 1 to 8 of government and government-aided schools, as well as to all boys belonging to Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes, and boys from the General category who fall under the BPL category.

name: Akhil Bharatiya Civil Services Pratiyogita
description: The scheme aims to provide an opportunity for personnel from various government departments of the state to participate annually in the All-India level competitions in various sports, organized by the Ministry of Personnel, Public Grievances and Pensions, Government of India.

name: Green Skill Development Programme (GSDP)
description: The scheme "Harit Kaushal Vikas Karyakram" implemented by the Govind Ballabh Pant National Institute of Himalayan Environment (NIHE), aims to impart eco-based livelihood skills to youth and communities in the Himalayan regions.

name: Skill Development
description: The scheme "Skill Development" by the Wadia Institute of Himalayan Geology, aims to impart practical training to postgraduate students in various Earth Science disciplines, including structural and evolutionary geology, geochemistry, geomorphology, glaciology, magnetostratigraphy, etc.

name: Veer Chandra Singh Garhwali Paryatan Swarojgar Yojana
description: The scheme aims to promote tourism-based self-employment and entrepreneurship among unemployed residents of Uttarakhand by providing financial assistance and subsidies for the development of tourism-related infrastructure and services. This scheme is applicable in entire Uttarakhand.

name: Student Program Under AcSIR
description: The scheme "Student Program Under AcSIR" implemented by the Academy of Scientific and Innovative Research (AcSIR), aims to promote high-quality research and leadership development in Earth Sciences through doctoral education. It provides research opportunities to geoscience postgraduate students.

name: Freeship less than ₹1,00,000 (UG students only)
description: The scheme "Freeship Less than ₹1,00,000 only for UG students" by the Dean Student Welfare, GBPUAT, Pantnagar aims to support meritorious undergraduate students from low-income families. This Freeship scheme provides full tuition fee exemption to eligible students.

name: Solar Water Heating System (Domestic Sector)
description: The scheme "Solar Water Heating System (Domestic Sector)" by the Renewable Energy Department, Haryana, aims to promote the use of solar energy for domestic water heating by providing a financial subsidy to the residents of Haryana and Haryana Government employees residing in Chandigarh.
tags: ['Green Energy Initiative', 'Renewable Energy', 'Solar Energy', 'Solar Water Heater']

name: Sanskrit Shodh Chhaatravrtti Yojana
description: The aim of the scheme is to encourage and support high-quality research in Sanskrit by providing financial assistance to meritorious Ph.D. students across state universities.

name: Stipends to Students of Minority Caste for Technical and Vocational Courses after SSC
description: The scheme “Stipends to Students of Minority Caste for Technical and Vocational Courses after SSC” by the Social Justice and Empowerment Department, Government of Gujarat, supports education for Minority Caste students by providing a monthly stipend for one year.

name: Assistance for Purchase of Traditional Musical Instruments and Costumes for Scheduled Caste/Tribe Individuals
description: The scheme aims to support scheduled caste and scheduled tribe individuals whose livelihood depends on traditional arts by providing them with essential musical instruments and costumes.

name: Special Incentive to ST (P)/OBC/MOBC Meritorious Students
description: The scheme aims to provide financial grants to meritorious ST (P)/OBC/MOBC students in Assam who secure high marks in Matriculation, 10+2, Graduation, or Post Graduation. Benefits include fixed monetary assistance ranging from ₹10,000/- to ₹25,000/- based on educational level.

name: Braille Equipment Provision
description: The "Braille Equipment Provision" scheme aims to empower persons with visual disabilities to live independently by supporting their writing, computing, mobility, and entertainment needs. Through this scheme, Braille equipment is manufactured and made available to individuals and institutions.

name: Uniform Assistance for Scheduled Tribe Students
description: The scheme "Uniform Assistance for Scheduled Tribe Students" by the Social Justice and Empowerment Department, Gujarat, provides ₹900/- for three pairs of uniforms to ST students in government and aided primary schools studying in Classes 1 to 8.

name: Livelihood Opportunity Promotion Scheme (Scheduled Tribes)
description: The scheme aims to promote self-employment among Scheduled Tribe individuals through financial support, including loans, margin money, and grants.

name: PMMSY: Ice Plant/Cold Store of Minimum 20-Ton Capacity - Haryana
description: The subsidy for 20-ton capacity ice plant/cold storage units under Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY) supports the establishment of ice plants or cold storage facilities with a minimum capacity of 20 tons to improve fish preservation and cold chain infrastructure in Haryana.

name: Jyoti Gramodyog Vikas Yojana
description: The scheme provides margin money subsidies (25–30%) for new rural industrial projects (₹1,00,000/- to 25,00,000/-) to artisans, entrepreneurs, and SHGs, leveraging a 24-hour electricity supply in villages. Beneficiaries must be aged 25–50 years with a Class 10th education.

name: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana: Medium Fish Feed Mill of Production Capacity of 8 Ton/Day
description: The scheme aims to promote fish feed self-sufficiency and affordability among fish farmers. Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided for setting up medium-sized fish feed mills with a production capacity of 8 tons per day, benefiting entrepreneurs and fish farmers.

name: PMMSY: Ice Plant/Cold Store of minimum 10-ton capacity Haryana
description: The subsidy for 10-ton capacity ice plant/cold storage units under Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY) supports the establishment of ice plants or cold storage facilities with a minimum capacity of 10 tons to improve fish preservation and cold chain infrastructure in Haryana.

name: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana: Motor Cycle with Ice Box - Haryana
description: The scheme aims to strengthen fish transportation infrastructure and ensure the freshness and quality of fish during transit. Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided to fishers for purchasing motorcycles equipped with ice boxes, ensuring efficient and hygienic fish transport.

name: PMMSY: Ice Plant/Cold Storage of Minimum 50-Ton Capacity - Haryana
description: This scheme provides financial assistance for setting up ice plants or cold storage units with a minimum capacity of 50 tons, supporting cold chain infrastructure under PMMSY.

name: PMMSY: Large Fish Feed Mill of Production Capacity of 20 Ton /Day Scheme - Haryana
description: The scheme aims to strengthen aquaculture through fish feed production. It provides a grant per unit to the beneficiaries under PMMSY.

name: Shravan Tirthdarshan Yojna
description: The scheme aims to facilitate pilgrimage travel for senior citizens of Gujarat by providing financial assistance for travel expenses. It benefits eligible senior citizens through reimbursements or direct arrangements with authorized travel agents.

name: PMMSY: Insulated Vehicles - Haryana
description: The scheme aims to provide a subsidy per unit for purchasing insulated vehicles for the beneficiaries to promote cold-chain logistics in fish transportation.

name: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana: Mini Fish Feed Mills of Production Capacity of 2 Ton /Day
description: Under this scheme, financial assistance, in form of subsidy, is provided to individuals for setting up mini feed mills, ensuring the local availability of quality fish feed at affordable prices for fishers and fish farmers.

name: New Swarnima Yojana for Women (GTKVN)
description: The scheme aims to promote economic upliftment of women from Thakor & Koli communities living below poverty line by supporting them in self-employment ventures. Under this scheme, 100% financial support up to ₹1,00,000/- is provided to eligible women for starting a business/trade of their choice.

name: Micro Finance Scheme (GNDTDC)
description: The scheme promotes self-employment among Nomadic and Denotified Tribes by offering loan up to ₹1,25,000 at a concessional interest rate to help start small-scale businesses or enterprises.

name: Swayam Saksham Scheme (Gujarat Gopalak Vikas Nigam)
description: The scheme aims to instil a sense of self-reliance among youth pursuing vocational education/training. Through this scheme, financial assistance is provided for establishing various professional units

name: Mahila Samrudhhi Yojana (Gujarat Gopalak Vikas Nigam)
description: The scheme aims to create self-employment for women and make them self-reliant. Through this scheme, individual women entrepreneurs are provided with microfinance loans to start a business of their choice.

name: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana: Mini Fish Feed Mills of Production Capacity of 2 Ton /Day
description: Under this scheme, financial assistance, in form of subsidy, is provided to individuals for setting up mini feed mills, ensuring the local availability of quality fish feed at affordable prices for fishers and fish farmers.

name: Self-Employment loan scheme for Minority Widows, Divorcees / Abandoned Women
description: The scheme aims to provide self-employment loans to women from minority communities. Financial assistance with a 20% subsidy is provided to widows, divorced women, and abandoned women from minority communities. The scheme is implemented by the KSMDFC.

name: Mother Teresa Scholarship
description: The scheme aims to support the higher education of students belonging to minority communities. Through this scheme, an amount per annum is provided to students from minority religious communities domiciled in Kerala who are pursuing a diploma in nursing and paramedical courses from government.

name: CA/ICWA CMA /CS Scholarship
description: The scheme aims to provide scholarships to students from minority religious communities studying Chartered Accounts/Cost & Management Accounts/Company Secretaryship courses. Through this scheme, a scholarship is provided to eligible students.

name: Intensive Fisheries Development Programme - Subsidy on Insurance Premium for Shrimp Crop Insurance
description: The scheme aims to promote sustainable aquaculture by reducing financial risk of shrimp farmers through subsidized insurance coverage.Under this scheme, a 50% subsidy is provided on insurance premium paid by eligible fish farmers for shrimp crop insurance, helping them mitigate potential crop losses

name: Education Loan Scheme: Haryana Women Development Corporation
description: The scheme aims to encourage female students from Haryana to pursue higher education and reduce their interest burden. Through this scheme, financial assistance and an interest subsidy are provided to eligible female students.

name: Financial Assistance for Scaling Mount Everest and Other Inaccessible Mountains of the World
description: The scheme "Financial Assistance for Scaling Mount Everest and Other Inaccessible Mountains of the World" aims to promote mountaineering by providing financial aid to successful climbers, including up to ₹15,00,000 for those who scale Mt. Everest.

name: Pre-Matric Scholarship for the Students of Economically Backward Class
description: The scheme aims to support the education of poor students by offering scholarships from class 1st to 10th in government and aided schools.

name: Rock Climbing Adventure Training Course
description: The scheme aims to promote physical fitness, adventure awareness, and confidence-building among children through a 6-day rock climbing adventure course for 100 children aged 9 to 12 years, organized at Mount Abu/ Junagadh Center.

name: Pashu Palan Yojana (GTKVN)
description: The scheme aims to enhance the livelihoods of Thakor and Koli communities by providing financial assistance for animal husbandry activities such as dairy farming. Under this scheme, loans of up to ₹1,00,000/- are provided for the purchase of milch animals such as cows and buffaloes.

name: Assistance for Exhibitions Abroad and Out of State
description: The scheme aims to promote fine arts by providing financial assistance of up to ₹1,00,000 to artists from Gujarat for organizing art exhibitions abroad and in other states of India.

name: Scheme for the Welfare of Schedule Caste Families in Fisheries Sector: Subsidy on 1st Year Lease Money
description: The objective of the scheme is to provide full-time employment to individuals from Scheduled Caste families in the fisheries sector and to uplift these families by promoting fish farming through financial assistance for leasing Panchayati ponds or watershed areas.

name: New Charkha-Loom Scheme
description: The scheme provides 65% financial assistance for purchasing Amber Charkhas (₹13,000/-) and looms (₹30,000/-) to registered Khadi spinners and weavers, promoting sustainable livelihoods.

name: Personality Development and Yogasan Training Camp for Schedule Caste
description: The scheme "Personality Development and Yogasan Training Camp for Schedule Caste Youth" by the Sports, Youth and Cultural Activities Department, Government of Gujarat, aims to promote the physical, mental, and spiritual development of Scheduled Caste youth through 7-day training camps.
